◆ executeCommandFlat()

bool ChatCommandHandler::executeCommandFlat ( std::string_view  text,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 167 of file ChatCommandHandler.cpp.

168{
169 if (text.empty())
170 return false;
171
172 // split input into tokens (views)
173 std::vector<std::string_view> tokens;
174 {
175 size_t p = 0;
176 while (p < text.size())
177 {
178 while (p < text.size() && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(text[p])))
179 ++p;
180
181 if (p >= text.size())
182 break;
183
184 size_t q = p;
185 while (q < text.size() && !std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(text[q])))
186 ++q;
187
188 tokens.emplace_back(text.substr(p, q - p));
189 p = q;
190 }
191 }
192 if (tokens.empty())
193 return false;
194
195 // resolve only the first token to a top-level command
196 std::string top;
197 if (!resolveTopLevelAbbrev(tokens[0], m_session, top))
198 return false; // unknown or ambiguous top-level
199
200 auto lo = [](char c){
201 return static_cast<char>(std::tolower(static_cast<unsigned char>(c)));
202 };
203 auto istarts_with = [&](std::string_view a, std::string_view b){
204 if (b.size() > a.size())
205 return false;
206
207 for (size_t i=0; i<b.size(); ++i)
208 if (lo(a[i]) != lo(b[i]))
209 return false;
210
211 return true;
212 };
213
214 // find deepest matching command (multi-token abbrev)
215 const ChatCommand* chosen = nullptr;
216 std::string chosenCmd;
217 size_t matchedDepth = 0;
218
219 const auto& reg = sCommandTableStorage.getCommandRegistry();
220
221 for (const auto& e : reg)
222 {
223 if (e.command.empty())
224 continue;
225
226 // split command into words
227 std::vector<std::string> words;
228 {
229 std::istringstream is(e.command);
230 for (std::string w; is >> w; ) words.push_back(std::move(w));
231 }
232 if (words.empty())
233 continue;
234
235 // cannot be deeper than what the user typed
236 if (words.size() > tokens.size())
237 continue;
238
239 // first word must equal the resolved top-level exactly (case-insensitive)
240 if (words[0].size() != top.size()) {
241 // fast-path size check (kept to mirror your structure)
242 }
243 {
244 bool eq = true;
245 for (size_t i=0; i<top.size(); ++i)
246 {
247 if (lo(words[0][i]) != lo(top[i]))
248 {
249 eq = false;
250 break;
251 }
252 }
253 if (!eq)
254 continue;
255 }
256
257 // remaining words (if any) are matched by abbreviation
258 bool ok = true;
259 for (size_t i = 1; i < words.size(); ++i)
260 {
261 if (!istarts_with(words[i], tokens[i]))
262 {
263 ok = false;
264 break;
265 }
266 }
267
268 if (!ok)
269 continue;
270
271 const char perm = e.commandPermission.empty() ? '0' : e.commandPermission[0];
272 if (perm != '0' && !m_session->CanUseCommand(perm))
273 continue;
274
275 // prefer deepest match
276 if (words.size() > matchedDepth)
277 {
278 chosen = &e;
279 chosenCmd = e.command;
280 matchedDepth = words.size();
281 }
282 }
283
284 // If there is no matching entry, treat it as a node prefix: show its children.
285 if (!chosen)
286 {
287 // Build the prefix string: <top> + remaining typed tokens (as text),
288 // but do NOT auto-append anything else.
289 std::string prefix = top;
290 for (size_t i = 1; i < tokens.size(); ++i)
291 {
292 prefix.push_back(' ');
293 prefix.append(tokens[i].data(), tokens[i].size());
294 }
295 std::string prefixWithSpace = prefix + ' ';
296
297 // List subcommands under this prefix the user can use.
298 bool any = false;
299 for (const auto& sub : reg)
300 {
301 if (sub.command.size() <= prefixWithSpace.size())
302 continue;
303
304 // case-insensitive startswith on the whole prefix string
305 bool starts = true;
306 for (size_t k = 0; k < prefixWithSpace.size(); ++k)
307 {
308 if (lo(sub.command[k]) != lo(prefixWithSpace[k]))
309 {
310 starts = false;
311 break;
312 }
313 }
314
315 if (!starts)
316 continue;
317
318 const char p = sub.commandPermission.empty() ? '0' : sub.commandPermission[0];
319 if (p != '0' && !m_session->CanUseCommand(p))
320 continue;
321
322 auto help = sub.help.empty() ? "No Help Available" : sub.help;
323 blueSystemMessage(m_session, " {} - {}", sub.command.substr(prefixWithSpace.size()), help);
324
325 any = true;
326 }
327
328 if (!any)
329 systemMessage(m_session, "There is no help for that command");
330 else
331 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Available Subcommands:");
332
333 return true;
334 }
335
336 // Exact/deepest entry found either node (no handler) or leaf (handler)
337
338 if (!chosen->handler)
339 {
340 if (!chosen->help.empty())
341 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, chosen->help.c_str());
342 else
343 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Available Subcommands:");
344
345 const std::string prefix = chosenCmd + ' ';
346 bool any = false;
347
348 for (const auto& sub : reg)
349 {
350 if (sub.command.size() <= prefix.size())
351 continue;
352
353 bool starts = true;
354 for (size_t k = 0; k < prefix.size(); ++k)
355 {
356 if (lo(sub.command[k]) != lo(prefix[k]))
357 {
358 starts = false;
359 break;
360 }
361 }
362
363 if (!starts)
364 continue;
365
366 const char p = sub.commandPermission.empty() ? '0' : sub.commandPermission[0];
367 if (p != '0' && !m_session->CanUseCommand(p))
368 continue;
369
370 auto help = sub.help.empty() ? "No Help Available" : sub.help;
371 blueSystemMessage(m_session, " {} - {}", sub.command.substr(prefix.size()), help);
372 any = true;
373 }
374
375 if (!any && chosen->help.empty())
376 systemMessage(m_session, "There is no help for that command");
377
378 return true;
379 }
380
381 // pass "args" = everything after the matchedDepth words (not after all tokens!)
382 std::string_view args = text;
383 {
384 size_t consumed = 0, seen = 0;
385 while (consumed < text.size() && seen < matchedDepth)
386 {
387 while (consumed < text.size() && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(text[consumed])))
388 ++consumed;
389
390 while (consumed < text.size() && !std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(text[consumed])))
391 ++consumed;
392
393 ++seen;
394 }
395 while (consumed < text.size() && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(text[consumed])))
396 ++consumed;
397 args = text.substr(consumed);
398 }
399
400 // check if min argument count was reached
401 const size_t argc = countWords(args);
402
403 if (argc < chosen->minArgCount)
404 {
405 if (!chosen->help.empty())
406 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, chosen->help.c_str());
407 else
408 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Incorrect syntax specified. Try .help %s for the correct syntax.", chosenCmd.c_str());
409
410 return true;
411 }
412
413 // actually execute the command
414 const bool ok = chosen->handler(this, args, m_session);
415 if (!ok)
416 {
417 if (!chosen->help.empty())
418 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, chosen->help.c_str());
419 else
420 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Incorrect syntax specified. Try .help %s for the correct syntax.", chosenCmd.c_str());
421 }
422
423 return true;
424}
countWords
size_t countWords(const char *argz)
Definition ChatCommand.hpp:48

12{
13 uint8_t internal_type;
14 switch (type)
15 {
16 case 2:
17 internal_type = 0;
18 break;
19 case 3:
20 internal_type = 1;
21 break;
22 case 5:
23 internal_type = 2;
24 break;
25 default:
26 {
27 internal_type = 10;
28 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid arena team type specified! Valid types: 2, 3 and 5.");

◆ getItemIDFromLink()

uint16_t ChatCommandHandler::getItemIDFromLink ( const char *  itemlink,
uint32_t *  itemid 
)

Definition at line 123 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

124{
125 if (itemlink == NULL)
126 {
127 *itemid = 0;
128 return 0;
129 }
130 uint16_t slen = (uint16_t)strlen(itemlink);
131 const char* ptr = strstr(itemlink, "|Hitem:");
132 if (ptr == NULL)
133 {
134 *itemid = 0;
135 return slen;
136 }
137 ptr += 7; // item id is just past "|Hitem:" (7 bytes)
138 *itemid = atoi(ptr);
139 ptr = strstr(itemlink, "|r"); // the end of the item link
140 if (ptr == NULL) // item link was invalid
141 {
142 *itemid = 0;
143 return slen;
144 }
145 ptr += 2;
146 return (ptr - itemlink) & 0x0000ffff;
147}

◆ GetSelectedCreature()

Creature * ChatCommandHandler::GetSelectedCreature ( WorldSession *  m_session,
bool  showerror = true 
)

Definition at line 511 of file ChatCommandHandler.cpp.

512{
513 if (m_session == nullptr)
514 return nullptr;
515
516 Creature* creature = nullptr;
517 bool is_invalid_type = false;
518 WoWGuid wowGuid;
519 wowGuid.Init(m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid());
520
521 switch(wowGuid.getHigh())
522 {
523 case HighGuid::Pet:
524 creature = reinterpret_cast<Creature*>(m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getPet(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart()));
525 break;
526
527 case HighGuid::Unit:
528 case HighGuid::Vehicle:
529 creature = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getCreature(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
530 break;
531 default:
532 is_invalid_type = true;
533 break;
534 }
535
536 if (creature == nullptr || is_invalid_type)
537 {
538 if (showerror)
539 redSystemMessage(m_session, "This command requires a selected a creature.");
540
541 return nullptr;
542 }
543
544 return creature;
545}

)
static

Definition at line 463 of file ChatCommandHandler.cpp.

464{
465 if (m_session == nullptr)
466 return nullptr;
467
468 bool is_creature = false;
469 Player* player_target = nullptr;
470 uint64_t guid = m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid();
471
472 WoWGuid wowGuid;
473 wowGuid.Init(guid);
474
475 switch (wowGuid.getHigh())
476 {
477 case HighGuid::Pet:
478 case HighGuid::Unit:
479 case HighGuid::Vehicle:
480 {
481 is_creature = true;
482 break;
483 }
484 default:
485 break;
486 }
487
488 if (guid == 0 || is_creature)
489 {
490 if (auto_self)
491 {
492 m_session->systemMessage("Auto-targeting self.");
493 player_target = m_session->GetPlayer();
494 }
495 else
496 {
497 if (showerror)
498 m_session->systemMessage("This command requires a selected player.");
499
500 return nullptr;
501 }
502 }
503 else
504 {
505 player_target = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getPlayer((uint32_t)guid);
506 }
507
508 return player_target;
509}

118 }

133{

135 return false;
136 char* pAccount = (char*)args;

138 char* pDuration;
139 ParseAccBanArgs(pAccount, &pDuration, &pReason);
140 uint32_t timeperiod = 0;
141 if (pDuration != nullptr)
142 {
143 timeperiod = Util::GetTimePeriodFromString(pDuration);
144 if (timeperiod == 0)
145 return false;
146 }
147 uint32_t banned = (timeperiod ? (uint32_t)UNIXTIME + timeperiod : 1);
148
149 const std::string reason = pReason;
150
151 sLogonCommHandler.setAccountBanned(pAccount, banned, reason.c_str());
152
153 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Account '{}' has been banned {}{} for reason : {}. The change will be effective immediately.",
154 pAccount, timeperiod ? "until " : "forever", timeperiod ? Util::GetDateTimeStringFromTimeStamp(timeperiod + (uint32_t)UNIXTIME) : "", reason);
155
156 sWorld.disconnectSessionByAccountName(pAccount, m_session);
157 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "banned account %s until %s", pAccount, timeperiod ? Util::GetDateTimeStringFromTimeStamp(timeperiod + (uint32_t)UNIXTIME).c_str() : "permanent");

53{
54 if (!*args)
55 return false;
56
57 char* pAccount = (char*)args;
58 char* pDuration = strchr(pAccount, ' ');
59 if (pDuration == nullptr)
60 return false;
61 *pDuration = 0;
62 ++pDuration;
63
64 uint32_t timeperiod = Util::GetTimePeriodFromString(pDuration);
65 if (timeperiod == 0)

68 uint32_t banned = (uint32_t)UNIXTIME + timeperiod;

78 if (pSession != nullptr)
79 {
80 pSession->m_muted = banned;
81 pSession->SystemMessage("Your voice has been muted until %s by a GM. Until this time, you will not be able to speak in any form.", tsstr.c_str());
82 }
83
84 return true;
85}

◆ HandleAdminCastAllCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleAdminCastAllCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 22 of file AdminCommands.cpp.

23{
24 if (!args)
25 {
26 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No spellid specified.");
27 return true;
28 }
29
30 uint32_t spell_id = std::stoul(args);
31 SpellInfo const* spell_entry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spell_id);
32 if (!spell_entry)
33 {
34 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Spell {} is not a valid spell!", spell_id);
35 return true;
36 }
37
38 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
39 {
40 if (spell_entry->getEffect(i) == SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL)
41 {
42 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used learn spell stopped %u", spell_id);
43 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Learn spell specified.");
44 return true;
45 }
46 }
47
48 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used castall command, spellid %u", spell_id);
49
50 std::lock_guard guard(sObjectMgr.m_playerLock);
51 for (const auto playerPair : sObjectMgr.getPlayerStorage())
52 {
53 Player* player = playerPair.second;
54 if (player->getSession() && player->IsInWorld())
55 {
56 if (player->getWorldMap() != m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap())
57 {
58 sEventMgr.AddEvent(static_cast< Unit* >(player), &Unit::eventCastSpell, static_cast< Unit* >(player), spell_entry, EVENT_PLAYER_CHECKFORCHEATS, 100, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
59 }
60 else
61 {
62 Spell* spell = sSpellMgr.newSpell(player, spell_entry, true, 0);
63 SpellCastTargets targets(player->getGuid());
64 spell->prepare(&targets);
65 }
66 }
67 }
68
69 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Casted spell {} on all players!", spell_id);
70 return true;
71}

◆ HandleAdminDispelAllCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleAdminDispelAllCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 74 of file AdminCommands.cpp.

75{
76 uint32_t pos = 0;
77 if (*args)
78 pos = atoi(args);
79
80 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used dispelall command, pos %u", pos);
81
82 std::lock_guard guard(sObjectMgr.m_playerLock);
83 for (const auto playerPair : sObjectMgr.getPlayerStorage())
84 {
85 Player* player = playerPair.second;
86 if (player->getSession() && player->IsInWorld())
87 {
88 if (player->getWorldMap() != m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap())
89 {
90 if (pos)
91 sEventMgr.AddEvent(static_cast<Unit*>(player), &Unit::removeAllPositiveAuras, EVENT_PLAYER_CHECKFORCHEATS, 100, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
92 else
93 sEventMgr.AddEvent(static_cast<Unit*>(player), &Unit::removeAllNegativeAuras, EVENT_PLAYER_CHECKFORCHEATS, 100, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
94 }
95 else
96 {
97 if (pos)
98 player->removeAllPositiveAuras();
99 else
100 player->removeAllNegativeAuras();
101 }
102 }
103 }
104 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used mass dispel");
105
106 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Dispel action done.");
107 return true;
108}

◆ HandleAdminMassSummonCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleAdminMassSummonCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 111 of file AdminCommands.cpp.

112{
113 sObjectMgr.m_playerLock.lock();
114
115 Player* summon_player = m_session->GetPlayer();
116
117 int faction = -1;
118 char Buffer[170];
119
120 if (*args == 'a')
121 {
122 faction = 0;
123 snprintf(Buffer, 170, "%s%s Has requested a mass summon of all Alliance players. Do not feel obliged to accept the summon, as it is most likely for an event or a test of sorts", MSG_COLOR_GOLD, m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str());
124
125 }
126 else if (*args == 'h')
127 {
128 faction = 1;
129 snprintf(Buffer, 170, "%s%s Has requested a mass summon of all Horde players. Do not feel obliged to accept the summon, as it is most likely for an event or a test of sorts", MSG_COLOR_GOLD, m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str());
130 }
131 else
132 {
133 snprintf(Buffer, 170, "%s%s Has requested a mass summon of all players. Do not feel obliged to accept the summon, as it is most likely for an event or a test of sorts", MSG_COLOR_GOLD, m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str());
134 }
135
136 uint32_t summon_count = 0;
137 std::lock_guard guard(sObjectMgr.m_playerLock);
138 for (const auto playerPair : sObjectMgr.getPlayerStorage())
139 {
140 Player* player = playerPair.second;
141 if (player->getSession() && player->IsInWorld())
142 {
143 if (faction > -1 && player->getTeam() == static_cast<uint32_t>(faction))
144 {
145 player->sendSummonRequest(summon_player->getGuidLow(), summon_player->getZoneId(), summon_player->GetMapId(), summon_player->GetInstanceID(), summon_player->GetPosition());
146 ++summon_count;
147 }
148 else if (faction == -1)
149 {
150 player->sendSummonRequest(summon_player->getGuidLow(), summon_player->getZoneId(), summon_player->GetMapId(), summon_player->GetInstanceID(), summon_player->GetPosition());
151 ++summon_count;
152 }
153
154 }
155 }
156
157 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "requested a mass summon of %u players.", summon_count);
158
159 return true;
160}

◆ HandleAIMoveCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleAIMoveCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 821 of file DebugCommands.cpp.

822{
823 Creature* creature = nullptr;
824 auto player = m_session->GetPlayer();
825 WoWGuid wowGuid;
826 wowGuid.Init(player->getTargetGuid());
827 if (wowGuid.getRawGuid() != 0)
828 {
829 creature = player->getWorldMap()->getCreature(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
830 }
831
832 if (creature == nullptr)
833 {
834 systemMessage(m_session, "You should select a creature.");
835 return true;
836 }
837
838 uint32_t Move = 1;
839 uint32_t Run = 0;
840 uint32_t Time = 0;
841 uint32_t Meth = 0;
842
843 char* pMove = strtok((char*)args, " ");
844 if (pMove)
845 Move = atoi(pMove);
846
847 char* pRun = strtok(nullptr, " ");
848 if (pRun)
849 Run = atoi(pRun);
850
851 char* pTime = strtok(nullptr, " ");
852 if (pTime)
853 Time = atoi(pTime);
854
855 char* pMeth = strtok(nullptr, " ");
856 if (pMeth)
857 Meth = atoi(pMeth);
858
859 float x = player->GetPositionX();
860 float y = player->GetPositionY();
861 float z = player->GetPositionZ();
862 //float o = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetOrientation();
863
864 MovementMgr::MoveSplineInit init(creature);
865
866 float distance = creature->CalcDistance(x, y, z);
867 if (Move == 1)
868 {
869 if (Meth == 1)
870 {
871 float q = distance - 0.5f;
872 x = (creature->GetPositionX() + x * q) / (1 + q);
873 y = (creature->GetPositionY() + y * q) / (1 + q);
874 z = (creature->GetPositionZ() + z * q) / (1 + q);
875 }
876 else if (Meth == 2)
877 {
878 float q = distance - 1;
879 x = (creature->GetPositionX() + x * q) / (1 + q);
880 y = (creature->GetPositionY() + y * q) / (1 + q);
881 z = (creature->GetPositionZ() + z * q) / (1 + q);
882 }
883 else if (Meth == 3)
884 {
885 float q = distance - 2;
886 x = (creature->GetPositionX() + x * q) / (1 + q);
887 y = (creature->GetPositionY() + y * q) / (1 + q);
888 z = (creature->GetPositionZ() + z * q) / (1 + q);
889 }
890 else if (Meth == 4)
891 {
892 float q = distance - 2.5f;
893 x = (creature->GetPositionX() + x * q) / (1 + q);
894 y = (creature->GetPositionY() + y * q) / (1 + q);
895 z = (creature->GetPositionZ() + z * q) / (1 + q);
896 }
897 else if (Meth == 5)
898 {
899 float q = distance - 3;
900 x = (creature->GetPositionX() + x * q) / (1 + q);
901 y = (creature->GetPositionY() + y * q) / (1 + q);
902 z = (creature->GetPositionZ() + z * q) / (1 + q);
903 }
904 else if (Meth == 6)
905 {
906 float q = distance - 3.5f;
907 x = (creature->GetPositionX() + x * q) / (1 + q);
908 y = (creature->GetPositionY() + y * q) / (1 + q);
909 z = (creature->GetPositionZ() + z * q) / (1 + q);
910 }
911 else
912 {
913 float q = distance - 4;
914 x = (creature->GetPositionX() + x * q) / (1 + q);
915 y = (creature->GetPositionY() + y * q) / (1 + q);
916 z = (creature->GetPositionZ() + z * q) / (1 + q);
917 }
918
919 init.MoveTo(x, y, z);
920 if (Run)
921 init.SetWalk(false);
922 else
923 init.SetWalk(true);
924
925 creature->getMovementManager()->launchMoveSpline(std::move(init));
926 }
927 else
928 {
929 init.MoveTo(x, y, z);
930 if (Run)
931 init.SetWalk(false);
932 else
933 init.SetWalk(true);
934
935 creature->getMovementManager()->launchMoveSpline(std::move(init));
936 }
937
938 return true;
939}

969 {

972 }
973
974 worldAnnounce << args;
975
976 sWorld.sendMessageToAll(worldAnnounce.str());
977
978 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used announce command, [%s]", args);
979
980 return true;
981}

1056#endif

1058 }

1062 }

1517{
1518 if (!*args)
1519 return false;
1520

1522 std::string pAcc;
1523 std::string pIP;
1524 std::string pArgs = args;
1525 char* pCharacter = (char*)args;
1526 char* pReason;
1527 char* pDuration;
1528 ParseBanArgs(pCharacter, &pDuration, &pReason);
1529 uint32_t BanTime = 0;
1530
1531 if (pDuration != nullptr)
1532 {
1533 BanTime = Util::GetTimePeriodFromString(pDuration);
1534 if (BanTime == 0)
1535 return false;
1536 }
1537
1538 pBanned = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(pCharacter, false);
1539 if (!pBanned || !pBanned->IsInWorld())
1540 {
1541 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player \'{}\' is not online or does not exists!", pCharacter);
1542 return true;
1543 }
1544
1545 if (pBanned == m_session->GetPlayer())
1546 {
1547 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You cannot ban yourself!");
1548 return true;
1549 }
1550
1551 if (pBanned->getSession() == nullptr)
1552 {
1553 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player does not have a session!");
1554 return true;
1555 }
1556
1557 if (pBanned->getSession()->GetSocket() == nullptr)
1558 {
1559 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player does not have a socket!");
1560 return true;
1561 }
1562
1563 pAcc = pBanned->getSession()->GetAccountName();
1564 pIP = pBanned->getSession()->GetSocket()->GetRemoteIP();
1565 if (pIP == m_session->GetSocket()->GetRemoteIP())
1566 {
1567 redSystemMessage(m_session, "That player has the same IP as you - ban failed");
1568 return true;
1569 }
1570
1571 HandleBanCharacterCommand(pArgs.c_str(), m_session);
1572 char pIPCmd[256];
1573 snprintf(pIPCmd, 254, "%s %s %s", pIP.c_str(), pDuration, pReason);
1574 HandleIPBanCommand(pIPCmd, m_session);
1575 char pAccCmd[256];
1576 snprintf(pAccCmd, 254, "%s %s %s", pAcc.c_str(), pDuration, pReason);
1577 handleAccountBannedCommand(pAccCmd, m_session);
1578
1579 return true;
1580}

◆ HandleBanCharacterCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleBanCharacterCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1452 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

1453{
1454 if (!*args)
1455 return false;
1456
1457 char* pCharacter = (char*)args;
1458 CachedCharacterInfo const* pInfo = nullptr;
1459 char* pReason;
1460 char* pDuration;
1461 uint32_t BanTime = 0;
1462 ParseBanArgs(pCharacter, &pDuration, &pReason);
1463 if (pDuration != nullptr)
1464 {
1465 BanTime = Util::GetTimePeriodFromString(pDuration);
1466 if (BanTime == 0)
1467 return false;
1468 }
1469
1470 Player* pPlayer = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(pCharacter, false);
1471 if (pPlayer == nullptr)
1472 {
1473 pInfo = sObjectMgr.getCachedCharacterInfoByName(pCharacter);
1474 if (pInfo == nullptr)
1475 {
1476 systemMessage(m_session, "Player not found.");
1477 return true;
1478 }
1479 systemMessage(m_session, "Banning player '{}' in database for '{}'.", pCharacter, (pReason == nullptr) ? "No reason." : pReason);
1480 std::string escaped_reason = (pReason == nullptr) ? "No reason." : CharacterDatabase.EscapeString(std::string(pReason));
1481 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE characters SET banned = %u, banReason = '%s' WHERE guid = %u",
1482 BanTime ? BanTime + (uint32_t)UNIXTIME : 1, escaped_reason.c_str(), pInfo->guid);
1483 }
1484 else
1485 {
1486 systemMessage(m_session, "Banning player '{}' ingame for '{}'.", pCharacter, (pReason == nullptr) ? "No reason." : pReason);
1487 std::string sReason = (pReason == nullptr) ? "No Reason." : std::string(pReason);
1488 uint32_t uBanTime = BanTime ? BanTime + (uint32_t)UNIXTIME : 1;
1489 pPlayer->setBanned(uBanTime, sReason);
1490 pInfo = pPlayer->getPlayerInfo();
1491 }
1492 systemMessage(m_session, "This ban is due to expire {}{}.", BanTime ? "on " : "", BanTime ? Util::GetDateTimeStringFromTimeStamp(BanTime + (uint32_t)UNIXTIME) : "Never");
1493
1494 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "banned %s, reason %s, for %s", pCharacter, (pReason == nullptr) ? "No reason" : pReason, BanTime ? Util::GetDateStringFromSeconds(BanTime).c_str() : "ever");
1495
1496 std::stringstream worldAnnounce;
1497 worldAnnounce << MSG_COLOR_RED << "GM: " << pCharacter << " has been banned by " << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str() << " for ";
1498 worldAnnounce << (BanTime ? Util::GetDateStringFromSeconds(BanTime) : "ever") << " Reason: " << ((pReason == nullptr) ? "No reason." : pReason);
1499 sWorld.sendMessageToAll(worldAnnounce.str());
1500
1501 if (sWorld.settings.logger.enableSqlBanLog && pInfo)
1502 {
1503 CharacterDatabase.Execute("INSERT INTO `banned_char_log` VALUES('%s', '%s', %u, %u, '%s')", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str(), pInfo->name.c_str(), (uint32_t)UNIXTIME, (uint32_t)UNIXTIME + BanTime, (pReason == nullptr) ? "No reason." : CharacterDatabase.EscapeString(std::string(pReason)).c_str());
1504 }
1505
1506 if (pPlayer)
1507 {
1508 systemMessage(m_session, "Kicking {}.", pPlayer->getName().c_str());
1509 pPlayer->kickFromServer();
1510 }
1511
1512 return true;
1513}

59{
60 if (!*args)
61 return false;
62
63 uint32_t type = atoi(args);
64 if (type >= BATTLEGROUND_NUM_TYPES)
65 return false;
66

68 if (selected_player == nullptr)
69 return true;

75 guid.Init(uint64_t(0));

1068{
1069 if (!*args)
1070 return false;

1073 {

1075 {
1076 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Appear blocking is already enabled");
1077 }
1078 else
1079 {

1081 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Appear blocking is now enabled");
1082 }
1083 }
1084 else if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::isEqual(args, "off"))
1085 {

1087 {
1088 m_session->GetPlayer()->disableAppearing(false);
1089 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Appear blocking is now disabled");
1090 }
1091 else
1092 {
1093 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Appear blocking is already disabled");
1094 }
1095 }

1097 return true;
1098}

◆ HandleCastSelfCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCastSelfCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1581 of file DebugCommands.cpp.

1582{
1583 Unit* target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1584 if (!target)
1585 target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, false);
1586 if (!target)
1587 {
1588 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Must select a char or creature.");
1589 return false;
1590 }
1591
1592 uint32_t spellid = std::stoul(args);
1593 SpellInfo const* spellentry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellid);
1594 if (!spellentry)
1595 {
1596 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid spell id!");
1597 return false;
1598 }
1599
1600 Spell* sp = sSpellMgr.newSpell(target, spellentry, false, nullptr);
1601
1602 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Target is casting spell {} on himself.", spellid);
1603 SpellCastTargets targets(target->getGuid());
1604 sp->prepare(&targets);
1605
1606 switch (target->getObjectTypeId())
1607 {
1608 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
1609 if (m_session->GetPlayer() != target)
1610 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used castself with spell %d on PLAYER %s", spellid, static_cast< Player* >(target)->getName().c_str());
1611 break;
1612 case TYPEID_UNIT:
1613 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used castself with spell %d on CREATURE %u [%s], sqlid %u", spellid, target->getEntry(), static_cast< Creature* >(target)->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), static_cast< Creature* >(target)->GetSQL_id());
1614 break;
1615 }
1616
1617 return true;
1618}

1481{
1482 Unit* caster = m_session->GetPlayer();
1483 Unit* target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1484 if (!target)
1485 target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, false);
1486 if (!target)
1487 {
1488 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Must select a char or creature.");
1489 return false;
1490 }
1491
1492 uint32_t spellid = std::stoul(args);
1493 SpellInfo const* spellentry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellid);
1494 if (!spellentry)
1495 {
1496 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid spell id!");
1497 return false;
1498 }
1499
1500 Spell* sp = sSpellMgr.newSpell(caster, spellentry, false, nullptr);
1501
1502 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Casting spell {} on target.", spellid);
1503 SpellCastTargets targets(target->getGuid());
1504 sp->prepare(&targets);
1505
1506 switch (target->getObjectTypeId())
1507 {
1508 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
1509 if (caster != target)
1510 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "cast spell %d on PLAYER %s", spellid, static_cast< Player* >(target)->getName().c_str());
1511 break;
1512 case TYPEID_UNIT:
1513 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "cast spell %d on CREATURE %u [%s], sqlid %u", spellid, target->getEntry(), static_cast< Creature* >(target)->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), static_cast< Creature* >(target)->GetSQL_id());
1514 break;
1515 }
1516
1517 return true;
1518}

◆ HandleCastSpellNECommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCastSpellNECommand ( const char *  args,

)

Definition at line 1521 of file DebugCommands.cpp.

1522{
1523 Unit* caster = m_session->GetPlayer();
1524 Unit* target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1525 if (!target)
1526 target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, false);
1527 if (!target)
1528 {
1529 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Must select a char or creature.");
1530 return false;
1531 }
1532
1533 uint32_t spellId = std::stoul(args);
1534 SpellInfo const* spellentry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellId);
1535 if (!spellentry)
1536 {
1537 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid spell id!");
1538 return false;
1539 }
1540 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Casting spell {} on target.", spellId);
1541
1542 WorldPacket data;
1543
1544 data.Initialize(SMSG_SPELL_START);
1545 data << caster->GetNewGUID();
1546 data << caster->GetNewGUID();
1547 data << spellId;
1548 data << uint8_t(0);
1549 data << uint16_t(0);
1550 data << uint32_t(0);
1551 data << uint16_t(2);
1552 data << target->getGuid();
1553 m_session->SendPacket(&data);
1554
1555 data.Initialize(SMSG_SPELL_GO);
1556 data << caster->GetNewGUID();
1557 data << caster->GetNewGUID();
1558 data << spellId;
1559 data << uint8_t(0) << uint8_t(1) << uint8_t(1);
1560 data << target->getGuid();
1561 data << uint8_t(0);
1562 data << uint16_t(2);
1563 data << target->getGuid();
1564 m_session->SendPacket(&data);
1565
1566 switch (target->getObjectTypeId())
1567 {
1568 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
1569 if (caster != target)
1570 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "cast spell %d on PLAYER %s", spellId, static_cast< Player* >(target)->getName().c_str());
1571 break;
1572 case TYPEID_UNIT:
1573 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "cast spell %d on CREATURE %u [%s], sqlid %u", spellId, target->getEntry(), static_cast< Creature* >(target)->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), static_cast< Creature* >(target)->GetSQL_id());
1574 break;
1575 }
1576
1577 return true;
1578}

◆ HandleCharAddCopperCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharAddCopperCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 776 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

777{
778 if (*args == 0)
779 {
780 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify how many copper you will add.");
781 redSystemMessage(m_session, "10000 = 1 gold, 1000 = 1 silver, 1 = 1 copper.");
782 return true;
783 }
784
785 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
786 if (player_target == nullptr)
787 return true;
788
789 int32_t total = atoi(args);
790
791 uint32_t gold = (uint32_t)std::floor(Util::int32abs<float>(total) / 10000.0f);
792 uint32_t silver = (uint32_t)std::floor(Util::int32abs<float>(total) / 100.0f) % 100;
793 uint32_t copper = Util::int32abs<uint32_t>(total) % 100;
794
795#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
796 uint32_t newgold = player_target->getCoinage() + total;
797#else
798 uint64_t newgold = player_target->getCoinage() + total;
799#endif
800
801 if (newgold == 0)
802 {
803 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Taking all gold from {}'s backpack...", player_target->getName());
804 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} took all gold from your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName());
805 }
806 else
807 {
808 if (total >= 0)
809 {
810 if (worldConfig.player.isGoldCapEnabled)
811 {
812 if ((player_target->getCoinage() + newgold) > worldConfig.player.limitGoldAmount)
813 {
814 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Maximum amount of gold is {} and {} already has {}", (worldConfig.player.limitGoldAmount / 10000), player_target->getName(), (player_target->getCoinage() / 10000));
815 return true;
816 }
817 }
818
819 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Adding {} gold, {} silver, {} copper to {}'s backpack...", gold, silver, copper, player_target->getName());
820 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} added {} gold, {} silver, {} copper to your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), gold, silver, copper);
821 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "added %u gold, %u silver, %u copper to %s's backpack.", gold, silver, copper , player_target->getName().c_str());
822 }
823 else
824 {
825 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Taking {} gold, {} silver, {} copper from {}'s backpack...", gold, silver, copper, player_target->getName());
826 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} took {} gold, {} silver, {} copper from your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), gold, silver, copper);
827 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "took %u gold, %u silver, %u copper from %s's backpack.", gold, silver, copper, player_target->getName().c_str());
828 }
829 }
830
831 player_target->setCoinage(newgold);
832
833 return true;
834}
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ HandleCharAddGoldCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharAddGoldCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

898{
899 if (*args == 0)
900 {
901 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify how many gold you will add.");
902 redSystemMessage(m_session, "1 = 1 gold.");
903 return true;
904 }
905
906 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
907 if (player_target == nullptr)
908 return true;
909
910 int32_t total = atoi(args) * 10000;
911
912 uint32_t gold = (uint32_t)std::floor(Util::int32abs<float>(total) / 10000.0f);
913
914#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
915 uint32_t newgold = player_target->getCoinage() + total;
916#else
917 uint64_t newgold = player_target->getCoinage() + total;
918#endif
919
920 if (newgold == 0)
921 {
922 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Taking all gold from {}'s backpack...", player_target->getName());
923 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} took all gold from your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName());
924 }
925 else
926 {
927 if (total >= 0)
928 {
929 if (worldConfig.player.isGoldCapEnabled)
930 {
931 if ((player_target->getCoinage() + newgold) > worldConfig.player.limitGoldAmount)
932 {
933 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Maximum amount of gold is {} and {} already has {}", (worldConfig.player.limitGoldAmount / 10000), player_target->getName(), (player_target->getCoinage() / 10000));
934 return true;
935 }
936 }
937
938 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Adding {} gold to {}'s backpack...", gold, player_target->getName());
939 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} added {} gold to your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), gold);
940 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "added %u gold to %s's backpack.", gold, player_target->getName().c_str());
941 }
942 else
943 {
944 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Taking {} gold from {}'s backpack...", gold, player_target->getName());
945 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} took {} gold from your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), gold);
946 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "took %u gold from %s's backpack.", gold, player_target->getName().c_str());
947 }
948 }
949
950 player_target->setCoinage(newgold);
951
952 return true;
953}

◆ HandleCharAddHonorKillCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharAddHonorKillCommand ( const char *  args,

)

Definition at line 643 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

644{
645 uint32_t kill_amount = args ? std::stoul(args) : 1;
646 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
647 if (player_target == nullptr)
648 return true;
649
650 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "{} honor kill points added to Player {}.", kill_amount, player_target->getName());

658 player_target->setLifetimeHonorableKills(player_target->getKillsLifetime());
659#endif
660

◆ HandleCharAddItemCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharAddItemCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 665 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

666{
667 uint32_t itemid = 0;
668 uint32_t count = 1;
669 int32_t randomprop = 0;
670 int32_t numadded = 0;
671
672 // check for item link
673 uint16_t ofs = getItemIDFromLink(args, &itemid);
674
675 if (itemid)
676 {
677 sscanf(args + ofs, "%u %d", &count, &randomprop); // these may be empty
678 }
679 else if (sscanf(args, "%u %u %d", &itemid, &count, &randomprop) < 1)
680 {
681 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be at least in format: .character add item <itemID>.");
682 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Optional: .character add item <itemID> <amount> <randomprop>");
683 return true;
684 }
685
686 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
687 if (player_target == nullptr)
688 return true;
689
690 auto item_proto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(itemid);
691 if (item_proto != nullptr)
692 {
693 numadded -= player_target->getItemInterface()->GetItemCount(itemid);
694 bool result = player_target->getItemInterface()->AddItemById(itemid, count, randomprop);
695 numadded += player_target->getItemInterface()->GetItemCount(itemid);
696 if (result == true)
697 {
698 if (count == 0)
699 {
700 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used add item command, item id %u [%s], quantity %u, to %s", item_proto->ItemId, item_proto->Name.c_str(), numadded, player_target->getName().c_str());
701 }
702 else
703 {
704 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used add item command, item id %u [%s], quantity %u (only %i added due to full inventory), to %s", item_proto->ItemId, item_proto->Name.c_str(), count, numadded, player_target->getName().c_str());
705 }
706
707 systemMessage(m_session, "Added item {} (id: {}), quantity {}, to {}'s inventory.", sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(item_proto, m_session->language), item_proto->ItemId, numadded, player_target->getName());
708 systemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} added item {}, quantity {}, to your inventory.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(item_proto, player_target->getSession()->language), numadded);
709 }
710 else
711 {
712 systemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "Failed to add item.");
713 }
714 return true;
715 }
716
717 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Item {} is not a valid item!", itemid);
718 return true;
719}

Definition at line 722 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

723{
724 int32_t setid = atoi(args);
725 if (!setid)
726 {
727 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify a setid.");
728 return true;
729 }
730
731 auto player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
732 if (player == nullptr)
733 return true;
734
735 /*auto item_set_list = sObjectMgr.GetListForItemSet(setid);
736 if (!item_set_list)
737 {
738 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid item set.");
739 return true;
740 }*/
741
742 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Searching item set {}...", setid);
743 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used add item set command, set %u, target %s", setid, player->getName().c_str());
744
745 uint32_t itemset_items_count = 0;
746
747 MySQLDataStore::ItemPropertiesContainer const* its = sMySQLStore.getItemPropertiesStore();
748 for (MySQLDataStore::ItemPropertiesContainer::const_iterator itr = its->begin(); itr != its->end(); ++itr)
749 {
750 ItemProperties const* it = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(itr->second.ItemId);
751 if (it == nullptr)
752 continue;
753
754 if (it->ItemSet != setid)
755 continue;
756
757 if (!player->getItemInterface()->AddItemById(it->ItemId, 1, 0))
758 {
759 m_session->SendNotification("No free slots left!");
760 return true;
761 }
762
763 systemMessage(m_session, "Added item: {} [{}]", it->Name, it->ItemId);
764 ++itemset_items_count;
765 }
766
767 if (itemset_items_count > 0)
768 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Added set to inventory complete.");
769 else
770 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Itemset ID: {} is not defined in tems table!", setid);
771
772 return true;
773}

◆ HandleCharAddSilverCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharAddSilverCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 837 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

838{
839 if (*args == 0)
840 {
841 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify how many silver you will add.");
842 redSystemMessage(m_session, "1000 = 1 gold, 1 = 1 silver");
843 return true;
844 }
845
846 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
847 if (player_target == nullptr)
848 return true;
849
850 int32_t total = atoi(args) * 100;
851
852 uint32_t gold = (uint32_t)std::floor(Util::int32abs<float>(total) / 10000.0f);
853 uint32_t silver = (uint32_t)std::floor(Util::int32abs<float>(total) / 100.0f) % 100;
854
855#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
856 uint32_t newgold = player_target->getCoinage() + total;
857#else
858 uint64_t newgold = player_target->getCoinage() + total;
859#endif
860
861 if (newgold == 0)
862 {
863 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Taking all gold from {}'s backpack...", player_target->getName());
864 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} took all gold from your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName());
865 }
866 else
867 {
868 if (total >= 0)
869 {
870 if (worldConfig.player.isGoldCapEnabled)
871 {
872 if ((player_target->getCoinage() + newgold) > worldConfig.player.limitGoldAmount)
873 {
874 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Maximum amount of gold is {} and {} already has {}", (worldConfig.player.limitGoldAmount / 10000), player_target->getName(), (player_target->getCoinage() / 10000));
875 return true;
876 }
877 }
878
879 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Adding {} gold, {} silver to {}'s backpack...", gold, silver, player_target->getName());
880 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} added {} gold, {} silver to your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), gold, silver);
881 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "added %u gold, %u silver to %s's backpack.", gold, silver, player_target->getName().c_str());
882 }
883 else
884 {
885 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Taking {} gold, {} silver from {}'s backpack...", gold, silver, player_target->getName());
886 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} took {} gold, {} silver from your backpack.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), gold, silver);
887 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "took %u gold, %u silver from %s's backpack.", gold, silver, player_target->getName().c_str());
888 }
889 }
890
891 player_target->setCoinage(newgold);
892
893 return true;
894}

233{

258 }
259 else
260 {
261 player_target->advanceSkillLine(skill, amount);
262 }
263
264 return true;

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharIncreaseWeaponSkill ( const char *  args,

)

1093{
1094 char* pMin = strtok((char*)args, " ");
1095 uint16_t cnt = 0;
1096 if (!pMin)
1097 cnt = 1;
1098 else
1099 cnt = static_cast<uint16_t>(std::stoul(pMin));
1100
1101 Player* selected_player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1102 if (selected_player == nullptr)
1103 return true;
1104
1105 uint16_t SubClassSkill = 0;
1106
1107 Item* item = selected_player->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND);
1108 ItemProperties const* proto = nullptr;
1109 if (item == nullptr)
1110 item = selected_player->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED);
1111
1112 if (item != nullptr)
1113 proto = item->getItemProperties();
1114
1115 if (proto)
1116 {
1117 switch (proto->SubClass)
1118 {
1119 // Weapons
1120 case 0: // 1 handed axes
1121 SubClassSkill = SKILL_AXES;
1122 break;
1123 case 1: // 2 handed axes
1124 SubClassSkill = SKILL_2H_AXES;
1125 break;
1126 case 2: // bows
1127 SubClassSkill = SKILL_BOWS;
1128 break;
1129 case 3: // guns
1130 SubClassSkill = SKILL_GUNS;
1131 break;
1132 case 4: // 1 handed mace
1133 SubClassSkill = SKILL_MACES;
1134 break;
1135 case 5: // 2 handed mace
1136 SubClassSkill = SKILL_2H_MACES;
1137 break;
1138 case 6: // polearms
1139 SubClassSkill = SKILL_POLEARMS;
1140 break;
1141 case 7: // 1 handed sword
1142 SubClassSkill = SKILL_SWORDS;
1143 break;
1144 case 8: // 2 handed sword
1145 SubClassSkill = SKILL_2H_SWORDS;
1146 break;
1147 case 9: // obsolete
1148 SubClassSkill = 136;
1149 break;
1150 case 10: //1 handed exotic
1151 SubClassSkill = 136;
1152 break;
1153 case 11: // 2 handed exotic
1154 SubClassSkill = 0;
1155 break;
1156 case 12: // fist
1157 SubClassSkill = SKILL_FIST_WEAPONS;
1158 break;
1159 case 13: // misc
1160 SubClassSkill = 0;
1161 break;
1162 case 15: // daggers
1163 SubClassSkill = SKILL_DAGGERS;
1164 break;
1165#if VERSION_STRING <= Cata
1166 case 16: // thrown
1167 SubClassSkill = SKILL_THROWN;
1168 break;
1169#endif
1170 case 18: // crossbows
1171 SubClassSkill = SKILL_CROSSBOWS;
1172 break;
1173 case 19: // wands
1174 SubClassSkill = SKILL_WANDS;
1175 break;
1176 case 20: // fishing
1177 SubClassSkill = SKILL_FISHING;
1178 break;
1179 }
1180 }
1181 else
1182 {
1183 SubClassSkill = 162;
1184 }
1185
1186 if (!SubClassSkill)
1187 {
1188 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Can't find skill ID!");
1189 return false;
1190 }
1191
1192 auto skill = SubClassSkill;
1193
1194 if (selected_player != m_session->GetPlayer())
1195 {
1196 blueSystemMessage(selected_player->getSession(), "{} modified your skill line {}. Advancing {} times.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), skill, cnt);
1197 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Modifying skill line {}. Advancing {} times for {}.", skill, cnt, selected_player->getName());
1198 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "increased weapon skill (%u) of %s by %u", skill, selected_player->getName().c_str(), cnt);
1199 }
1200 else
1201 {
1202 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Modifying skill line {}. Advancing {} times.", skill, cnt);
1203 }
1204
1205 if (!selected_player->hasSkillLine(skill))
1206 {
1207 systemMessage(m_session, "Does not have skill line {}, adding.", skill);
1208 selected_player->addSkillLine(skill, cnt, 0);
1209 }
1210 else
1211 {
1212 selected_player->advanceSkillLine(skill, cnt);
1213 }
1214
1215 return true;
1216}

391 };
392
393 uint8_t player_class = selected_player->getClass();
394 for (uint32_t i = 0; spellarray[player_class][i] != 0; ++i)
395 {
396 spell_entry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellarray[player_class][i]);
397 if (spell_entry == nullptr)
398 continue;
399
400 if (selected_player->hasSpell(spellarray[player_class][i]))
401 continue;
402
403 selected_player->addSpell(spellarray[player_class][i]);
404 }
405
406#if VERSION_STRING < Cata

416 { 0 }, // GNOME

535 { 0 }, // RACE 21

537 };
538#endif
539
540 uint8_t player_race = selected_player->getRace();
541 switch (player_class)
542 {
543 case PALADIN:
544 for (uint32_t i = 0; paladinspellarray[player_race][i] != 0; ++i)
545 {
546 spell_entry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(paladinspellarray[player_race][i]);
547 if (spell_entry == nullptr)
548 continue;
549
550 if (selected_player->hasSpell(paladinspellarray[player_race][i]))
551 continue;
552
553 selected_player->addSpell(paladinspellarray[player_race][i]);
554 }
555 break;
556 case MAGE:
557 for (uint32_t i = 0; magespellarray[player_race][i] != 0; ++i)
558 {
559 spell_entry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(magespellarray[player_race][i]);
560 if (spell_entry == nullptr)
561 continue;
562
563 if (selected_player->hasSpell(magespellarray[player_race][i]))
564 continue;
565
566 selected_player->addSpell(magespellarray[player_race][i]);
567 }
568 break;
569 case SHAMAN:
570 for (uint32_t i = 0; shamanspellarray[player_race][i] != 0; ++i)
571 {
572 spell_entry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(shamanspellarray[player_race][i]);
573 if (spell_entry == nullptr)
574 continue;
575
576 if (selected_player->hasSpell(shamanspellarray[player_race][i]))
577 continue;
578
579 selected_player->addSpell(shamanspellarray[player_race][i]);
580 }
581 break;
582 }
583 return true;
584 }
585
586 uint32_t spell = std::stoul(args);
587 if (spell == 0)
588 {
589 spell = getSpellIDFromLink(args);
590 }
591
592 spell_entry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spell);
593 if (spell_entry == nullptr)
594 {
595 systemMessage(m_session, "Invalid spell {}", spell);
596 return true;
597 }
598
599 if (!selected_player->getSession()->HasGMPermissions() && (spell_entry->getEffect(0) == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTANT_KILL || spell_entry->getEffect(1) == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTANT_KILL || spell_entry->getEffect(2) == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTANT_KILL))
600 {
601 systemMessage(m_session, "don't be an idiot and teach players instakill spells. this action has been logged.");
602 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "is an idiot and tried to tought player %s instakill spell %u", selected_player->getName().c_str(), spell);
603 return true;
604 }
605
606 if (selected_player->hasSpell(spell))
607 {
608 systemMessage(m_session, "{} already knows that spell.", selected_player->getName());
609 return true;
610 }
611
612 selected_player->addSpell(spell);
613
614 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "Taught %s spell %u", selected_player->getName().c_str(), spell);
615 blueSystemMessage(selected_player->getSession(), "{} taught you Spell {}", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), spell);
616 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Taught {} Spell {}", selected_player->getName(), spell);
617
618 return true;
619}

183{
184 uint16_t skill;
185 uint16_t min;
186 uint16_t max;
187
188 if (sscanf(args, "%hu %hu %hu", &skill, &min, &max) < 1)
189 {
190 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be at least in format: .character learnskill <skillid>.");
191 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Optional: .character learnskill <skillid> <min> <max>");
192 return true;
193 }
194
195 if (min == 0)
196 min = 1;
197
198 if (max == 0)
199 max = 1;
200
201 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
202 if (player_target == nullptr)
203 return true;
204
205 if (player_target->hasSkillLine(skill))
206 {
207 if (player_target == m_session->GetPlayer())
208 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You already know this skill line");
209 else
210 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player already knows this skill line");
211
212 return true;
213 }
214
215 player_target->addSkillLine(skill, min, max);
216
217 if (player_target == m_session->GetPlayer())
218 {
219 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Adding skill line {}", skill);
220 }
221 else
222 {
223 systemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} taught you skill line {}.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), skill);
224 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Skill line {} added to player: {}", skill, player_target->getName());
225 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used add skill of %u %u %u on %s", skill, min, max, player_target->getName().c_str());
226 }
227
228 return true;
229}

◆ HandleCharLevelUpCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharLevelUpCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 62 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

63{
64 uint32_t levels = atoi(args);
65
66 if (levels == 0)
67 {
68 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be in format: .character levelup <level>.");
69 redSystemMessage(m_session, "A 0 level is not allowed.");
70 return true;
71 }
72
73 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
74 if (player_target == nullptr)
75 return true;
76
77 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used level up command on %s, with %u levels", player_target->getName().c_str(), levels);
78
79 levels += player_target->getLevel();
80
81 if (levels > worldConfig.player.playerLevelCap)
82 levels = worldConfig.player.playerLevelCap;
83
84 auto level_info = sObjectMgr.getLevelInfo(player_target->getRace(), player_target->getClass(), levels);
85 if (level_info == nullptr)
86 {
87 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No LevelInfo for Leve: {}, Race: {}, Class: {}", levels, player_target->getRace(), player_target->getClass());
88 return true;
89 }
90
91 player_target->applyLevelInfo(levels);
92
93 if (player_target != m_session->GetPlayer())
94 {
95 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "{} leveled up to level: {}", player_target->getName().c_str(), levels);
96 blueSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} leveled you up to {}.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str(), levels);
97 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "leveled player %s to level %u", player_target->getName().c_str(), levels);
98 }
99 else
100 {
101 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "You leveled yourself to {}", levels);
102 }
103
104 player_target->sendFriendStatus(true);
105
106 return true;
107}

1970

1972 {
1973 const auto save = player_target->getInstanceSave(mapId, false);
1974

1977 count++;
1978 MySQLStructure::MapInfo const* mapInfo = sMySQLStore.getWorldMapInfo(mapId);
1979 if (mapInfo)

1986 {

1990

1992 if (instance == nullptr)
1993 ss << MSG_COLOR_LIGHTRED << "Shut Down|r";
1994 else
1995 {
1996 if (!instance->hasPlayers())
1997 ss << MSG_COLOR_LIGHTRED << "Idle|r";
1998 else
1999 ss << MSG_COLOR_GREEN << "In use|r";
2000 }
2001
2002 }
2003 }
2004 ss << "\n";
2005 }
2006
2007 if (count == 0)
2008 ss << "Player is not assigned to any persistent instances.\n";
2009 else
2010 ss << "Player is assigned to " << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << count << "|r persistent instances.\n";
2011
2012 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, ss.str().c_str());
2013 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used show instances command on %s,", player_target->getName().c_str());
2014 return true;
2015}

◆ handleCharListSpellsCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::handleCharListSpellsCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1867 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

1868{
1869 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1870 if (player_target == nullptr)
1871 return true;
1872
1873 // No args or 0 = list only active spells
1874 // 1 = list deleted / inactive spells
1875 const auto arg = static_cast<uint8_t>(std::stoul(args));
1876 std::string spellString = "";
1877 uint8_t itemsPerRow = 0;
1878
1879 const auto& spellSet = arg == 1 ? player_target->getDeletedSpellSet() : player_target->getSpellSet();
1880 for (auto itr = spellSet.cbegin(); itr != spellSet.cend();)
1881 {
1882 spellString += std::to_string(*itr);
1883 ++itr;
1884 if (itr != spellSet.cend())
1885 spellString += ", ";
1886 ++itemsPerRow;
1887 if (itemsPerRow >= 9)
1888 {
1889 // Add a line break after 9 spells
1890 spellString += "\n";
1891 itemsPerRow = 0;
1892 }
1893 }
1894
1895 if (arg == 1)
1896 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "===== {} has {} deleted spells =====", player_target->getName(), spellSet.size());
1897 else
1898 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "===== {} has {} spells =====", player_target->getName(), spellSet.size());
1899
1900 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, spellString.c_str());
1901 return true;
1902}

◆ HandleCharRemoveItemCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharRemoveItemCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 986 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

987{
988 uint32_t item_id;
989 int32_t count, ocount;
990
991 int argc = sscanf(args, "%u %u", &item_id, (unsigned int*)&count);
992 if (argc == 1)
993 count = 1;
994 else if (argc != 2 || !count)
995 return false;
996
997 ocount = count;
998 Player* selected_player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
999 if (selected_player == nullptr)
1000 return true;
1001
1002 int32_t loop_count = 0;
1003 int32_t start_count = selected_player->getItemInterface()->GetItemCount(item_id, true);
1004 int32_t start_count2 = start_count;
1005 if (count > start_count)
1006 count = start_count;
1007
1008 while (start_count >= count && (count > 0) && loop_count < 20)
1009 {
1010 selected_player->getItemInterface()->RemoveItemAmt(item_id, count);
1011 start_count2 = selected_player->getItemInterface()->GetItemCount(item_id, true);
1012 count -= (start_count - start_count2);
1013 start_count = start_count2;
1014 ++loop_count;
1015 }
1016
1017 ItemProperties const* item_properties = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(item_id);
1018 if (item_properties != nullptr)
1019 {
1020 if (selected_player != m_session->GetPlayer())
1021 {
1022 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used remove item %s (id: %u) count %u from %s", item_properties->Name.c_str(), item_id, ocount, selected_player->getName().c_str());
1023 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Removing {} copies of item {} (id: {}) from {}'s inventory.", ocount, sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(item_properties, m_session->language), item_id, selected_player->getName());
1024 blueSystemMessage(selected_player->getSession(), "{} removed {} copies of item {} from your inventory.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), ocount, sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(item_properties, selected_player->getSession()->language));
1025 }
1026 else
1027 {
1028 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Removing {} copies of item {} (id: {}) from your inventory.", ocount, sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(item_properties, m_session->language), item_id);
1029 }
1030 }
1031 else
1032 {
1033 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Cannot remove non valid item id: {} .", item_id);
1034 }
1035
1036 return true;
1037}

1356 player_item->m_isDirty = true;
1357 }
1358 }

◆ HandleCharSetNameCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharSetNameCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1429 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

1430{
1431 if (!args)
1432 return false;
1433
1434 constexpr std::size_t maxNameLength = 100;
1435
1436 std::string current_name;
1437 std::string new_name_cmd;
1438
1439 std::istringstream iss(std::string{ args });
1440
1441 if (!(iss >> current_name >> new_name_cmd))
1442 return false;
1443
1444 if (current_name.empty() || current_name.size() > maxNameLength ||
1445 new_name_cmd.empty() || new_name_cmd.size() > maxNameLength)
1446 {
1447 return false;
1448 }
1449
1450 auto isAlphaAscii = [](unsigned char c) {
1451 return (c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z') || (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z');
1452 };
1453
1454 if (!std::all_of(new_name_cmd.begin(), new_name_cmd.end(), isAlphaAscii))
1455 {
1456 redSystemMessage(m_session, "That name is invalid or contains invalid characters.");
1457 return true;
1458 }
1459
1460 std::string new_name = new_name_cmd;
1461 AscEmu::Util::Strings::capitalize(new_name);
1462
1463 const auto pi = sObjectMgr.getCachedCharacterInfoByName(current_name);
1464 if (pi == nullptr)
1465 {
1466 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player not found with this name.");
1467 return true;
1468 }
1469
1470 if (sObjectMgr.getCachedCharacterInfoByName(new_name) != nullptr)
1471 {
1472 redSystemMessage(m_session, "New name {} is already in use.", new_name);
1473 return true;
1474 }
1475
1476 sObjectMgr.updateCachedCharacterInfoName(pi, new_name);
1477
1478 Player* plr = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(pi->guid);
1479 if (plr != nullptr)
1480 {
1481 plr->setName(new_name);
1482 blueSystemMessage(plr->getSession(), "{} changed your name to '{}'.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), new_name);
1483 plr->saveToDB(false);
1484 }
1485 else
1486 {
1487 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE characters SET name = '%s' WHERE guid = %u", CharacterDatabase.EscapeString(new_name).c_str(), pi->guid);
1488 }
1489
1490 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Changed name of '{}' to '{}'.", current_name, new_name);
1491 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "renamed character %s (GUID: %u) to %s", current_name.c_str(), pi->guid, new_name.c_str());
1492 sPlrLog.writefromsession(m_session, "GM renamed character %s (GUID: %u) to %s", current_name.c_str(), pi->guid, new_name.c_str());
1493 return true;
1494}

1498{
1499 uint32_t phase = atoi(args);
1500 if (phase == 0)
1501 {
1502 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No phase set. Use .character set phase <phase>");
1503 return true;
1504 }

1506 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1507 if (player_target == nullptr)
1508 return true;
1509

1515 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} set your phase to {}.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), phase);

1518 else
1519 {
1520 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "You set your own phase to {}.", phase);
1521 }
1522
1523 return true;
1524}

◆ HandleCharSetRaceChangeCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharSetRaceChangeCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1801 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

1802{
1803 // prevent buffer overflow
1804 if (strlen(args) > 100)
1805 return false;
1806
1807 std::string tmp = std::string(args);
1808 const auto pi = sObjectMgr.getCachedCharacterInfoByName(tmp);
1809 if (pi == nullptr)
1810 {
1811 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player with that name not found.");
1812 return true;
1813 }
1814
1815 Player* plr = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(pi->guid);
1816 if (plr == nullptr)
1817 {
1818 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE characters SET login_flags = %u WHERE guid = %u", (uint32_t)LOGIN_CUSTOMIZE_RACE, pi->guid);
1819 }
1820 else
1821 {
1822 plr->setLoginFlag(LOGIN_CUSTOMIZE_RACE);
1823 plr->saveToDB(false);
1824 blueSystemMessage(plr->getSession(), "{} flagged your character for a race change at next login.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName());
1825 }
1826
1827 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "{} flagged for a race change next logon.", args);
1828 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "flagged %s for a race change for charater (%u)", pi->name.c_str(), pi->guid);
1829 return true;
1830}

1528{
1529 float speed = float(atof(args));
1530 if (speed == 0.0f || speed > 255.0f || speed < 0.1f)
1531 {
1532 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid speed set. Value range 0.1f ... 255.0f Use .character set speed <speed>");
1533 return true;
1534 }
1535
1536 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1537 if (player_target == nullptr)
1538 return true;
1539
1540 if (player_target != m_session->GetPlayer())
1541 {
1542 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Setting the speed of {} to {}.", player_target->getName(), speed);
1543 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} set your speed to {}.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), speed);
1544 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "modified speed of %s to %3.2f.", player_target->getName().c_str(), speed);
1545 }
1546 else
1547 {
1548 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Setting your speed to {}.", speed);
1549 }
1550
1551 player_target->setSpeedRate(TYPE_RUN, speed, true);
1552 player_target->setSpeedRate(TYPE_SWIM, speed, true);
1553 player_target->setSpeedRate(TYPE_RUN_BACK, speed / 2, true);
1554 player_target->setSpeedRate(TYPE_FLY, speed * 2, true);
1555
1556 return true;
1557}

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharSetTalentpointsCommand ( const char *  args,

1594{
1595 if (!args)
1596 {
1597 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No amount of talentpoints entered.");
1598#ifdef FT_DUAL_SPEC
1599 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Use: .character set talentpoints <primary_amount> <secondary_amount>");
1600#else
1601 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Use: .character set talentpoints <amount>");
1602#endif
1603 return true;
1604 }
1605
1606 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1607 if (player_target == nullptr)
1608 return true;
1609
1610 uint32_t primary_amount = 0;
1611 [[maybe_unused]]uint32_t secondary_amount = 0;
1612
1613 std::stringstream ss(args);
1614 ss >> primary_amount;
1615#ifdef FT_DUAL_SPEC
1616 ss >> secondary_amount;
1617#endif

1619#ifdef FT_DUAL_SPEC
1620 player_target->m_specs[SPEC_PRIMARY].setTalentPoints(primary_amount);
1621 player_target->m_specs[SPEC_SECONDARY].setTalentPoints(secondary_amount);
1622#else

1624#endif
1625

1627
1628 if (player_target != m_session->GetPlayer())
1629 {
1630#ifdef FT_DUAL_SPEC

1633 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "set talenpoints primary: %u, secondary: %u for player %s", primary_amount, secondary_amount, player_target->getName().c_str());
1634#else
1635 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Setting talent points {} for player {}.", primary_amount, player_target->getName());
1636 greenSystemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "{} set your talent points to {}.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), primary_amount);
1637 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "set talent points %u for player %s", primary_amount, player_target->getName().c_str());
1638#endif
1639 }
1640 else
1641 {
1642#ifdef FT_DUAL_SPEC
1643 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Your talent points were set - primary: {}, secondary: {}.", primary_amount, secondary_amount);
1644#else
1645 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Your talent points were set to {}.", primary_amount);
1646#endif
1647 }
1648
1649 return true;
1650}

◆ HandleCharSetTitleCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCharSetTitleCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1653 of file CharacterCommands.cpp.

1654{
1655#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
1656 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1657 if (player_target == nullptr)
1658 return true;
1659
1660 int32_t title = std::stoul(args);
1661 if (title > int32_t(PVPTITLE_END) || title < -int32_t(PVPTITLE_END))
1662 {
1663 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Argument {} is out of range!", title);
1664 return false;
1665 }
1666 if (title == 0)
1667 {
1668 player_target->setKnownTitles(0, 0);
1669#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
1670 player_target->setKnownTitles(1, 0);
1671 player_target->setKnownTitles(2, 0);
1672#endif
1673 }
1674 else if (title > 0)
1675 {
1676 player_target->setKnownPvPTitle(static_cast<RankTitles>(title), true);
1677 }
1678 else
1679 {
1680 player_target->setKnownPvPTitle(static_cast<RankTitles>(-title), false);
1681 }
1682
1683#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
1684 player_target->setChosenTitle(0); // better remove chosen one
1685#endif
1686 systemMessage(m_session, "Title has been {}.", title > 0 ? "set" : "reset");
1687
1688 std::stringstream logtext;
1689 logtext << "has ";
1690 if (title > 0)
1691 logtext << "set the title field of " << player_target->getName().c_str() << "to " << title << ".";
1692 else
1693 logtext << "reset the title field of " << player_target->getName().c_str();
1694
1695 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, logtext.str().c_str());
1696
1697 return true;
1698#else
1699 redSystemMessage(m_session, "This command is not available for Classic!");
1700 return true;
1701#endif
1702}

151{

157 if (spell_id == 0)

159 spell_id = getSpellIDFromLink(args);

161 {

173 }
174 else

177 }

◆ HandleCheatListCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleCheatListCommand ( const char *  ,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 12 of file CheatCommands.cpp.

13{
14 const auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
15 if (player_target == nullptr)
16 return true;
17
18 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasCooldownCheat || player_target->m_cheats.hasCastTimeCheat ||
19 player_target->m_cheats.hasGodModeCheat || player_target->m_cheats.hasPowerCheat ||
20 player_target->m_cheats.hasFlyCheat || player_target->m_cheats.hasAuraStackCheat ||
21 player_target->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat || player_target->m_cheats.hasTriggerpassCheat ||
22 player_target->m_isGmInvisible || player_target->m_isInvincible
23 )
24 {
25 systemMessage(m_session, "Player %s has the following cheats activated:", player_target->getName().c_str());
26
27 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasCooldownCheat)
28 systemMessage(m_session, "-- Cooldown is active.");
29 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasCastTimeCheat)
30 systemMessage(m_session, "-- CastTime is active.");
31 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasGodModeCheat)
32 systemMessage(m_session, "-- GodMode is active.");
33 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasPowerCheat)
34 systemMessage(m_session, "-- PowerCheat is active.");
35 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasFlyCheat)
36 systemMessage(m_session, "-- FlyCheat is active.");
37 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasAuraStackCheat)
38 systemMessage(m_session, "-- AuraStack is active.");
39 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat)
40 systemMessage(m_session, "-- ItemStack is active.");
41 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasTriggerpassCheat)
42 systemMessage(m_session, "-- TriggerPass is active.");
43 if (player_target->m_cheats.hasTaxiCheat)
44 systemMessage(m_session, "-- TaxiCheat is active.");
45 if (player_target->m_isGmInvisible)
46 systemMessage(m_session, "-- Invisibility is active.");
47 if (player_target->m_isInvincible)
48 systemMessage(m_session, "-- Invincibility is active.");
49 }
50 else
51 {
52 if (player_target == m_session->GetPlayer())
53 systemMessage(m_session, "You have no active cheats!");
54 else
55 systemMessage(m_session, "Player {} has no active cheats!", player_target->getName());
56 }
57
58 return true;
59}

63{

Definition at line 1401 of file DebugCommands.cpp.

1402{
1403 if (worldConfig.terrainCollision.isCollisionEnabled)
1404 {
1405 Player* plr = m_session->GetPlayer();
1406 float radius = 5.0f;
1407
1408 float posX = plr->GetPositionX();
1409 float posY = plr->GetPositionY();
1410 float posZ = plr->GetPositionZ();
1411 float ori = plr->GetOrientation();
1412
1413 LocationVector src(posX, posY, posZ);
1414
1415 LocationVector dest(posX + (radius * (cosf(ori))), posY + (radius * (sinf(ori))), posZ);
1416
1417 const auto mgr = VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapManager();
1418 float z = mgr->getHeight(plr->GetMapId(), posX, posY, posZ + 2.0f, 10000.0f);
1419 float z2 = mgr->getHeight(plr->GetMapId(), posX, posY, posZ + 5.0f, 10000.0f);
1420 float z3 = mgr->getHeight(plr->GetMapId(), posX, posY, posZ, 10000.0f);
1421 float z4 = plr->getWorldMap()->getGridHeight(plr->GetPositionX(), plr->GetPositionY());
1422 bool fp = mgr->getObjectHitPos(plr->GetMapId(), src.x, src.y, src.z, dest.x, dest.y, dest.z, dest.x, dest.y, dest.z, -1.5f);
1423
1424 systemMessage(m_session, "Results were: {}(offset2.0f) | {}(offset5.0f) | {}(org) | landheight:{} | target radius5 FP:{}", z, z2, z3, z4, fp);
1425 return true;
1426 }
1427
1428 systemMessage(m_session, "Collision is not enabled.");
1429 return true;
1430}

◆ handleCommandsCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::handleCommandsCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 30 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

31{
32 std::string output;
33 uint32_t count = 0;
34
35 output = "Available commands: \n\n";
36
37 for (const auto table : sCommandTableStorage.getCommandRegistry())
38 {
39 std::string top;
40 if (*args && !resolveTopLevelAbbrev(args, m_session, top))
41 continue;
42
43 if (table.commandPermission == "z")
44 {
45 output += "|cffff6060";
46 output += table.command;
47 output += "|r, ";
48 }
49 else if (table.commandPermission == "m")
50 {
51 output += "|cff00ffff";
52 output += table.command;
53 output += "|r, ";
54 }
55 else if (table.commandPermission == "c")
56 {
57 output += "|cff00ff00";
58 output += table.command;
59 output += "|r, ";
60 }
61 else
62 {
63 output += "|cff00ccff";
64 output += table.command;
65 output += "|r, ";
66 }
67
68 count++;
69 if (count == 5) // 5 per line
70 {
71 output += "\n";
72 count = 0;
73 }
74 }
75 if (count)
76 output += "\n";
77
78 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, output.c_str());
79
80 return true;
81}

Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ HandleDebugSetPlayerFlagsCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleDebugSetPlayerFlagsCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 612 of file DebugCommands.cpp.

613{
614 uint32_t flags;
615 if (sscanf(args, "%u", &flags) != 1)
616 {
617 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must contain at least 1 flag.");
618 return true;
619 }
620
621 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true);
622 if (player_target == nullptr)
623 return true;
624
625 const auto current_flags = player_target->getPlayerFlags();
626
627 player_target->addPlayerFlags(flags);
628
629 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Player flag {} added (before {})", flags, current_flags);
630
631 return true;

◆ HandleDebugSetUnitByteCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleDebugSetUnitByteCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 567 of file DebugCommands.cpp.

568{
569 uint32_t bytes;
570 uint32_t offset;
571 uint32_t value;
572 if (sscanf(args, "%u %u %u", &bytes, &offset, &value) != 3)
573 {
574 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be in format <bytes> <offset> <value>.");
575 return true;
576 }
577
578 auto unit_target = GetSelectedUnit(m_session, true);
579 if (unit_target == nullptr)
580 return true;
581
582 if (offset > 3)
583 return true;
584
585 switch (bytes)
586 {
587 case 0:
588 {
589 unit_target->setBytes0ForOffset(offset, static_cast<uint8_t>(value));
590 } break;
591 case 1:
592 {
593 unit_target->setBytes1ForOffset(offset, static_cast<uint8_t>(value));
594 } break;
595 case 2:
596 {
597 unit_target->setBytes2ForOffset(offset, static_cast<uint8_t>(value));
598 } break;
599 default:
600 {
601 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Bytes {} are not existent. Choose from 0, 1 or 2", bytes);
602 return true;
603 }
604 }
605
606 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Unit Bytes {} Offset {} set to Value {}", bytes, offset, value);
607
608 return true;
609}
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

696{
697 uint32_t type;
698 float density;
699
700 if (sscanf(args, "%u %f", &type, &density) != 2)
701 {
702 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be in format <type> <density>.");
703 return true;
704 }
705

707 density = 0.10f;
708 else if (density > 2.0f)
709 density = 2.0f;
710
711 sWeatherMgr.sendWeatherForPlayer(type, density, m_session->GetPlayer());
712

714
715 return true;
716}

◆ HandleDebugSpawnWarCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleDebugSpawnWarCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1112 of file DebugCommands.cpp.

1113{
1114 uint32_t count, npcid;
1115 uint32_t health = 0;
1116
1117 // takes 2 or 3 arguments: npcid, count, (health)
1118 if (sscanf(args, "%u %u %u", &npcid, &count, &health) != 3)
1119 {
1120 if (sscanf(args, "%u %u", &count, &npcid) != 2)
1121 return false;
1122 }
1123
1124 if (!count || !npcid)
1125 return false;
1126
1127 CreatureProperties const* cp = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(npcid);
1128 if (cp == nullptr)
1129 return false;
1130
1131 WorldMap* m = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap();
1132
1133 // if we have selected unit, use its position
1134 Unit* unit = m->getUnit(m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid());
1135 if (unit == nullptr)
1136 unit = m_session->GetPlayer(); // otherwise ours
1137
1138 float bx = unit->GetPositionX();
1139 float by = unit->GetPositionY();
1140 float x, y, z;
1141
1142 float angle = 1;
1143 float r = 3; // starting radius
1144 for (; count > 0; --count)
1145 {
1146 // spawn in spiral
1147 x = r * sinf(angle);
1148 y = r * cosf(angle);
1149 z = unit->getMapHeight(LocationVector(bx + x, by + y, unit->GetPositionZ() + 2));
1150
1151 Creature* c = m->createCreature(npcid);
1152 c->Load(cp, bx + x, by + y, z, 0.0f);
1153 if (health != 0)
1154 {
1155 c->setMaxHealth(health);
1156 c->setHealth(health);
1157 }
1158 c->setFactionTemplate((count % 2) ? 1 : 2);
1159 c->setServersideFaction();
1160 c->PushToWorld(m);
1161
1162 r += 0.5;
1163 angle += 8 / r;
1164 }
1165 return true;
1166}

519{
520 float speed = float(atof(args));
521 if (speed == 0.0f || speed > 255.0f || speed < 0.1f)
522 {
523 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid speed set. Value range 0.1f ... 255.0f Use .debug speed <speed>");
524 return true;
525 }

532

534 selected_unit->setSpeedRate(TYPE_RUN, (speed + speed / 2), true);
535 selected_unit->setSpeedRate(TYPE_SWIM, speed, true);
536 selected_unit->setSpeedRate(TYPE_RUN_BACK, speed / 2, true);

538
539 return true;

111{
112 systemMessage(m_session, "Beginning reload of all game events");
113 auto startTime = Util::TimeNow();
114
115 // Stop all events, then clear storage
116 for (const auto& eventPair : sGameEventMgr.mGameEvents)
117 {
118 auto gameEvent = eventPair.second.get();
119 gameEvent->StopEvent();
120 }
121
122 // Clear game events
123 sGameEventMgr.mGameEvents.clear();
124
125 // Reload events from DB
126 sGameEventMgr.LoadFromDB();
127

129 return true;

83{
84 uint32_t eventid = atoi(args);

88 return false;

95 {

98 gameEvent->SetState(GAMEEVENT_ACTIVE);
99 else
100 gameEvent->SetState(GAMEEVENT_INACTIVE);
101 return true;

106 return false;

◆ HandleGetInstanceInfoCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGetInstanceInfoCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 81 of file InstanceCommands.cpp.

82{
83 Player* plr = m_session->GetPlayer();
84 if (plr == nullptr)
85 return false;
86
87 bool userInput = true;
88 uint32_t instanceId = (args ? atoi(args) : 0);
89 if (instanceId == 0)
90 {
91 userInput = false;
92 instanceId = plr->GetInstanceID();
93 if (instanceId == 0)
94 return false;
95 }
96
97 InstanceMap* instance = sMapMgr.findInstanceMap(instanceId);
98 if (instance == nullptr)
99 {
100 if (userInput)
101 {
102 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Instance with id {} not found.", instanceId);
103 return true;
104 }
105 return false;
106 }
107
108 InstanceSaved* save = sInstanceMgr.getInstanceSave(instanceId);
109
110 std::stringstream ss;
111 ss << "Instance ID: " << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << instance->getInstanceId() << "|r (" << MSG_COLOR_CYAN;
112 if (instance->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo() == nullptr)
113 ss << instance->getBaseMap()->getMapId();
114 else
115 ss << instance->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo()->name;
116 ss << "|r)\n";
117 ss << "Persistent: " << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << (save->canReset() ? "No" : "Yes") << "|r\n";
118 if (instance->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo() != nullptr)
119 {
120 ss << "Type: " << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << GetMapTypeString(static_cast<uint8_t>(instance->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo()->type)) << "|r";
121
122 if (instance->getBaseMap()->getMapInfo()->isMultimodeDungeon())
123 {
124 ss << " (" << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << GetDifficultyString(instance->getDifficulty()) << "|r)";
125 }
126
127 if (instance->getBaseMap()->isRaid())
128 {
129 ss << " (" << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << GetRaidDifficultyString(instance->getDifficulty()) << "|r)";
130 }
131
132 ss << "\n";
133 }
134 //ss << "Created: " << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << Util::GetDateTimeStringFromTimeStamp(0) << "|r\n";
135 if (save->getResetTime() != 0)
136 ss << "Expires: " << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << Util::GetDateTimeStringFromTimeStamp((uint32_t)save->getResetTime()) << "|r\n";
137
138 if (instance == nullptr)
139 {
140 ss << "Status: " << MSG_COLOR_LIGHTRED << "Shut Down|r\n";
141 }
142 else if (!instance->hasPlayers())
143 {
144 /*ss << "Status: " << MSG_COLOR_LIGHTRED << "Idle|r";
145 if (instance->m_mapMgr->InactiveMoveTime && !instance->m_mapMgr->GetMapInfo()->isNonInstanceMap())
146 ss << " (" << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << "Shutdown in " << MSG_COLOR_LIGHTRED << (((long)instance->m_mapMgr->InactiveMoveTime - UNIXTIME) / 60) << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << " minutes|r)";
147 ss << "\n";*/
148 }
149 else
150 {
151 ss << "Status: " << MSG_COLOR_GREEN << "In use|r (" << MSG_COLOR_GREEN << instance->getPlayerCount() << MSG_COLOR_CYAN << " players inside|r)\n";
152
153 }
154 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, ss.str().c_str());
155
156 if (instance != nullptr && instance->getScript() != nullptr)
157 plr->displayDataStateList();
158 else
159 plr->broadcastMessage("NO INSTANCE SCRIPT FOUND NO BOSS DATA AVAILABLE");
160
161 return true;
162}
