151{
152 bool print_headline = true;
153
154 bool is_gamemaster = m_session->hasPermissions();
155
156 std::lock_guard guard(sObjectMgr.m_playerLock);
157 for (const auto playerPair : sObjectMgr.getPlayerStorage())
158 {
159 Player* player = playerPair.second;
160 if (player->getSession()->hasPermissions())
161 {
162 if (!worldConfig.gm.listOnlyActiveGms)
163 {
164 if (print_headline)
165 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "The following GMs are on this server:");
166
167 if (worldConfig.gm.hidePermissions && !is_gamemaster)
168 systemMessage(m_session, " - {}", player->getName());
169 else
170 systemMessage(m_session, " - {} [{}]", player->getName(), player->getSession()->GetPermissions().get());
171
172 print_headline = false;
173 }
174 else if (worldConfig.gm.listOnlyActiveGms && player->isGMFlagSet())
175 {
176 if (player->isGMFlagSet())
177 {
178 if (print_headline)
179 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "The following GMs are active on this server:");
180
181 if (worldConfig.gm.hidePermissions && !is_gamemaster)
182 systemMessage(m_session, " - {}", player->getName());
183 else
184 systemMessage(m_session, " - {} [{}]", player->getName(), player->getSession()->GetPermissions().get());
185
186 print_headline = false;
187 }
188 else
189 {
190 systemMessage(m_session, "No GMs are currently logged in on this server.");
191 print_headline = false;
192 }
193 }
194 }
195 }
196
197 if (print_headline)
198 {
199 if (!worldConfig.gm.listOnlyActiveGms)
200 systemMessage(m_session, "No GMs are currently logged in on this server.");
201 else
202 systemMessage(m_session, "No GMs are currently active on this server.");
203 }
204
205 return true;
206}

◆ HandleGMTicketAssignToCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGMTicketAssignToCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 307 of file GMTicketCommands.cpp.

308{
309 uint64_t ticketGuid;
310 char guidString[100], name[100];
311 int argc = sscanf(args, "%s %s", guidString, name);
312 if (argc < 1 || argc > 2)
313 return false;
314
315 ticketGuid = atoi(guidString);
316 if (!ticketGuid)
317 {
318 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify a ticket id.");
319 return true;
320 }
321
322 Player* cplr = m_session->GetPlayer();
323 Channel* chn = sChannelMgr.getChannel(sWorld.getGmClientChannel(), cplr);
324 if (!chn)
325 return false;
326
327 GM_Ticket* ticket = sTicketMgr.getGMTicket(ticketGuid);
328
329 if (ticket == nullptr || ticket->deleted)
330 {
331 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket not found.", cplr, true);
332 return true;
333 }
334
335 Player* mplr = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer((uint32_t)ticket->playerGuid);
336 Player* plr = (argc == 1 ? cplr : sObjectMgr.GetPlayer(name, false));
337 if (plr == nullptr)
338 {
339 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Player not found.", cplr, true);
340 return true;
341 }
342
343 if (!plr->IsInWorld())
344 {
345 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Player isn't online.", cplr, true);
346 return true;
347 }
348
349 if (!plr->getSession()->HasGMPermissions())
350 {
351 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Player is not a GM.", cplr, true);
352 return true;
353 }
354
355 if (ticket->assignedToPlayer == plr->getGuid())
356 {
357 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket already assigned to this GM.", cplr, true);
358 return true;
359 }
360
361 if (ticket->assignedToPlayer != 0 && ticket->assignedToPlayer != cplr->getGuid())
362 {
363 Player* aplr = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer((uint32_t)ticket->assignedToPlayer);
364 if (aplr != nullptr && aplr->IsInWorld() && !cplr->getSession()->CanUseCommand('z'))
365 {
366 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket already assigned to another GM.", cplr, true);
367 return true;
368 }
369 }
370
371 ticket->assignedToPlayer = plr->getGuid();
372 sTicketMgr.updateGMTicket(ticket);
373
374 std::stringstream ss;
375 ss << "GmTicket:" << GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_ASSIGNED;
376 ss << ":" << ticket->guid;
377 ss << ":" << plr->GetName();
378 chn->say(cplr, ss.str().c_str(), nullptr, true);
379 //Send Response Packet to update Ticket
380 //WorldPacket data(SMSG_GMTICKET_GETTICKET, 400);
381 //data << uint32_t(6); // Packet Status
382 //data << uint8_t(0x7);//static Category
383 //data << ticket->message.c_str();//ticketDescription
384 //data << float(0.0);//ticketAge - days //update time = last time ticket was modified?
385 //data << float(0.0);//oldestTicketTime - days
386 //data << float(0.0);//updateTime - days | How recent is the data for oldest ticket time, measured in days. If this number 1 hour, we have bad data.
387 //data << unit64(2);//assignedToGM |0 - ticket is not currently assigned to a gm | 1 - ticket is assigned to a normal gm | 2 - ticket is in the escalation queue
388 //data << uint64_t(1);//openedByGM | 0 - ticket has never been opened by a gm | 1 - ticket has been opened by a gm
389 //mplr->getSession()->sendPacket(&data);
390 systemMessage(mplr->getSession(), "SYSTEM: Your ticket has been escalated. A Senior Game Master will be with you shortly!");
391 return true;
392}

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGMTicketCommentCommand ( const char *  args,

Definition at line 439 of file GMTicketCommands.cpp.

440{
441 uint64_t ticketGuid;
442 int argc = 1;
443 char* comment = nullptr;
444 char* guidString = (char*)args;
445
446 // Parse arguments
447 char* space = (char*)strchr(args, ' ');
448 if (space)
449 {
450 *space = '\0';
451 comment = space + 1;
452 argc = 2;
453 }
454
455 ticketGuid = atoi(guidString);
456 if (!ticketGuid)
457 {
458 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify a ticket id.");
459 return true;
460 }
461
462 Player* cplr = m_session->GetPlayer();
463 Channel* chn = sChannelMgr.getChannel(sWorld.getGmClientChannel(), cplr);
464 if (!chn)
465 return false;
466
467 GM_Ticket* ticket = sTicketMgr.getGMTicket(ticketGuid);
468 if (ticket == nullptr || ticket->deleted)
469 {
470 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket not found.", cplr, true);
471 return true;
472 }
473
474 if (ticket->assignedToPlayer != 0 && ticket->assignedToPlayer != cplr->getGuid() && !cplr->getSession()->CanUseCommand('z'))
475 {
476 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket is assigned to another GM.", cplr, true);
477 return true;
478 }
479
480 ticket->comment = (argc == 1 ? "" : comment);
481 sTicketMgr.updateGMTicket(ticket);
482
483 std::stringstream ss;
484 ss << "GmTicket:" << GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_COMMENT;
485 ss << ":" << ticket->guid;
486 ss << ":" << cplr->GetName();
487 ss << ":" << ticket->comment;
488 chn->say(cplr, ss.str().c_str(), nullptr, true);
489
490 return true;
491}

533 plr->getSession()->sendPacket(SmsgGmTicketDeleteTicket(9).serialise().get());

535 // Response - Send GM Survey
536 plr->getSession()->sendPacket(SmsgGmTicketStatusUpdate(3).serialise().get());
537
538 systemMessage(plr->getSession(), "You have been selected to fill out a GM Performance Survey. Please respond truthfully to the questions that you are asked and include the Game Masters name to your comment.");
539 }
540
541 return true;
542}

◆ HandleGMTicketGetByIdCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGMTicketGetByIdCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 200 of file GMTicketCommands.cpp.

201{
202 uint64_t ticketGuid = (args ? atoi(args) : 0);
203 if (!ticketGuid)
204 {
205 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify a ticket id.");
206 return true;
207 }
208
209 Player* cplr = m_session->GetPlayer();
210 Channel* chn = sChannelMgr.getChannel(sWorld.getGmClientChannel(), cplr);
211 if (!chn)
212 return false;
213
214 GM_Ticket* ticket = sTicketMgr.getGMTicket(ticketGuid);
215 if (ticket == nullptr || ticket->deleted)
216 {
217 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket not found.", cplr, true);
218 return true;
219 }
220
221 auto msg = std::make_unique<char[]>(ticket->message.size() + 1);
222 strcpy(msg.get(), ticket->message.c_str());
223 char* start = msg.get(), *end;
224 bool firstLine = true;
225 for (;;)
226 {
227 end = strchr(start, '\n');
228 if (!end)
229 break;
230
231 *end = '\0';
232
233 std::stringstream ss;
234 ss << "GmTicket:" << (firstLine ? GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_CONTENT : GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_APPENDCONTENT);
235 ss << ":" << ticket->guid;
236 ss << ":" << start;
237 chn->say(cplr, ss.str().c_str(), cplr, true);
238
239 firstLine = false;
240
241 start = end + 1;
242 }
243 if (*start != '\0')
244 {
245 std::stringstream ss;
246 ss << "GmTicket:" << (firstLine ? GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_CONTENT : GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_APPENDCONTENT);
247 ss << ":" << ticket->guid;
248 ss << ":" << start;
249 chn->say(cplr, ss.str().c_str(), cplr, true);
250 }
251
252 return true;
253}

◆ HandleGMTicketListCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGMTicketListCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 158 of file GMTicketCommands.cpp.

159{
160 Player* cplr = m_session->GetPlayer();
161
162 Channel* chn = sChannelMgr.getChannel(sWorld.getGmClientChannel(), cplr);
163 if (!chn)
164 return false;
165
166 std::stringstream ss0;
167 ss0 << "GmTicket:" << GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_LISTSTART;
168 chn->say(cplr, ss0.str().c_str(), cplr, true);
169
170 for (GmTicketList::iterator itr = sTicketMgr.m_ticketList.begin(); itr != sTicketMgr.m_ticketList.end(); itr++)
171 {
172 if ((*itr)->deleted)
173 continue;
174
175 Player* plr = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer((uint32_t)(*itr)->playerGuid);
176
177 Player* aplr = nullptr;
178 CachedCharacterInfo const* aplri = nullptr;
179 if ((*itr)->assignedToPlayer != 0)
180 {
181 aplr = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer((uint32_t)(*itr)->assignedToPlayer);
182 if (aplr == nullptr)
183 aplri = sObjectMgr.getCachedCharacterInfo((uint32_t)(*itr)->assignedToPlayer)
184 }
185
186 std::stringstream ss;
187 ss << "GmTicket:" << GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_LISTENTRY;
188 ss << ":" << (*itr)->guid;
189 ss << ":" << (plr == nullptr ? (*itr)->level : plr->getLevel());
190 ss << ":" << (plr == nullptr ? 0 : plr->IsInWorld());
191 ss << ":" << (aplr == nullptr ? (aplri == nullptr ? "" : aplri->name) : aplr->GetName());
192 ss << ":" << (plr == nullptr ? (*itr)->name : plr->GetName());
193 ss << ":" << (*itr)->comment;
194 chn->say(cplr, ss.str().c_str(), cplr, true);
195 }
196
197 return true;
198}

◆ HandleGMTicketReleaseCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGMTicketReleaseCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 394 of file GMTicketCommands.cpp.

395{
396 uint64_t ticketGuid = (args ? atoi(args) : 0);
397 if (!ticketGuid)
398 {
399 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify a ticket id.");
400 return true;
401 }
402
403 Player* cplr = m_session->GetPlayer();
404 Channel* chn = sChannelMgr.getChannel(sWorld.getGmClientChannel(), cplr);
405 if (!chn)
406 return false;
407
408 GM_Ticket* ticket = sTicketMgr.getGMTicket(ticketGuid);
409 if (ticket == nullptr || ticket->deleted)
410 {
411 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket not found.", cplr, true);
412 return true;
413 }
414
415 if (ticket->assignedToPlayer == 0)
416 {
417 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket not assigned to a GM.", cplr, true);
418 return true;
419 }
420
421 Player* plr = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer((uint32_t)ticket->assignedToPlayer);
422 if (!cplr->getSession()->CanUseCommand('z') && plr != nullptr && plr->IsInWorld() && plr->getSession()->CanUseCommand('z'))
423 {
424 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:You can not release tickets from Senior Game Masters.", cplr, true);
425 return true;
426 }
427
428 ticket->assignedToPlayer = 0;
429 sTicketMgr.updateGMTicket(ticket);
430
431 std::stringstream ss;
432 ss << "GmTicket:" << GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_RELEASED;
433 ss << ":" << ticket->guid;
434 chn->say(cplr, ss.str().c_str(), nullptr, true);
435
436 return true;
437}

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGMTicketRemoveByIdCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 255 of file GMTicketCommands.cpp.

256{
257 uint64_t ticketGuid = (args ? atoi(args) : 0);
258 if (!ticketGuid)
259 {
260 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify a ticket id.");
261 return true;
262 }
263
264 Player* cplr = m_session->GetPlayer();
265 Channel* chn = sChannelMgr.getChannel(sWorld.getGmClientChannel(), cplr);
266 if (!chn)
267 return false;
268
269 GM_Ticket* ticket = sTicketMgr.getGMTicket(ticketGuid);
270 if (ticket == nullptr || ticket->deleted)
271 {
272 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket not found.", cplr, true);
273 return true;
274 }
275
276 if (ticket->assignedToPlayer != 0 && ticket->assignedToPlayer != cplr->getGuid() && !cplr->getSession()->CanUseCommand('z'))
277 {
278 chn->say(cplr, "GmTicket:0:Ticket is assigned to another GM.", cplr, true);
279 return true;
280 }
281
282 Player* plr = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer((uint32_t)ticket->playerGuid);
283
284 std::stringstream ss;
285 ss << "GmTicket:" << GM_TICKET_CHAT_OPCODE_REMOVED;
286 ss << ":" << ticket->guid;
287 chn->say(cplr, ss.str().c_str(), nullptr, true);
288
289 sTicketMgr.removeGMTicket(ticket->guid);
290
291 if (!plr)
292 return true;
293 if (!plr->IsInWorld())
294 return true;
295
296 // Notify player about removing ticket
297 plr->getSession()->sendPacket(SmsgGmTicketDeleteTicket(9).serialise().get());
298
299 // Response - Send GM Survey
300 plr->getSession()->sendPacket(SmsgGmTicketStatusUpdate(3).serialise().get());
301
302 systemMessage(plr->getSession(), "You have been selected to fill out a GM Performance Survey. Please respond truthfully to the questions that you are asked and include the Game Masters name to your comment.");
303 return true;
304}

346 uint32_t spawn_id;

348 {
349 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be in format: .gocreature <creature_spawnid>.");
350 return true;
351 }

360 return true;
361 }
362 }
363 }

◆ HandleGODamageCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGODamageCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  session 
)

Definition at line 20 of file GameObjectCommands.cpp.

21{
22 uint32_t damage = 0;
23 uint32_t spellid = 0;
24
25 if (sscanf(args, "%u %u", &damage, &spellid) < 1)
26 {
27 if (damage == 0)
28 {
29 redSystemMessage(session, "You need to specify how much you want to damage the selected GO!");
30 return true;
31 }
32 }
33
34 auto gameobject = session->GetPlayer()->getSelectedGo();
35 if (gameobject == nullptr)
36 {
37 redSystemMessage(session, "You need to select a GO first!");
38 return true;
39 }
40
41 if (gameobject->GetGameObjectProperties()->type != GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DESTRUCTIBLE_BUILDING)
42 {
43 redSystemMessage(session, "The selected GO must be a destructible building!");
44 return true;
45 }
46
47 if (spellid == 0)
48 spellid = 57609;
49
50 GameObject_Destructible* dgo = static_cast<GameObject_Destructible*>(gameobject);
51 if (dgo->GetHP() == 0)
52 {
53 redSystemMessage(session, "Cannot further damage a destroyed GameObject");
54 return true;
55 }
56
57 uint64_t guid = session->GetPlayer()->getGuid();
58 dgo->Damage(damage, guid, 0, spellid);
59
60 greenSystemMessage(session, "GameObject has been damaged for {} hitpoints", damage);
61 greenSystemMessage(session, "New hitpoints {}", dgo->GetHP());
62
63 return true;
64}

◆ HandleGODeleteCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGODeleteCommand ( const char *  ,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 67 of file GameObjectCommands.cpp.

68{
69 GameObject* selected_gobject = m_session->GetPlayer()->getSelectedGo();
70 if (selected_gobject == nullptr)
71 {
72 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No selected GameObject...");
73 return true;
74 }
75
76 if (selected_gobject->IsInBg())
77 {
78 redSystemMessage(m_session, "GameObjects can't be deleted in Battlegrounds");
79 return true;
80 }
81
82 if (selected_gobject->m_spawn != nullptr && selected_gobject->m_spawn->entry == selected_gobject->getEntry())
83 {
84 uint32_t cellx = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxX - selected_gobject->m_spawn->spawnPoint.x) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
85 uint32_t celly = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxY - selected_gobject->m_spawn->spawnPoint.y) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
86
87 if (cellx < Map::Cell::_sizeX && celly < Map::Cell::_sizeY)
88 {
89 CellSpawns* cell_spawns = selected_gobject->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getSpawnsList(cellx, celly);
90 if (cell_spawns != nullptr)
91 {
92 for (GameobjectSpawnList::iterator itr = cell_spawns->GameobjectSpawns.begin(); itr != cell_spawns->GameobjectSpawns.end(); ++itr)
93 {
94 if ((*itr) == selected_gobject->m_spawn)
95 {
96 cell_spawns->GameobjectSpawns.erase(itr);
97 break;
98 }
99 }
100 }
101
102 selected_gobject->deleteFromDB();
103
104 delete selected_gobject->m_spawn;
105 selected_gobject->m_spawn = nullptr;
106 }
107 }
108 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "deleted game object entry %u on map %u at X:%f Y:%f Z:%f Name %s", selected_gobject->getEntry(),
109 selected_gobject->GetMapId(), selected_gobject->GetPositionX(), selected_gobject->GetPositionY(), selected_gobject->GetPositionZ(),
110 sMySQLStore.getGameObjectProperties(selected_gobject->getEntry())->name.c_str());
111 selected_gobject->despawn(0, 0);
112
113 m_session->GetPlayer()->setSelectedGo(0);
114
115 return true;
116}

120{

175{

256 break;
257 case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_AUCTIONHOUSE:
258 gotypetxt = "Auction House";
259 break;
260 case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_GUARDPOST:
261 gotypetxt = "Guard Post";
262 break;
263 case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_SPELLCASTER:

265 break;
266 case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_MEETINGSTONE:

274 break;
275 case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FLAGDROP:
276 gotypetxt = "Flag Drop";
277 break;
278 case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DESTRUCTIBLE_BUILDING:
279 gotypetxt = "Destructible Building";
280 break;
281 default:
282 gotypetxt = "Unknown.";
283 break;
284 }
285 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Type:{}{} -- {}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->getGoType(), gotypetxt);
286
287 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Distance:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->CalcDistance(m_session->GetPlayer()));
288
289 GameObjectProperties const* gameobject_info = sMySQLStore.getGameObjectProperties(gameobject->getEntry());
290 if (!gameobject_info)
291 {
292 redSystemMessage(m_session, "This GameObject doesn't have template, you won't be able to get some information nor to spawn a GO with this entry.");
293 return true;
294 }
295
296
297 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Name:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject_info->name);
298

300 systemMessage(m_session, "{} X:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->GetPositionX());
301 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Y:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->GetPositionY());
302 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Z:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->GetPositionZ());
303 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Orientation:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->GetOrientation());
304 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Rotation 0:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->getParentRotation(0));
305 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Rotation 1:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->getParentRotation(1));
306 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Rotation 2:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->getParentRotation(2));
307 systemMessage(m_session, "{} Rotation 3:{}{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, gameobject->getParentRotation(3));
308
309 GameObject_Destructible* dgo = dynamic_cast<GameObject_Destructible*>(gameobject);
310 if (gameobject_info->type == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DESTRUCTIBLE_BUILDING)
311 {
312 systemMessage(m_session, "{} HP:{}{}/{}", MSG_COLOR_GREEN, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, dgo->GetHP(), dgo->GetMaxHP());
313 }
314
315 systemMessage(m_session, "=================================");
316
317 if (gameobject->m_spawn != nullptr)
318 systemMessage(m_session, "Is part of table: {}", gameobject->m_spawn->origine);
319 else
320 systemMessage(m_session, "Is spawnd by an internal script");
321
322 return true;
323}

327{
328 auto gameobject = m_session->GetPlayer()->getSelectedGo();
329 if (gameobject == nullptr)
330 {
331 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No selected GameObject!");
332 return true;
333 }
334
335 float position_x = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionX();
336 float position_y = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionY();
337 float position_z = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionZ();
338 float position_o = gameobject->GetOrientation();
339
340 gameobject->SetPosition(position_x, position_y, position_z, position_o);
341 auto go_spawn = gameobject->m_spawn;
342
343 if (go_spawn == nullptr)
344 {
345 redSystemMessage(m_session, "The GameObject is not a spawn to save the data.");
346 return true;
347 }
348
349 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Position changed in gameobject_spawns table for spawn ID: {}.", go_spawn->id);
350 WorldDatabase.Execute("UPDATE gameobject_spawns SET position_x = %f, position_y = %f, position_z = %f WHERE id = %u AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u", position_x, position_y, position_z, go_spawn->id, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
351 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "changed gameobject position of gameobject_spawns ID: %u.", go_spawn->id);
352
353 uint32_t new_go_guid = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->generateGameobjectGuid();
354 gameobject->RemoveFromWorld(true);
355 gameobject->SetNewGuid(new_go_guid);
356 gameobject->PushToWorld(m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap());
357
358 m_session->GetPlayer()->setSelectedGo(new_go_guid);
359
360 return true;
361}

389{
390 auto gameobject = session->GetPlayer()->getSelectedGo();

394 return true;
395 }
396

398 {

404

◆ HandleGORotateCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGORotateCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 416 of file GameObjectCommands.cpp.

417{
418 char Axis;
419 float deg;
420 if (sscanf(args, "%c %f", &Axis, &deg) < 1)
421 return false;
422
423 GameObject* go = m_session->GetPlayer()->getSelectedGo();
424 if (!go)
425 {
426 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No selected GameObject...");
427 return true;
428 }
429
430 float rotation_x = m_session->GetPlayer()->m_goLastXRotation;
431 float rotation_y = m_session->GetPlayer()->m_goLastYRotation;
432 float orientation = go->GetOrientation();
433
434 switch (tolower(Axis))
435 {
436 case 'x':
437 go->setLocalRotationAngles(orientation, rotation_y, deg);
438 m_session->GetPlayer()->m_goLastXRotation = deg;
439 break;
440 case 'y':
441 go->setLocalRotationAngles(orientation, deg, rotation_x);
442 m_session->GetPlayer()->m_goLastYRotation = deg;
443 break;
444 case 'o':
445 go->SetOrientation(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetOrientation());
446 go->setLocalRotationAngles(go->GetOrientation(), rotation_y, rotation_x);
447 break;
448 default:
449 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid Axis, Please use x, y, or o.");
450 return true;
451 }
452
453 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Gameobject spawn id: {} rotated", go->m_spawn->id);
454
455 uint32_t NewGuid = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->generateGameobjectGuid();
456 go->RemoveFromWorld(true);
457 go->SetNewGuid(NewGuid);
458 go->PushToWorld(m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap());
459 go->saveToDB();
460
461 m_session->GetPlayer()->setSelectedGo(NewGuid);
462 return true;
463}

◆ HandleGOSelectCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGOSelectCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 466 of file GameObjectCommands.cpp.

467{
468 GameObject* GObj = nullptr;
469 GameObject* GObjs = m_session->GetPlayer()->getSelectedGo();
470
471 float cDist = 9999.0f;
472 float nDist = 0.0f;
473 bool bUseNext = false;
474
475 if (args)
476 {
477 if (args[0] == '1')
478 {
479 if (GObjs == nullptr)
480 bUseNext = true;
481
482 for (const auto& Itr : m_session->GetPlayer()->getInRangeObjectsSet())
483 {
484 if (Itr && Itr->isGameObject() && Itr->GetPhase() == m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPhase())
485 {
486 // Find the current go, move to the next one
487 if (bUseNext)
488 {
489 // Select the first.
490 GObj = static_cast<GameObject*>(Itr);
491 break;
492 }
493
494 if (Itr == GObjs)
495 {
496 // Found him. Move to the next one, or beginning if we're at the end
497 bUseNext = true;
498 }
499 }
500 }
501 }
502 }
503 if (!GObj)
504 {
505 for (const auto& Itr : m_session->GetPlayer()->getInRangeObjectsSet())
506 {
507 if (Itr && Itr->isGameObject() && Itr->GetPhase() == m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPhase())
508 {
509 if ((nDist = m_session->GetPlayer()->CalcDistance(Itr)) < cDist)
510 {
511 cDist = nDist;
512 nDist = 0.0f;
513 GObj = static_cast<GameObject*>(Itr);
514 }
515 }
516 }
517 }
518
519
520 if (GObj == nullptr)
521 {
522 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No inrange GameObject found.");
523 return true;
524 }
525
526 m_session->GetPlayer()->setSelectedGo(GObj->getGuid());
527
528 //reset last rotation values on selecting a new go.
529 m_session->GetPlayer()->m_goLastXRotation = 0.0f;
530 m_session->GetPlayer()->m_goLastYRotation = 0.0f;
531
532 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Selected GameObject [ {} ] which is {} meters away from you.",
533 sMySQLStore.getGameObjectProperties(GObj->getEntry())->name, m_session->GetPlayer()->CalcDistance(GObj));
534
535 return true;
536}

uint32_t GetPhase() const
Definition Object.hpp:636

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGOSpawnCommand ( const char *  args,

)

563{
564 uint32_t go_entry = 0;
565 if (sscanf(args, "%u", &go_entry) < 1)
566 {
567 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Wrong Syntax! Use: .gobject spawn <entry>");
568 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Use: .gobject spawn <entry>");
569 return true;
570 }
571
572 auto gameobject_prop = sMySQLStore.getGameObjectProperties(go_entry);
573 if (gameobject_prop == nullptr)
574 {
575 redSystemMessage(m_session, "GameObject entry {} is a invalid entry!", go_entry);
576 return true;
577 }
578
579 auto player = m_session->GetPlayer();
580 auto gameobject = player->getWorldMap()->createAndSpawnGameObject(go_entry, player->GetPosition());
581
582 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Spawning GameObject by entry '{}'. Added to gameobject_spawns table.", gameobject->getSpawnId());
583 gameobject->saveToDB(true);
584 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "spawned gameobject %s, entry %u at %u %f %f %f", gameobject_prop->name.c_str(), gameobject->getEntry(), player->GetMapId(), gameobject->GetPositionX(), gameobject->GetPositionY(), gameobject->GetPositionZ());
585
586 m_session->GetPlayer()->setSelectedGo(gameobject->getGuid());
587
588 return true;
589}

◆ HandleGoStartLocationCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGoStartLocationCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 396 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

397{
398 auto player_target = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
399 if (player_target == nullptr)
400 return true;
401
402 std::string race;
403 uint8_t raceid = 0;
404 uint8_t classid = 0;
405
406 if (strlen(args) > 0)
407 {
408 race = args;
409 if (race == "human")
410 raceid = 1;
411 else if (race == "orc")
412 raceid = 2;
413 else if (race == "dwarf")
414 raceid = 3;
415 else if (race == "nightelf")
416 raceid = 4;
417 else if (race == "undead")
418 raceid = 5;
419 else if (race == "tauren")
420 raceid = 6;
421 else if (race == "gnome")
422 raceid = 7;
423 else if (race == "troll")
424 raceid = 8;
425#if VERSION_STRING >= Cata
426 else if (race == "goblin")
427 raceid = 9;
428#endif
429 else if (race == "bloodelf")
430 raceid = 10;
431 else if (race == "draenei")
432 raceid = 11;
433 else if (race == "deathknight")
434 classid = 6;
435#if VERSION_STRING >= Cata
436 else if (race == "worgen")
437 raceid = 22;
438#endif
439 else
440 {
441#if VERSION_STRING >= Cata
442 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid start location! Valid locations are: human, dwarf, gnome, nightelf, draenei, orc, troll, goblin, tauren, undead, bloodelf, worgen, deathknight");
443#else
444 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid start location! Valid locations are: human, dwarf, gnome, nightelf, draenei, orc, troll, tauren, undead, bloodelf, deathknight");
445#endif
446 return true;
447 }
448 }
449 else
450 {
451 raceid = player_target->getRace();
452 classid = player_target->getClass();
453 race = "own";
454 }
455
456 PlayerCreateInfo const* player_info = nullptr;
457 for (uint8_t i = 1; i <= 11; ++i)
458 {
459 player_info = sMySQLStore.getPlayerCreateInfo((raceid ? raceid : i), (classid ? classid : i));
460 if (player_info != nullptr)
461 break;
462 }
463
464 if (player_info == nullptr)
465 {
466 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Internal error: Could not find create info for race {} and class {}.", raceid, classid);
467 return false;
468 }
469
470 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Teleporting {} to {} starting location.", player_target->getName(), race);
471
472 player_target->safeTeleport(player_info->mapId, 0, LocationVector(player_info->positionX, player_info->positionY, player_info->positionZ));
473 return true;
474}
PlayerCreateInfo
Definition PlayerDefines.hpp:1003

483 {
484 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be at least in format: .gotrig <trigger_id>.");
485 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You can use: .gotrig <trigger_id> <instance_id>");
486 return true;

491 {

493 return true;
494 }

◆ HandleGPSCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleGPSCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 779 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

780{
781 Object* obj;
782 uint64_t guid = m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid();
783 if (guid != 0)
784 {
785 if ((obj = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getUnit(guid)) == 0)
786 {
787 systemMessage(m_session, "You should select a character or a creature.");
788 return true;
789 }
790 }
791 else
792 obj = m_session->GetPlayer();
793
794 auto at = obj->GetArea();
795 if (!at)
796 {
797 systemMessage(m_session, "Current Position: Map:{} X:{} Y:{} Z:{} Orientation:{}", obj->GetMapId(), obj->GetPositionX(), obj->GetPositionY(), obj->GetPositionZ(), obj->GetOrientation());
798 return true;
799 }
800
801 auto out_map_id = obj->GetMapId();
802 auto out_zone_id = at->zone; // uint32_t at_old->ZoneId
803 auto out_area_id = at->id; // uint32_t at_old->AreaId
804 auto out_phase = obj->GetPhase();
805 auto out_x = obj->GetPositionX();
806 auto out_y = obj->GetPositionY();
807 auto out_z = obj->GetPositionZ();
808 auto out_o = obj->GetOrientation();
809#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
810 auto out_area_name = at->area_name[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()];
811#else
812 auto out_area_name = at->area_name[0];
813#endif
814
815 systemMessage(m_session, "Current Position: Map:{} Zone:{} Area:{} Phase:{} X:{} Y:{} Z:{} Orientation:{} Area Name: {}",
816 out_map_id, out_zone_id, out_area_id, out_phase, out_x, out_y, out_z, out_o, out_area_name);
817
818#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
819 if (obj->obj_movement_info.hasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_TRANSPORT))
820 {
821 systemMessage(m_session, "Position on Transport:");
822 systemMessage(m_session, " tX: {} tY: {} tZ: {} tO: {}", obj->GetTransOffsetX(), obj->GetTransOffsetY(), obj->GetTransOffsetZ(), obj->GetTransOffsetO());
823 }
824#endif
825
826 // ".gps 1" will save gps info to file logs/gps.log - This probably isn't very multithread safe so don't have many gms spamming it!
827 if (args != nullptr && *args == '1')
828 {
829 FILE* gpslog = fopen(AscEmu::Logging::getFormattedFileName("logs", "gps", false).c_str(), "at");
830 if (gpslog)
831 {
832 fprintf(gpslog, "%d, %u, %u, %f, %f, %f, %f, \'%s\'", out_map_id, out_zone_id, out_area_id, out_x, out_y, out_z, out_o, out_area_name);
833 // ".gps 1 comment" will save comment after the gps data
834 if (*(args + 1) == ' ')
835 fprintf(gpslog, ",%s\n", args + 2);
836 else
837 fprintf(gpslog, "\n");
838 fclose(gpslog);
839 }
840 }
841 return true;
842}

54 return true;

59 return true;

◆ HandleIPBanCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleIPBanCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1402 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

1403{
1404 char* pIp = (char*)args;
1405 char* pReason;
1406 char* pDuration;
1407 ParseBanArgs(pIp, &pDuration, &pReason);
1408
1409 uint32_t timeperiod = 0;
1410 if (pDuration != nullptr)
1411 {
1412 timeperiod = Util::GetTimePeriodFromString(pDuration);
1413 if (timeperiod == 0)
1414 return false;
1415 }
1416
1417 uint32_t o1, o2, o3, o4;
1418 if (sscanf(pIp, "%3u.%3u.%3u.%3u", &o1, &o2, &o3, &o4) != 4
1419 || o1 > 255 || o2 > 255 || o3 > 255 || o4 > 255)
1420 {
1421 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid IPv4 address [{}]", pIp);
1422 return true; // error in syntax, but we wont remind client of command usage
1423 }
1424
1425 time_t expire_time;
1426
1427 if (timeperiod == 0) // permanent ban
1428 expire_time = 0;
1429 else
1430 expire_time = UNIXTIME + (time_t)timeperiod;
1431
1432 std::string IP = pIp;
1433 std::string::size_type i = IP.find("/");
1434
1435 if (i == std::string::npos)
1436 {
1437 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Lack of CIDR address assumes a 32bit match (if you don't understand, don't worry, it worked)");
1438 IP.append("/32");
1439 }
1440
1441 const std::string reason = pReason;
1442
1443 systemMessage(m_session, "Adding [{}] to IP ban table, expires {}. Reason is: {}", pIp, (expire_time == 0) ? "Never" : ctime(&expire_time), reason);
1444 sLogonCommHandler.addIpBan(IP.c_str(), (uint32_t)expire_time, reason.c_str());
1445 sWorld.disconnectSessionByIp(IP.substr(0, IP.find("/")), m_session);
1446 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "banned ip address %s, expires %s", pIp, (expire_time == 0) ? "Never" : ctime(&expire_time));
1447
1448 return true;
1449}
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ HandleIPUnBanCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleIPUnBanCommand ( const char *  args,

)

Definition at line 1319 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

1320{
1321 std::string pIp = args;
1322 if (pIp.length() == 0)
1323 return false;
1324
1325 if (pIp.find("/") == std::string::npos)
1326 {
1327 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Lack of CIDR address assumes a 32bit match (if you don't understand, don't worry, it worked)");
1328 pIp.append("/32");
1329 }
1330
1331 systemMessage(m_session, "Deleting [{}] from ip ban table if it exists", pIp);
1332 sLogonCommHandler.removeIpBan(pIp.c_str());
1333 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "unbanned ip address %s", pIp.c_str());

666 redSystemMessage(m_session, "A player name is required!");
667 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Usage: .kick player <player_name>");
668 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Optional: .kick player <player_name> <reason>");
669 return true;
670 }
671
672 char* player_name = strtok((char*)args, " ");
673 auto player_target = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(player_name, false);
674 if (player_target != nullptr)
675 {
676 char* reason = strtok(nullptr, "\n");
677 std::string kickreason = "No reason";
678
679 if (reason)
680 kickreason = reason;
681
682 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Attempting to kick {} from the server for '{}'.", player_target->getName(), kickreason);
683 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "Kicked player %s from the server for %s", player_target->getName().c_str(), kickreason.c_str());
684
685 if (!m_session->CanUseCommand('z') && player_target->getSession()->CanUseCommand('z'))
686 {
687 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You cannot kick {}, a GM whose permissions outrank yours.", player_target->getName());
688 return true;
689 }
690
691 if (worldConfig.gm.worldAnnounceOnKickPlayer)
692 {
693 std::stringstream worldAnnounce;
694 worldAnnounce << MSG_COLOR_RED << "GM: " << player_target->getName().c_str() << " was kicked from the server by " << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str() << ". Reason: " << kickreason;
695 sWorld.sendMessageToAll(worldAnnounce.str(), nullptr);
696 }
697
698 systemMessage(player_target->getSession(), "You are being kicked from the server by {}. Reason: {}", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), kickreason);
699 player_target->kickFromServer(6000);
700 return true;
701 }
702 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player is not online at the moment.");
703
704 return true;
705}
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ HandleKillCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleKillCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 502 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

503{
504 bool is_name_set = false;
505 auto unit_target = GetSelectedUnit(m_session);
506
507 if (*args)
508 is_name_set = true;
509
510 if (is_name_set)
511 {
512 auto named_player = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(args, false);
513 if (named_player == nullptr)
514 {
515 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player {} is not online or does not exist!", args);
516 return true;
517 }
518 named_player->die(nullptr, 0, 0);
519 redSystemMessage(named_player->getSession(), "You were killed by {} with a GM command.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName());
520 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Killed player {}.", args);
521 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used kill command on Player Name: %s Guid: %s ", named_player->getName().c_str(), std::to_string(named_player->getGuid()).c_str());
522 }
523 else
524 {
525 if (unit_target != nullptr)
526 {
527 switch (unit_target->getObjectTypeId())
528 {
529 case TYPEID_UNIT:
530 {
531 auto creature = static_cast<Creature*>(unit_target);
532 auto kill_spell = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(5);
533 if (kill_spell == nullptr)
534 return true;
535
536 SpellCastTargets targets(unit_target->getGuid());
537 Spell* spell = sSpellMgr.newSpell(m_session->GetPlayer(), kill_spell, true, 0);
538 spell->prepare(&targets);
539
540 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Killed Creature {}.", creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
541 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used kill command on Creature %u [%s], spawn ID: %u", creature->getEntry(), creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), creature->spawnid);
542 break;
543 }
544 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
545 {
546 auto player = static_cast<Player*>(unit_target);
547
548 player->setHealth(0);
549 player->die(nullptr, 0, 0);
550 redSystemMessage(player->getSession(), "You were killed by {} with a GM command.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName());
551 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Killed player {}.", player->getName());
552 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used kill command on Player Name: %s Guid: %s", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str(), std::to_string(player->getGuid()).c_str());
553 break;
554 }
555 default:
556 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Something went wrong while killing a unit with this command!");
557 break;
558
559 }
560 }
561 else
562 {
563 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No selected target or player name set.");
564 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Use .kill on an selected unit (player/creature)");
565 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Use .kill <playername> to kill players");
566 return true;
567 }
568
569 }
570
571 return true;
572}

709{
710 if (!args)
711 {
712 redSystemMessage(m_session, "A account name is required!");
713 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Usage: .kick account <account_name>");
714 return true;
715 }
716
717 char* player_name = strtok((char*)args, " ");
718 auto player_target = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(player_name, false);
719 if (player_target != nullptr)
720 {
721 if (!m_session->CanUseCommand('z') && player_target->getSession()->CanUseCommand('z'))
722 {
723 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You cannot kick {}, a GM whose permissions outrank yours.", player_target->getName());
724 return true;
725 }
726
727 sWorld.disconnectSessionByAccountName(args, m_session);
728 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "kicked player with account %s", args);
729 }
730 else
731 {
732 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player is not online at the moment.");
733 }
734
735 return true;
736}

1005{

36{
37#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
38 if (!*args)
39 return false;
40
41 std::string x;
42 bool lookupname = true, lookupdesc = false, lookupcriteria = false, lookupreward = false;
43 std::string name(args, 5);
44 std::string desc(args, 5);
45 std::string criteria(args, 9);
46 std::string reward(args, 7);
47 std::string all(args, 4);
48 if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::isEqual(name, "name "))
49 {
50 x = std::string(args + 5);
51 }
52 else if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::isEqual(desc, "desc "))
53 {
54 lookupname = false;
55 lookupdesc = true;
56 x = std::string(args + 5);
57 }
58 else if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::isEqual(criteria, "criteria "))
59 {
60 lookupname = false;
61 lookupcriteria = true;

72 lookupdesc = true;
73 lookupcriteria = true;
74 lookupreward = true;
75 x = std::string(args + 4);
76 }
77 else
78 {
79 x = std::string(args);
80 }
81

83 {
84 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Your search string must be at least 4 characters long.");
85 return true;

87
88 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(x);

92 std::string y, recout;

94 snprintf(playerGUID, 17, "%llu", m_session->GetPlayer()->getGuid());
95 if (lookupname || lookupdesc || lookupreward)
96 {
97 std::set<uint32_t> foundList;
98 j = sAchievementStore.getNumRows();
99 bool foundmatch;
100 for (i = 0; i < j && numFound < 25; ++i)
101 {
102 auto achievement = sAchievementStore.lookupEntry(i);
103 if (achievement)
104 {
105 if (foundList.find(achievement->ID) != foundList.end())
106 {
107 // already listed this achievement (some achievements have multiple entries in dbc)
108 continue;
109 }
110 foundmatch = false;
111 if (lookupname)
112 {
113#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
114 y = std::string(achievement->name[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()]);
115#else
116 y = std::string(achievement->name[0]);
117#endif
118 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(y);
119 foundmatch = AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(x, y);
120 }
121 if (!foundmatch && lookupdesc)
122 {
123#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
124 y = std::string(achievement->description[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()]);
125#else
126 y = std::string(achievement->description[0]);
127#endif
128 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(y);
129 foundmatch = AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(x, y);
130 }
131 if (!foundmatch && lookupreward)
132 {
133#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
134 y = std::string(achievement->rewardName[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()]);
135#else
136 y = std::string(achievement->rewardName[0]);
137#endif
138 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(y);
139 foundmatch = AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(x, y);
140 }
141 if (!foundmatch)
142 {
143 continue;
144 }
145 foundList.insert(achievement->ID);
146 std::stringstream strm;
147 strm << achievement->ID;
148 // create achievement link
149 recout = "|cffffffffAchievement ";
150 recout += strm.str();
151 recout += ": |cfffff000|Hachievement:";
152 recout += strm.str();
153 recout += ":";
154 recout += playerGUID;
155 time_t completetime = m_session->GetPlayer()->getAchievementMgr()->getCompletedTime(achievement);
156 if (completetime)
157 {
158 // achievement is completed
159 struct tm* ct;
160 ct = localtime(&completetime);
161 strm.str("");
162 strm << ":1:" << ct->tm_mon + 1 << ":" << ct->tm_mday << ":" << ct->tm_year - 100 << ":-1:-1:-1:-1|h[";
163 recout += strm.str();
164 }
165 else
166 {
167 // achievement is not completed
168 recout += ":0:0:0:-1:0:0:0:0|h[";
169 }
170#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
171 recout += achievement->name[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()];
172#else
173 recout += achievement->name[0];
174#endif
175 if (!lookupreward)
176 {
177 recout += "]|h|r";
178 }
179 else
180 {
181 recout += "]|h |cffffffff";
182#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
183 recout += achievement->rewardName[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()];
184#else
185 recout += achievement->rewardName[0];
186#endif
187 recout += "|r";
188 }
189 strm.str("");
190 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
191 if (++numFound >= 25)
192 {
193 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results found.");
194 break;
195 }
196 }
197 } // for loop (number of rows, up to 25)
198 } // lookup name or description
199 if (lookupcriteria && numFound < 25)
200 {
201 std::set<uint32_t> foundList;
202 j = sAchievementCriteriaStore.getNumRows();
203 for (i = 0; i < j && numFound < 25; ++i)
204 {
205 auto criteria = sAchievementCriteriaStore.lookupEntry(i);
206 if (criteria)
207 {
208 if (foundList.find(criteria->ID) != foundList.end())
209 {
210 // already listed this achievement (some achievements have multiple entries in dbc)
211 continue;
212 }
213#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
214 y = std::string(criteria->name[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()]);
215#else
216 y = std::string(criteria->name[0]);
217#endif
218 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(y);
219 if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(x, y) == false)
220 {
221 continue;
222 }
223
224 foundList.insert(criteria->ID);
225 std::stringstream strm;
226 strm << criteria->ID;
227 recout = "|cffffffffCriteria ";
228 recout += strm.str();
229 recout += ": |cfffff000";
230#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
231 recout += criteria->name[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()];
232#else
233 recout += criteria->name[0];
234#endif
235 strm.str("");
236 auto achievement = sAchievementStore.lookupEntry(criteria->referredAchievement);
237 if (achievement)
238 {
239 // create achievement link
240 recout += " |cffffffffAchievement ";
241 strm << achievement->ID;
242 recout += strm.str();
243 recout += ": |cfffff000|Hachievement:";
244 recout += strm.str();
245 recout += ":";
246 recout += playerGUID;
247 time_t completetime = m_session->GetPlayer()->getAchievementMgr()->getCompletedTime(achievement);

250 // achievement is completed

252 ct = localtime(&completetime);
253 strm.str("");
254 strm << ":1:" << ct->tm_mon + 1 << ":" << ct->tm_mday << ":" << ct->tm_year - 100 << ":-1:-1:-1:-1|h[";
255 recout += strm.str();
256 }
257 else
258 {
259 // achievement is not completed
260 recout += ":0:0:0:-1:0:0:0:0|h[";

262#if VERSION_STRING < Cata

264#else

266#endif

273 recout += "]|h |cffffffff";

278#endif

281 strm.str("");

283 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());

286 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results found.");
287 break;
288 }
289 }
290 } // for loop (number of rows, up to 25)
291 } // lookup criteria

293 {
294 recout = "|cff00ccffNo matches found.";
295 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
296 }

346 break;

348 }
349 }
350 }
351

353 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No results returned. aborting.");

492{

495

498

510 y = std::string(gameobject_info->name);
511 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(y);
512 if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(x, y))
513 {
514 std::string Name;
515 std::stringstream strm;
516 strm << gameobject_info->entry;
517 strm << ", Display ";
518 strm << gameobject_info->display_id;
519 const char* objectName = gameobject_info->name.c_str();
520 recout = "|cfffff000Object ";
521 recout += strm.str();
522 recout += "|cffFFFFFF: ";
523 recout += objectName;
524 recout = recout + Name;
525 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
526
527 ++count;
528 if (count == 25 || count > 25)
529 {
530 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results returned. aborting.");
531 break;
532 }
533 }
534 }
535
536 if (count == 0)
537 {
538 recout = "|cff00ccffNo matches found.";
539 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
540 }
541
542 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Search completed in {} ms.", static_cast<uint32_t>(Util::GetTimeDifferenceToNow(startTime)));
543 return true;
544}

◆ HandleLookupQuestCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleLookupQuestCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 547 of file LookupCommands.cpp.

548{
549 if (!*args)
550 return false;
551
552 std::string search_string = std::string(args);
553 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(search_string);
554 if (search_string.length() < 4)
555 {
556 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Your search string must be at least 4 characters long.");
557 return true;
558 }
559
560 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Starting search of quests `{}`...", search_string.c_str());
561 auto startTime = Util::TimeNow();
562 std::string recout;
563 uint32_t count = 0;
564
565 MySQLDataStore::QuestPropertiesContainer const* its = sMySQLStore.getQuestPropertiesStore();
566 for (MySQLDataStore::QuestPropertiesContainer::const_iterator itr = its->begin(); itr != its->end(); ++itr)
567 {
568 QuestProperties const* quest = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(itr->second.id);
569 if (quest == nullptr)
570 continue;
571
572 std::string lower_quest_title = quest->title;
573
574 MySQLStructure::LocalesQuest const* li = (m_session->language > 0) ? sMySQLStore.getLocalizedQuest(quest->id, m_session->language) : nullptr;
575
576 std::string liName = std::string(li ? li->title : "");
577
578 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(liName);
579 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(lower_quest_title);
580
581 bool localizedFound = false;
582 if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(search_string, liName))
583 localizedFound = true;
584
585 if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(search_string, lower_quest_title) || localizedFound)
586 {
587 std::string questid = std::to_string(quest->id);
588 std::string questtitle = localizedFound ? (li ? li->title : "") : quest->title;
589 // send quest link
590 recout = questid;
591 recout += ": |cff00ccff|Hquest:";
592 recout += questid;
593 recout += ":";
594 recout += std::to_string(quest->min_level);
595 recout += "|h[";
596 recout += questtitle;
597 recout += "]|h|r";
598 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
599
600 ++count;
601 if (count == 25)
602 {
603 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results returned. aborting.");
604 break;
605 }
606 }
607 }
608
609 if (count == 0)
610 {
611 recout = "|cff00ccffNo matches found.\n\n";
612 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
613 }
614
615 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Search completed in {} ms.", static_cast<uint32_t>(Util::GetTimeDifferenceToNow(startTime)));
616
617 return true;
618}

◆ HandleLookupSkillCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleLookupSkillCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 676 of file LookupCommands.cpp.

677{
678 if (!*args)
679 return false;
680
681 std::string x = std::string(args);
682 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(x);
683 if (x.length() < 4)
684 {
685 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Your search string must be at least 4 characters long.");
686 return true;
687 }
688
689 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Starting search of skill `{}`...", x);
690 auto startTime = Util::TimeNow();
691 uint32_t count = 0;
692 for (uint32_t index = 0; index < sSkillLineStore.getNumRows(); ++index)
693 {
694 auto skill_line = sSkillLineStore.lookupEntry(index);
695 if (skill_line == nullptr)
696 continue;
697
698#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
699 std::string y = std::string(skill_line->Name[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()]);
700#else
701 std::string y = std::string(skill_line->Name[0]);
702#endif
703 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(y);
704 if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(x, y))
705 {
706#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
707 SendHighlightedName(m_session, "Skill", skill_line->Name[sWorld.getDbcLocaleLanguageId()], y, x, skill_line->id);
708#else
709 SendHighlightedName(m_session, "Skill", skill_line->Name[0], y, x, skill_line->id);
710#endif
711 ++count;
712 if (count == 25)
713 {
714 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results returned. aborting.");
715 break;
716 }
717 }
718 }
719
720 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Search completed in {} ms.", static_cast<uint32_t>(Util::GetTimeDifferenceToNow(startTime)));
721 return true;
722}

◆ HandleLookupSpellCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleLookupSpellCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 621 of file LookupCommands.cpp.

622{
623 if (!*args)
624 return false;
625
626 std::string x = std::string(args);
627 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(x);
628 if (x.length() < 4)
629 {
630 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Your search string must be at least 4 characters long.");
631 return true;
632 }
633
634 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Starting search of spell `{}`...", x);
635 auto startTime = Util::TimeNow();
636 uint32_t count = 0;
637 std::string recout;
638 char itoabuf[12];
639 for (auto it = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfoMap()->begin(); it != sSpellMgr.getSpellInfoMap()->end(); ++it)
640 {
641 SpellInfo const* spell = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(it->first);
642 std::string y = std::string(spell->getName());
643 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(y);
644 if (AscEmu::Util::Strings::contains(x, y))
645 {
646 sprintf((char*)itoabuf, "%u", spell->getId());
647 recout = itoabuf;
648 recout += ": |cff71d5ff|Hspell:";
649 recout += itoabuf;
650 recout += "|h[";
651 recout += spell->getName();
652 recout += "]|h|r";
653
654 std::string::size_type pos = recout.find('%');
655 if (pos != std::string::npos)
656 {
657 recout.insert(pos + 1, "%");
658 }
659
660 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
661
662 ++count;
663 if (count == 25)
664 {
665 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results returned. aborting.");
666 break;
667 }
668 }
669 }
670
671 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Search completed in {} ms.", static_cast<uint32_t>(Util::GetTimeDifferenceToNow(startTime)));
672 return true;
673}

80 if (map == 0)
81 return true;

84

87 {
88 {
89 do
90 {
91 Field* fields = creature_spawn_result->Fetch();
92 creatureEntries.push_back(fields[0].asUint32());

94 } while (creature_spawn_result->NextRow());
95 }
96 }
97

106
107 WorldDatabase.Execute(my_table);
108

111 {
112 auto creature_properties = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(entry);
113 if (creature_properties == nullptr)
114 {
115 redSystemMessage(session, "Creature with entry {} is not a valid entry (no properties information in database)", entry);
116 return true;
117 }
118
119 auto creature_spawn = new MySQLStructure::CreatureSpawn;
120 uint8_t gender = creature_properties->generateRandomDisplayIdAndReturnGender(&creature_spawn->displayid);
121 creature_spawn->entry = entry;
122 creature_spawn->id = sObjectMgr.generateCreatureSpawnId();
123 creature_spawn->movetype = 0;
124 creature_spawn->x = session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionX();
125 creature_spawn->y = session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionY();
126 creature_spawn->z = session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionZ();
127 creature_spawn->o = session->GetPlayer()->GetOrientation();
128 creature_spawn->emote_state = 0;
129 creature_spawn->flags = creature_properties->NPCFLags;
130 creature_spawn->pvp_flagged = 0;
131 creature_spawn->factionid = creature_properties->Faction;
132 creature_spawn->bytes0 = creature_spawn->setbyte(0, 2, gender);
133 creature_spawn->stand_state = 0;
134 creature_spawn->death_state = 0;
135 creature_spawn->channel_target_creature = creature_spawn->channel_target_go = creature_spawn->channel_spell = 0;
136 creature_spawn->MountedDisplayID = 0;
137 creature_spawn->sheath_state = 0;
138

141 creature_spawn->Item3SlotEntry = creature_properties->itemslot_3;
142
143 creature_spawn->CanFly = 0;
144 creature_spawn->phase = session->GetPlayer()->GetPhase();
145
146 if (auto creature = session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->createCreature(entry))
147 {
148 creature->Load(creature_spawn, 0, nullptr);
149 creature->m_loadedFromDB = true;
150 creature->PushToWorld(session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap());
151
152 // Add to map
153 uint32_t x = session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getPosX(session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionX());
154 uint32_t y = session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getPosY(session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionY());
155 session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getSpawnsListAndCreate(x, y)->CreatureSpawns.push_back(creature_spawn);
156 MapCell* map_cell = session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getCell(x, y);
157 if (map_cell != nullptr)
158 map_cell->setLoaded();
159
160 for (const auto& aiSpells : creature->getAIInterface()->getCreatureAISpells())
161 {
162 if (aiSpells->fromDB)
163 continue;
164
165 float chance = aiSpells->mCastChance;
166 uint32_t spell = aiSpells->mSpellInfo->getId();
167 uint32_t spelltype = aiSpells->spell_type;
168 uint32_t target = aiSpells->mTargetType;
169 uint32_t cooldown = aiSpells->mCooldown;
170 if (cooldown == 0xFFFFFFFF) //4294967295
171 cooldown = 10000;
172
173 std::string remove = "'";
174 std::string name = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(entry)->Name;
175 name.erase(std::remove_if(name.begin(), name.end(),
176 [&remove](const char& c) {
177 return remove.find(c) != std::string::npos;
178 }),
179 name.end());
180
181 std::string spellname = aiSpells->mSpellInfo->getName();
182 spellname.erase(std::remove_if(spellname.begin(), spellname.end(),
183 [&remove](const char& c) {
184 return remove.find(c) != std::string::npos;
185 }),
186 spellname.end());
187
188 std::string comment = name + " - " + spellname;
189
190 char my_insert1[700];
191 sprintf(my_insert1, "INSERT INTO creature_ai_scripts_%s VALUES (8606,12340,%u,4,0,5,1,0,%f,%u,%u,0,%u,%u,%u,0,100,0,0,'%s')", args, entry, chance, spell, spelltype, target, cooldown, cooldown, comment.c_str());
192
193 WorldDatabase.Execute(my_insert1);
194 ++count;
195 }
196
197 creature->RemoveFromWorld(false, true);
198 }
199 }
200
201 systemMessage(session, "Dumped: {} hardcoded scripts to creature_ai_scripts_dump", count);
202
203 return true;
204}

◆ HandleNpcAddAgentCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleNpcAddAgentCommand ( const char *  args,

25{
26 //new
27 auto creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);
28 if (creature_target == nullptr)
29 return true;
30
31 uint32_t ai_type;
32 uint32_t procEvent;
33 uint32_t procChance;
34 uint32_t maxcount;
35 uint32_t spellId;
36 uint32_t spellType;
37 uint32_t spelltargetType;
38 uint32_t spellCooldown;
39 float floatMisc1;
40 uint32_t Misc2;
41
42 if (sscanf(args, "%u %u %u %u %u %u %u %u %f %u", &ai_type, &procEvent, &procChance, &maxcount, &spellId, &spellType, &spelltargetType, &spellCooldown, &floatMisc1, &Misc2) != 10)
43 {
44 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be in format: .npc add trainerspell <ai_type> <procEvent> <procChance> <maxcount> <spellId> <spellType> <spelltarget_overwrite> <spellCooldown> <floatMisc1> <Misc2>.");
45 return true;
46 }
47
48 auto spell_entry = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellId);
49 if (spell_entry == nullptr)
50 {
51 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Spell {} is not invalid!", spellId);
52 return true;
53 }
54
55 systemMessage(m_session, "Added agent_type {} for spell {} to creature {} ({}).", ai_type, spellId, creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, creature_target->getEntry());
56 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "added agent_type %u for spell %u to creature %s (%u).", ai_type, spellId, creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), creature_target->getEntry());
57 WorldDatabase.Execute("INSERT INTO ai_agents VALUES(%u, 4, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %f, %u",
58 creature_target->getEntry(), ai_type, procEvent, procChance, maxcount, spellId, spellType, spelltargetType, spellCooldown, floatMisc1, Misc2);
59
60 auto ai_spell = std::make_unique<AI_Spell>();
61 ai_spell->agent = static_cast<uint16_t>(ai_type);
62 ai_spell->procChance = procChance;
63 ai_spell->procCount = maxcount;
64 ai_spell->spell = spell_entry;
65 ai_spell->spellType = static_cast<uint8_t>(spellType);
66 ai_spell->spelltargetType = static_cast<uint8_t>(spelltargetType);
67 ai_spell->floatMisc1 = floatMisc1;
68 ai_spell->Misc2 = Misc2;
69 ai_spell->cooldown = spellCooldown;
70 ai_spell->procCounter = 0;
71 ai_spell->cooldowntime = 0;
72 ai_spell->minrange = spell_entry->getMinRange();
73 ai_spell->maxrange = spell_entry->getMaxRange();
74
75 if (auto* creatureProperties = const_cast<CreatureProperties*>(creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()))
76 {
77 if (!spell_entry->isPassive())
78 creatureProperties->castable_spells.emplace_back(spell_entry->getId());
79 else
80 creatureProperties->start_auras.emplace(spell_entry->getId());
81 }
82
83 switch (ai_type)
84 {
85 case AGENT_MELEE:
86 creature_target->getAIInterface()->setMeleeDisabled(false);
87 break;
88 case AGENT_RANGED:
89 creature_target->getAIInterface()->setRangedDisabled(false);
90 break;
91 case AGENT_FLEE:
92 creature_target->getAIInterface()->setCanFlee(true);
93 break;
94 case AGENT_SPELL:
95 creature_target->getAIInterface()->addSpellToList(std::move(ai_spell));
96 break;
97 case AGENT_CALLFORHELP:
98 creature_target->getAIInterface()->setCanCallForHelp(true);
99 break;
100 default:
101 {
102 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid ai_type {}", ai_type);
103 break;
104 }
105 }
106 return true;
107}

126
127 uint32_t spellid;
128 uint32_t cost;
129 uint32_t reqlevel;
130 uint32_t reqspell;
131 uint32_t delspell;
132
133 if (sscanf(args, "%u %u %u %u %u", &spellid, &cost, &reqspell, &reqlevel, &delspell) != 5)
134 {
135 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be in format: .npc add trainerspell <spell_id> <cost> <required_spell> <required_player_level> <delete_spell_id>.");
136 return true;
137 }
138
139 auto creature_trainer = creature_target->GetTrainer();
140 if (creature_trainer == nullptr)
141 {
142 redSystemMessage(m_session, "{} ({}) is not a trainer!", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, creature_target->getEntry());
143 return true;
144 }
145
146 auto learn_spell = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellid);
147 if (learn_spell == nullptr)
148 {
149 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Invalid spell {}.", spellid);
150 return true;
151 }
152
153 if (learn_spell->getEffect(0) == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTANT_KILL || learn_spell->getEffect(1) == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTANT_KILL || learn_spell->getEffect(2) == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTANT_KILL)
154 {
155 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You are not allowed to learn spells with instant kill effect!");
156 return true;
157 }
158
159 TrainerSpell sp;
160 sp.cost = cost;
161 sp.learnSpell = learn_spell;
162 sp.requiredLevel = reqlevel;
163 sp.requiredSpell[0] = reqspell;
164 sp.deleteSpell = delspell;
165
166 creature_trainer->Spells.push_back(sp);
167 creature_trainer->SpellCount++;
168
169 systemMessage(m_session, "Added spell {} ({}) to trainer {} ({}).", learn_spell->getName(), learn_spell->getId(), creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, creature_target->getEntry());
170 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "added spell %s (%u) to trainer %s (%u)", learn_spell->getName().c_str(), learn_spell->getId(), creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), creature_target->getEntry());
171 WorldDatabase.Execute("REPLACE INTO trainer_spells VALUES(%u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u, %u)",
172 creature_target->getEntry(), 0, learn_spell->getId(), cost, reqspell, 0, 0, reqlevel, delspell, 0);*/
173
174 return true;
175}

◆ HandleNpcDeleteCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleNpcDeleteCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 219 of file NpcCommands.cpp.

220{
221 auto creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);
222 if (creature_target == nullptr)
223 return true;
224
225 if (creature_target->isPet())
226 {
227 systemMessage(m_session, "You can't delete a pet.");
228 return true;
229 }
230
231 if (creature_target->isSummon())
232 {
233 creature_target->Delete();
234 }
235 else
236 {
237 //creature_target->getAIInterface()->hideWayPoints(m_session->GetPlayer());
238
239 uint32_t spawn_id = creature_target->spawnid;
240 if (spawn_id != 0)
241 {
242 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Creature {} ({}) deleted from creature_spawn table.", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, spawn_id);
243 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used npc delete on creature %s (%u), pos %f %f %f", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), spawn_id, creature_target->GetPositionX(), creature_target->GetPositionY(), creature_target->GetPositionZ());
244 creature_target->DeleteFromDB();
245 }
246
247 if (creature_target->m_spawn)
248 {
249 uint32_t cellx = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxX - creature_target->m_spawn->x) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
250 uint32_t celly = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxY - creature_target->m_spawn->y) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
251
252 if (cellx <= Map::Cell::_sizeX && celly <= Map::Cell::_sizeY)
253 {
254 CellSpawns* sp = creature_target->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getSpawnsList(cellx, celly);
255 if (sp != nullptr)
256 {
257 for (CreatureSpawnList::iterator itr = sp->CreatureSpawns.begin(); itr != sp->CreatureSpawns.end(); ++itr)
258 if ((*itr) == creature_target->m_spawn)
259 {
260 sp->CreatureSpawns.erase(itr);
261 break;
262 }
263 }
264 delete creature_target->m_spawn;
265 creature_target->m_spawn = nullptr;
266 }
267 }
268
269 creature_target->RemoveFromWorld(false, true);
270 }
271
272 return true;
273}

324{
325 auto creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);

351

355 if (powertype <= 6)
356 {

359 }
360
361 systemMessage(m_session, "Damage (min / max): {} / {}", creature_target->getMinDamage(), creature_target->getMaxDamage());
362
363#if VERSION_STRING < WotLK
364 if (creature_target->getPetLoyalty() != 0)
365 systemMessage(m_session, "Pet loyalty level: {}", creature_target->getPetLoyalty());
366#elif VERSION_STRING < Mop
367 if (creature_target->getPetTalentPoints() != 0)
368 systemMessage(m_session, "Free pet talent points: {}", creature_target->getPetTalentPoints());
369#endif
370
371 if (creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->vehicleid > 0)
372 systemMessage(m_session, "VehicleID: {}", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->vehicleid);
373
374 if (creature_target->m_factionTemplate)
375 systemMessage(m_session, "Combat Support: {}", creature_target->m_factionTemplate->FriendlyMask);
376
377 if (creature_target->getCombatHandler().isInCombat())
378 systemMessage(m_session, "Is in combat!");
379 else
380 systemMessage(m_session, "Not in combat!");
381
382 uint8_t sheat = creature_target->getSheathType();
383 if (sheat <= 2)
384 systemMessage(m_session, "Sheat state: {}", SHEATSTATE[sheat].data());
385
386 systemMessage(m_session, "=================================");
387
388 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
389 // resistance
390 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_NORMAL) || creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_HOLY) ||
391 creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_FIRE) || creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_NATURE) ||
392 creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_FROST) || creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_SHADOW) ||
393 creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_ARCANE))
394 {
395 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Resistance =======================");
396 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_NORMAL))
397 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Armor: {}", creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_NORMAL));
398 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_HOLY))
399 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Holy: {}", creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_HOLY));
400 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_FIRE))
401 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Fire: {}", creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_FIRE));
402 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_NATURE))
403 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Nature: {}", creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_NATURE));
404 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_FROST))
405 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Frost: {}", creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_FROST));
406 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_SHADOW))
407 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Shadow: {}", creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_SHADOW));
408 if (creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_ARCANE))
409 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Arcane: {}", creature_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_ARCANE));
410 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "=================================");
411 }
412
413 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
414 // show byte
415 std::stringstream sstext;
416 sstext << "UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0 are:" << '\n';
417 sstext << " -Race: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getRace()) << '\n';
418 sstext << " -Class: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getClass()) << '\n';
419 sstext << " -Gender: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getGender()) << '\n';
420 sstext << " -Power Type: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getPowerType()) << '\n';
421 sstext << '\n';
422
423 sstext << "UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1 are:" << '\n';
424 sstext << " -StandState: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getStandState()) << '\n';
425#if VERSION_STRING < WotLK
426 sstext << " -Pet Loyalty: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getPetLoyalty()) << '\n';
427#elif VERSION_STRING < Mop
428 sstext << " -Pet TP: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getPetTalentPoints()) << '\n';
429#else
430 const auto theBytes = creature_target->getBytes1();
431 sstext << " -Unk1: " << std::to_string(uint16_t((uint8_t)(theBytes >> 8) & 0xFF)) << '\n';
432#endif
433#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
434 sstext << " -ShapeShift Form: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getShapeShiftForm()) << '\n';
435 sstext << " -StandState Flag: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getStandStateFlags()) << '\n';
436#else
437 sstext << " -StandState Flag: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getStandStateFlags()) << '\n';
438 sstext << " -Animation Flag: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getAnimationFlags()) << '\n';
439#endif
440 sstext << '\n';
441
442 sstext << "UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2 are:" << '\n';
443 sstext << " -SheathType: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getSheathType()) << '\n';
444#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
445 const auto theBytes = creature_target->getBytes2();
446 sstext << " -Unk1: " << uint16_t((uint8_t)(theBytes >> 8) & 0xFF) << '\n';
447 sstext << " -Unk2: " << uint16_t((uint8_t)(theBytes >> 16) & 0xFF) << '\n';
448 sstext << " -Unk3: " << uint16_t((uint8_t)(theBytes >> 24) & 0xFF) << '\n';
449#else
450#if VERSION_STRING == TBC
451 sstext << " -Positive Aura Limit: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getPositiveAuraLimit()) << '\n';
452#else
453 sstext << " -PvP Flag: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getPvpFlags()) << '\n';
454#endif
455 sstext << " -Pet Flag: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getPetFlags()) << '\n';
456 sstext << " -ShapeShift Form: " << std::to_string(creature_target->getShapeShiftForm()) << '\n';
457#endif
458 sstext << '\0';
459
460 systemMessage(m_session, "UNIT_FIELD_BYTES =================");
461 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, sstext.str().c_str());
462 systemMessage(m_session, "=================================");
463
464 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
465 // flags
466 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Flags ============================");
467 std::string s = getNpcFlagString(creature_target);
468 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "NpcFlags: {}{}", creature_target->getNpcFlags(), s);
469
470#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
471 uint8_t pvp_flags = creature_target->getPvpFlags();
472 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "PvPFlags: {}", pvp_flags);
473
474 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numpvpflags; i++)
475 if ((pvp_flags & UnitPvPFlagToName[i].Flag) != 0)
476 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "{}", UnitPvPFlagToName[i].Name.data());
477#endif
478
479#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
480 uint8_t pet_flags = creature_target->getPetFlags();
481 if (pet_flags != 0)
482 {
483 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "PetFlags: {}", pet_flags);
484 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numpetflags; i++)
485 if ((pet_flags & PetFlagToName[i].Flag) != 0)
486 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "{}", PetFlagToName[i].Name.data());
487 }
488#endif
489
490 uint32_t unit_flags = creature_target->getUnitFlags();
491 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "UnitFlags: {}", unit_flags);
492
493 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numflags; i++)
494 if ((unit_flags & UnitFlagToName[i].Flag) != 0)
495 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- {}", UnitFlagToName[i].Name.data());
496
497#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
498 uint32_t unit_flags2 = creature_target->getUnitFlags2();
499 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "UnitFlags2: {}", unit_flags2);
500
501 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numflags2; i++)
502 if ((unit_flags2 & UnitFlagToName2[i].Flag) != 0)
503 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- {}", UnitFlagToName2[i].Name.data());
504#endif
505
506 uint32_t dyn_flags = creature_target->getDynamicFlags();
507 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "UnitDynamicFlags: {}", dyn_flags);
508
509 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numdynflags; i++)
510 if ((dyn_flags & UnitDynFlagToName[i].Flag) != 0)
511 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "{}", UnitDynFlagToName[i].Name.data());
512
513 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "=================================");
514
515 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
516 // owner/summoner
517 Unit* unit_owner = nullptr;
518 bool owner_header_set = false;
519 if (creature_target->isSummon())
520 unit_owner = static_cast<Summon*>(creature_target)->getUnitOwner();
521
522 if (unit_owner != nullptr)
523 {
524 systemMessage(m_session, "Owner/Summoner ===================");
525
526 if (unit_owner->isPlayer())
527 systemMessage(m_session, "Owner is Player: {}", static_cast<Player*>(unit_owner)->getName());
528 if (unit_owner->isPet())
529 systemMessage(m_session, "Owner is Pet: {}", static_cast<Creature*>(unit_owner)->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
530 if (unit_owner->isCreature())
531 systemMessage(m_session, "Owner is Creature: {}", static_cast<Creature*>(unit_owner)->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
532
533 owner_header_set = true;
534 }
535
536 if (creature_target->getCreatedByGuid() || creature_target->getSummonedByGuid() ||
537 creature_target->getCharmedByGuid() || creature_target->getCreatedBySpellId())
538 {
539 if (!owner_header_set)
540 {
541 systemMessage(m_session, "Owner/Summoner ===================");
542 owner_header_set = true;
543 }
544
545 if (creature_target->getCreatedByGuid())
546 systemMessage(m_session, "Creator GUID: {}", WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(creature_target->getCreatedByGuid()));
547 if (creature_target->getSummonedByGuid())
548 systemMessage(m_session, "Summoner GUID: {}", WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(creature_target->getSummonedByGuid()));
549 if (creature_target->getCharmedByGuid())
550 systemMessage(m_session, "Charmer GUID: {}", WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(creature_target->getCharmedByGuid()));
551 if (creature_target->getCreatedBySpellId())
552 systemMessage(m_session, "Creator Spell: {}", WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(creature_target->getCreatedBySpellId()));
553 }
554
555 if (owner_header_set)
556 systemMessage(m_session, "=================================");
557
558 if (creature_target->m_spawn != nullptr)
559 systemMessage(m_session, "Is part of table: {}", creature_target->m_spawn->origine);
560 else
561 systemMessage(m_session, "Is spawnd by an internal script");
562
563 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
564 // equipment
565 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Equipment ============================");
566#if VERSION_STRING < WotLK
567 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Melee: {}", creature_target->getVirtualItemEntry(MELEE));
568 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Offhand: {}", creature_target->getVirtualItemEntry(OFFHAND));
569 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Ranged: {}", creature_target->getVirtualItemEntry(RANGED));
570#else
571 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Melee: {}", creature_target->getVirtualItemSlotId(MELEE));
572 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Offhand: {}", creature_target->getVirtualItemSlotId(OFFHAND));
573 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "-- Ranged: {}", creature_target->getVirtualItemSlotId(RANGED));
574#endif
575
576 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
577 // transport
578 if (auto transporter = creature_target->GetTransport())
579 {
580 systemMessage(m_session, "Creature is on Transporter!");
581#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
582 if (creature_target->obj_movement_info.hasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_TRANSPORT))
583 systemMessage(m_session, "Creature has MovementFlag MOVEFLAG_TRANSPORT");
584 else
585 systemMessage(m_session, "!!!!!!!!! NO MovementFlag MOVEFLAG_TRANSPORT !!!!!!!!!!!!");
586#endif
587 }
588
589 if (sScriptMgr.has_creature_script(creature_target->getEntry()))
590 systemMessage(m_session, "Creature has C++/LUA script");
591 else
592 systemMessage(m_session, "Creature doesn't have C++/LUA script");
593
594 if (sScriptMgr.has_creature_gossip(creature_target->getEntry()))
595 systemMessage(m_session, "Creature has C++/LUA gossip script");
596 else
597 systemMessage(m_session, "Creature doesn't have C++/LUA gossip script");
598
599 redSystemMessage(m_session, "EntryID: {}", creature_target->getEntry());
600 redSystemMessage(m_session, "SpawnID: {}", creature_target->GetSQL_id());
601
602 return true;
603}

607{
608 auto creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);
609 if (creature_target == nullptr)
610 return true;
611
612 auto result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT * FROM ai_agents where entry=%u", creature_target->getEntry());
613 if (result == nullptr)
614 {
615 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Selected Creature {} ({}) has no entries in ai_agents table!", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, creature_target->getEntry());
616 return true;
617 }
618 systemMessage(m_session, "Agent list for Creature {} ({})", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, creature_target->getEntry());
619 do
620 {
621 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
622 systemMessage(m_session, "-- agent: {} | spellId: {} | event: {} | chance: {} | maxcount: {}", fields[1].asUint32(), fields[5].asUint32(), fields[2].asUint32(), fields[3].asUint32(), fields[4].asUint32());
623 } while (result->NextRow());
624
625 return true;
626}

◆ HandleNpcListLootCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleNpcListLootCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 629 of file NpcCommands.cpp.

630{
631 auto creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);
632 if (creature_target == nullptr)
633 return true;
634
635 auto loot_result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT itemid, normal10percentchance, heroic10percentchance, normal25percentchance, heroic25percentchance, mincount, maxcount FROM loot_creatures WHERE entryid=%u;", creature_target->getEntry());
636 if (loot_result != nullptr)
637 {
638 uint8_t numFound = 0;
639
640 uint32_t minQuality = 0;
641 if (*args)
642 minQuality = std::stoul(args);
643
644 systemMessage(m_session, "Listing loot for Creature {} ({})", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, creature_target->getEntry());
645
646 do
647 {
648 Field* field = loot_result->Fetch();
649
650 auto item_proto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(field[0].asUint32());
651 if (item_proto == nullptr || item_proto->Quality < minQuality)
652 continue;
653
654 redSystemMessage(m_session, "ItemID: {} {}", item_proto->ItemId, sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(item_proto, m_session->language));
655 systemMessage(m_session, "-- N10 ({}) N25 ({}) H10 ({}) H25 ({}) min/max ({}/{})", field[1].asFloat(), field[3].asFloat(), field[2].asFloat(), field[4].asFloat(), field[5].asUint32(), field[6].asUint32());
656
657 ++numFound;
658 } while (loot_result->NextRow() && (numFound <= 25));
659
660 if (numFound > 25)
661 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results found. Use .npc listloot <min quality> to increase the results.");
662 else
663 systemMessage(m_session, "{} results found.", numFound);
664 }
665 else
666 {
667 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No loot in loot_creatures table for {} ({}).", creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, creature_target->getEntry());
668 }
669 return true;
670}

◆ HandleNpcSelectCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleNpcSelectCommand ( const char *  ,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 752 of file NpcCommands.cpp.

753{
754 Creature* near_creature = nullptr;
755 float dist = 999999.0f;
756 float dist2;
757
758 auto player = m_session->GetPlayer();
759 for (const auto& itr : player->getInRangeObjectsSet())
760 {
761 if (itr && (dist2 = player->GetDistance2dSq(itr)) < dist && (itr)->isCreature())
762 {
763 near_creature = static_cast<Creature*>(itr);
764 dist = dist2;
765 }
766 }
767
768 if (near_creature == nullptr)
769 {
770 redSystemMessage(m_session, "No inrange creatures found.");
771 return true;
772 }
773
774 player->setTargetGuid(near_creature->getGuid());
775 systemMessage(m_session, "Nearest Creature {} spawnID: {} GUID: {} selected", near_creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, near_creature->spawnid, near_creature->getGuid());
776 return true;
777}
