◆ HandleNpcSetEquipCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleNpcSetEquipCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1104 of file NpcCommands.cpp.

1105{
1106 uint8_t equipment_slot;
1107 uint32_t item_id;
1108
1109 if (sscanf(args, "%hhu %u", &equipment_slot, &item_id) != 2)
1110 {
1111 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Command must be in format: .npc add equipment <slot> <item_id>.");
1112 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Slots: (0)melee, (1)offhand, (2)ranged");
1113 return true;
1114 }
1115
1116 Creature* creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);
1117 if (creature_target == nullptr)
1118 return true;
1119
1120 auto item_entry = sItemStore.lookupEntry(item_id);
1121 if (item_entry == nullptr)
1122 {
1123 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Item ID: {} is not a valid item!", item_id);
1124 return true;
1125 }
1126
1127#if VERSION_STRING < WotLK
1128 const auto previousValue = creature_target->getVirtualItemEntry(equipment_slot);
1129#else
1130 const auto previousValue = creature_target->getVirtualItemSlotId(equipment_slot);
1131#endif
1132
1133
1134 switch (equipment_slot)
1135 {
1136 case MELEE:
1137 {
1138 if (creature_target->m_spawn != nullptr)
1139 creature_target->m_spawn->Item1SlotEntry = item_id;
1140 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Melee slot successfull changed from {} to {} for Creature {}", previousValue, item_id, creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
1141 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "changed melee slot from %u to %u for creature spawn %u", previousValue, item_id, creature_target->spawnid);
1142 break;
1143 }
1144 case OFFHAND:
1145 {
1146 if (creature_target->m_spawn != nullptr)
1147 creature_target->m_spawn->Item2SlotEntry = item_id;
1148 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Offhand slot successfull changed from {} to {} for Creature {}", previousValue, item_id, creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
1149 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "changed offhand slot from %u to %u for creature spawn %u", previousValue, item_id, creature_target->spawnid);
1150 break;
1151 }
1152 case RANGED:
1153 {
1154 if (creature_target->m_spawn != nullptr)
1155 creature_target->m_spawn->Item3SlotEntry = item_id;
1156 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Ranged slot successfull changed from {} to {} for Creature {}", previousValue, item_id, creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
1157 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "changed ranged slot from %u to %u for creature spawn %u", previousValue, item_id, creature_target->spawnid);
1158 break;
1159 }
1160 default:
1161 {
1162 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Slot: {} is not a valid slot! Use: (0)melee, (1)offhand, (2)ranged.", equipment_slot);
1163 return true;
1164 }
1165 }
1166
1167 creature_target->setVirtualItemSlotId(equipment_slot, item_id);
1168 creature_target->SaveToDB();
1169 return true;
1170}

◆ HandleNpcSpawnCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleNpcSpawnCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 780 of file NpcCommands.cpp.

781{
782 uint32_t entry = std::stoul(args);
783 if (entry == 0)
784 return false;
785
786 auto creature_properties = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(entry);
787 if (creature_properties == nullptr)
788 {
789 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Creature with entry {} is not a valid entry (no properties information in database)", entry);
790 return true;
791 }
792
793 auto creature_spawn = new MySQLStructure::CreatureSpawn;
794 uint8_t gender = creature_properties->generateRandomDisplayIdAndReturnGender(&creature_spawn->displayid);
795 creature_spawn->entry = entry;
796 creature_spawn->id = sObjectMgr.generateCreatureSpawnId();
797 creature_spawn->movetype = 0;
798 creature_spawn->x = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionX();
799 creature_spawn->y = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionY();
800 creature_spawn->z = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionZ();
801 creature_spawn->o = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetOrientation();
802 creature_spawn->emote_state = 0;
803 creature_spawn->flags = creature_properties->NPCFLags;
804 creature_spawn->pvp_flagged = 0;
805 creature_spawn->factionid = creature_properties->Faction;
806 creature_spawn->bytes0 = creature_spawn->setbyte(0, 2, gender);
807 creature_spawn->stand_state = 0;
808 creature_spawn->death_state = 0;
809 creature_spawn->channel_target_creature = creature_spawn->channel_target_go = creature_spawn->channel_spell = 0;
810 creature_spawn->MountedDisplayID = 0;
811 creature_spawn->sheath_state = 0;
812
813 creature_spawn->Item1SlotEntry = creature_properties->itemslot_1;
814 creature_spawn->Item2SlotEntry = creature_properties->itemslot_2;
815 creature_spawn->Item3SlotEntry = creature_properties->itemslot_3;
816
817 creature_spawn->CanFly = 0;
818 creature_spawn->phase = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPhase();
819 creature_spawn->waypoint_id = 0;
820
821 if (auto creature = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->createCreature(entry))
822 {
823 creature->Load(creature_spawn, 0, nullptr);
824 creature->m_loadedFromDB = true;
825 creature->PushToWorld(m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap());
826
827 // Add to map
828 uint32_t x = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getPosX(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionX());
829 uint32_t y = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getPosY(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPositionY());
830 m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getSpawnsListAndCreate(x, y)->CreatureSpawns.push_back(creature_spawn);
831 MapCell* map_cell = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getCell(x, y);
832 if (map_cell != nullptr)
833 map_cell->setLoaded();
834
835 creature->SaveToDB();
836
837 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Spawned a creature `{}` with entry {} at {} {} {} on map {}", creature_properties->Name,
838 entry, creature_spawn->x, creature_spawn->y, creature_spawn->z, m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId());
839 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "spawned a %s at %u %f %f %f", creature_properties->Name.c_str(), m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId(),
840 creature_spawn->x, creature_spawn->y, creature_spawn->z);
841 }
842 return true;
843}

901{
902#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
903 char* pitem = strtok(const_cast<char*>(args), " ");
904 if (!pitem)
905 return false;
906
907 WoWGuid wowGuid;
908 wowGuid.Init(m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid());
909
910 if (wowGuid.getRawGuid() == 0)
911 {
912 systemMessage(m_session, "No selection.");
913 return true;
914 }
915
916 Creature* selected_creature = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getCreature(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
917 if (selected_creature == nullptr)
918 {
919 systemMessage(m_session, "You should select a creature.");
920 return true;
921 }
922
923 uint32_t item = atoi(pitem);
924 int amount = -1;
925
926 char* pamount = strtok(nullptr, " ");
927 if (pamount)
928 amount = atoi(pamount);
929
930 if (amount == -1)
931 {
932 systemMessage(m_session, "You need to specify an amount.");
933 return true;
934 }
935
936 uint32_t costid = 0;
937 char* pcostid = strtok(nullptr, " ");
938 if (pcostid)
939 costid = atoi(pcostid);
940
941 auto item_extended_cost = (costid > 0) ? sItemExtendedCostStore.lookupEntry(costid) : nullptr;
942 if (costid > 0 && sItemExtendedCostStore.lookupEntry(costid) == nullptr)
943 {
944 systemMessage(m_session, "You've entered invalid extended cost id.");
945 return true;
946 }
947
948 ItemProperties const* tmpItem = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(item);
949 if (tmpItem)
950 {
951 WorldDatabase.Execute("INSERT INTO vendors VALUES (%u, %u, %u, 0, 0, %u", selected_creature->getEntry(), item, amount, costid);
952
953 selected_creature->AddVendorItem(item, amount, item_extended_cost);
954
955 if (costid > 0)
956 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Item {} ({}) added to vendorlist with extended cost %u.", item, tmpItem->Name, costid);
957 else
958 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Item {} ({}) added to vendorlist.", item, tmpItem->Name);
959 }
960 else
961 {
962 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Item {} not found in database", item);
963 }
964
965 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "added item %u to vendor %u", item, selected_creature->getEntry());
966#else
967 char* pitem = strtok((char*)args, " ");
968 if (!pitem)
969 return false;
970
971 uint64_t guid = m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid();
972 if (guid == 0)
973 {
974 systemMessage(m_session, "No selection.");
975 return true;
976 }
977#endif
978 return true;
979}

17{
18 Player* selected_player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);

21
22 if (!*args)
23 return false;
24

27 if (creature_proto == nullptr)
28 {
29 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Creature Entry: {} is not a valid endtry!", entry);
30 return true;
31 }
32
33 if (selected_player->getPet() != nullptr)
34 {
35 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must dismiss your current pet.");
36 return true;
37 }
38

40 {
41#if VERSION_STRING < Cata

45 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must dismiss your inactive pet.");
46#else
47 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must have one free active pet slot.");
48#endif
49 return true;
50 }
51
52 float followangle = -M_PI_FLOAT * 2;
53 LocationVector vector(selected_player->GetPosition());
54 vector.x += (3 * (cosf(followangle + selected_player->GetOrientation())));
55 vector.y += (3 * (sinf(followangle + selected_player->GetOrientation())));
56
57 const auto pet = sObjectMgr.createPet(entry, nullptr);
58 if (!pet->createAsSummon(creature_proto, nullptr, selected_player, vector, 0, nullptr, 0, PET_TYPE_HUNTER))
59 {
60 pet->DeleteMe();
61 return true;
62 }
63
64 if (selected_player != m_session->GetPlayer())
65 {
66 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used created pet with entry %u for player %s", entry, selected_player->getName().c_str());
67 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Pet with entry {} created for player {}.", entry, selected_player->getName());
68 blueSystemMessage(selected_player->getSession(), "{} created a pet with entry {} for you.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), entry);
69
70 }
71 else
72 {
73 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Pet with entry {} created.", entry);
74 }
75
76 return true;

◆ HandlePetDismissCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandlePetDismissCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 80 of file PetCommands.cpp.

81{
82 Player* selected_player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, false, true);
83 Pet* selected_pet = nullptr;
84 Creature* selected_creature = nullptr;
85 if (selected_player != nullptr)
86 {
87 if (selected_player->getPet() == nullptr)
88 {
89 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player has no pet.");
90 return true;
91 }
92 selected_player->getPet()->unSummon();
93 }
94 else
95 {
96 // no player selected, see if it is a pet or if creature has pet
97 selected_creature = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, false);
98 if (selected_creature == nullptr)
99 return false;
100
101 if (selected_creature->isPet())
102 {
103 selected_pet = dynamic_cast<Pet*>(selected_creature);
104 auto* const petOwner = selected_pet->getUnitOwner();
105 if (petOwner == nullptr)
106 return false;
107
108 selected_player = petOwner->isPlayer() ? selected_pet->getPlayerOwner() : nullptr;
109 selected_creature = petOwner->isCreature() ? dynamic_cast<Creature*>(petOwner) : nullptr;
110 }
111 else
112 {
113 if (selected_creature->getPet() == nullptr)
114 return false;
115
116 // Target is creature but not a pet
117 selected_pet = selected_creature->getPet();
118 selected_player = selected_pet->getPlayerOwner();
119 }
120
121 if (selected_pet == nullptr)
122 return false;
123
124 selected_pet->unSummon();
125 }
126
127 if (selected_creature != nullptr)
128 {
129 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Dismissed {}'s pet.", selected_creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
130 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used dismiss pet command on creature %s", selected_creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str());
131 }
132 else if (selected_player != nullptr && selected_player != m_session->GetPlayer())
133 {
134 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Dismissed {}'s pet.", selected_player->getName());
135 systemMessage(selected_player->getSession(), "{} dismissed your pet.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName());
136 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used dismiss pet command on player %s", selected_player->getName().c_str());
137 }
138 else
139 {
140 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Your pet is dismissed.");
141 }
142
143 return true;
144}

248{
249 if (!*args)
250 return false;
251
252
253 int32_t newLevel = std::stoul(args);
254 if (newLevel < 1)
255 return false;
256
257 Player* selected_player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, false, true);
258 Pet* selected_pet = nullptr;
259 if (selected_player != nullptr)
260 {
261 selected_pet = selected_player->getPet();
262 if (selected_pet == nullptr)
263 {
264 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player has no pet.");
265 return true;
266 }
267 }
268 else
269 {
270 Creature* selected_creature = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, false);
271 if (selected_creature == nullptr)
272 return false;
273
274 if (!selected_creature->isPet())
275 return false;
276
277 selected_pet = dynamic_cast< Pet* >(selected_creature);
278
279 selected_player = selected_pet->getPlayerOwner();
280 }
281
282 if (static_cast<uint32_t>(newLevel) > selected_player->getLevel())
283 {
284 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You can not set a pet level higher than thew player level!");
285 newLevel = selected_player->getLevel();
286 }
287
288 selected_pet->setLevel(newLevel);
289 selected_pet->setPetExperience(0);
290 selected_pet->setPetNextLevelExperience(selected_pet->getNextLevelXp(newLevel));
291 selected_pet->applyStatsForLevel();
292 selected_pet->updateSpellList();
293
294 if (selected_player != m_session->GetPlayer())
295 {
296 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Set {}'s pet to level {}.", selected_player->getName(), static_cast<uint32_t>(newLevel));
297 systemMessage(selected_player->getSession(), "{} set your pet to level {}.", m_session->GetPlayer()->getName(), newLevel);
298 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "leveled %s's pet to %u", selected_player->getName().c_str(), static_cast<uint32_t>(newLevel));
299 }
300 else
301 {
302 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "You set your pet to level {}.", static_cast<uint32_t>(newLevel));
303 }
304
305 return true;
306}

1188{
1189 Player* plr;
1190 if (strlen(args) >= 4)
1191 {
1192 plr = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(args, false);
1193 if (!plr)
1194 {
1195 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Unable to locate player {}.", args);
1196 return true;
1197 }
1198 }
1199 else
1200 plr = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
1201
1202 if (!plr) return true;
1203 if (!plr->getSession())
1204 {
1205 redSystemMessage(m_session, "ERROR: this player hasn't got any session !");
1206 return true;
1207 }
1208 if (!plr->getSession()->GetSocket())
1209 {
1210 redSystemMessage(m_session, "ERROR: this player hasn't got any socket !");
1211 return true;
1212 }
1213 WorldSession* sess = plr->getSession();
1214
1215 static const char* classes[MAX_PLAYER_CLASSES] =
1216 { "None", "Warrior", "Paladin", "Hunter", "Rogue", "Priest", "Death Knight", "Shaman", "Mage", "Warlock", "None", "Druid" };

1218 // wrong for classic!
1219 static const char* races[11 + 1] =
1220 { "None", "Human", "Orc", "Dwarf", "Night Elf", "Undead", "Tauren", "Gnome", "Troll", "None", "Blood Elf", "Draenei" };
1221#else
1222 static const char* races[DBC_NUM_RACES] =
1223 { "None", "Human", "Orc", "Dwarf", "Night Elf", "Undead", "Tauren", "Gnome", "Troll", "Goblin", "Blood Elf", "Draenei", "None", "None", "None", "None", "None", "None", "None", "None", "None", "None", "Worgen" };
1224#endif
1225
1226 char playedLevel[64];
1227 char playedTotal[64];
1228
1229 int seconds = (plr->getPlayedTime())[0];
1230 int mins = 0;
1231 int hours = 0;
1232 int days = 0;
1233 if (seconds >= 60)
1234 {
1235 mins = seconds / 60;
1236 if (mins)
1237 {
1238 seconds -= mins * 60;
1239 if (mins >= 60)
1240 {
1241 hours = mins / 60;
1242 if (hours)
1243 {
1244 mins -= hours * 60;
1245 if (hours >= 24)
1246 {
1247 days = hours / 24;
1248 if (days)
1249 hours -= days * 24;
1250 }
1251 }
1252 }
1253 }
1254 }
1255 snprintf(playedLevel, 64, "[%d days, %d hours, %d minutes, %d seconds]", days, hours, mins, seconds);
1256
1257 seconds = (plr->getPlayedTime())[1];
1258 mins = 0;
1259 hours = 0;
1260 days = 0;
1261 if (seconds >= 60)
1262 {
1263 mins = seconds / 60;
1264 if (mins)
1265 {
1266 seconds -= mins * 60;
1267 if (mins >= 60)
1268 {
1269 hours = mins / 60;
1270 if (hours)
1271 {
1272 mins -= hours * 60;
1273 if (hours >= 24)
1274 {
1275 days = hours / 24;
1276 if (days)
1277 hours -= days * 24;
1278 }
1279 }
1280 }
1281 }
1282 }
1283 snprintf(playedTotal, 64, "[%d days, %d hours, %d minutes, %d seconds]", days, hours, mins, seconds);
1284
1285 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "{} is a {} {} {}", plr->getName(), (plr->getGender() ? "Female" : "Male"), races[plr->getRace()], classes[plr->getClass()]);
1286
1287 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "{} has played {} at this level", (plr->getGender() ? "She" : "He"), playedLevel);
1288 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "and {} overall", playedTotal);
1289
1290 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "{} is connecting from account '{}'[{}] with permissions '{}'", (plr->getGender() ? "She" : "He"), sess->GetAccountName(), sess->GetAccountId(), sess->GetPermissions().get());
1291
1292 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Factiontemplate: {}", plr->getFactionTemplate());
1293
1294 std::string clientFlags = "WoW";
1295
1296 if (sess->GetFlags() == AF_FULL_MOP)
1297 clientFlags += " TBC, WotLK, Cata and MoP";
1298 else if (sess->GetFlags() == AF_FULL_CATA)
1299 clientFlags += " TBC, WotLK and Cata";
1300 else if (sess->GetFlags() == AF_FULL_WOTLK)
1301 clientFlags += " TBC and WotLK";
1302 else if (sess->HasFlag(ACCOUNT_FLAG_XPACK_04))
1303 clientFlags += " Mists of Pandaria";
1304 else if (sess->HasFlag(ACCOUNT_FLAG_XPACK_03))
1305 clientFlags += " Cataclysm";
1306 else if (sess->HasFlag(ACCOUNT_FLAG_XPACK_02))
1307 clientFlags += " Wrath of the Lich King";
1308 else if (sess->HasFlag(ACCOUNT_FLAG_XPACK_01))
1309 clientFlags += " The Burning Crusade";
1310
1311 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "{} uses {} (build {})", (plr->getGender() ? "She" : "He"), clientFlags, sess->GetClientBuild());
1312
1313 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "{} IP is '{}', and has a latency of {}ms", (plr->getGender() ? "Her" : "His"), sess->GetSocket()->GetRemoteIP(), sess->GetLatency());
1314
1315 return true;
1316}

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandlePossessCommand ( const char *  ,

Definition at line 865 of file NpcCommands.cpp.

866{
867 auto unit_target = GetSelectedUnit(m_session);
868 if (unit_target != nullptr)
869 {
870 if (unit_target->isPet() || unit_target->getCreatedByGuid() != 0)
871 {
872 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You can not possess a pet!");
873 return false;
874 }
875 if (unit_target->isPlayer())
876 {
877 auto player = static_cast<Player*>(unit_target);
878 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Player {} selected.", player->getName());
879 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used possess command on PLAYER %s", player->getName().c_str());
880 }
881 else if (unit_target->isCreature())
882 {
883 auto creature = static_cast<Creature*>(unit_target);
884 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Creature {} selected.", creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
885 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used possess command on Creature %s spawn_id %u", creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), creature->GetSQL_id());
886 }
887 }
888 else
889 {
890 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must select a Player/Creature.");
891 return false;
892 }
893
894 m_session->GetPlayer()->possess(unit_target);
895
896 return true;
897}

◆ HandleQuestAddFinishCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleQuestAddFinishCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 838 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

839{
840 if (!*args)
841 return false;
842
843 WoWGuid wowGuid;
844 wowGuid.Init(m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid());
845
846 if (wowGuid.getRawGuid() == 0)
847 {
848 systemMessage(m_session, "You must target an npc.");
849 return false;
850 }
851
852 Creature* unit = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getCreature(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
853 if (!unit)
854 {
855 systemMessage(m_session, "You must target an npc.");
856 return false;
857 }
858
859 if (!unit->isQuestGiver())
860 {
861 systemMessage(m_session, "Unit is not a valid quest giver.");
862 return false;
863 }
864
865 uint32_t quest_id = std::stoul(args);
866 if (quest_id == 0)
867 {
868 quest_id = GetQuestIDFromLink(args);
869 if (quest_id == 0)
870 return false;
871 }
872
873 QuestProperties const* qst = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id);
874 if (qst == nullptr)
875 {
876 systemMessage(m_session, "Invalid quest selected, unable to add quest to the specified NPC.");
877 return false;
878 }
879
880 std::string quest_giver = std::to_string(unit->getEntry());
881
882 std::string my_query1 = "SELECT id FROM creature_quest_finisher WHERE id = " + quest_giver + " AND quest = " + std::string(args) + " AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u";
883 auto selectResult1 = WorldDatabase.Query(my_query1.c_str(), VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
884 if (selectResult1)
885 {
886 systemMessage(m_session, "Quest was already found for the specified NPC.");
887 }
888 else
889 {
890 std::string my_insert1 = "INSERT INTO creature_quest_finisher (id, quest, min_build, max_build) VALUES (" + quest_giver + "," + std::string(args) + ", %u, %u)";
891 WorldDatabase.Query(my_insert1.c_str(), VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
892 }
893
894 sQuestMgr.LoadExtraQuestStuff();
895
896 QuestRelation* qstrel = nullptr;
897 qstrel->qst = qst;
898 qstrel->type = QUESTGIVER_QUEST_END;
899
900 uint8_t qstrelid;
901 if (unit->HasQuests())
902 {
903 qstrelid = (uint8_t)unit->GetQuestRelation(quest_id);
904 unit->DeleteQuest(qstrel);
905 }
906
907 unit->_LoadQuests();
908
909 std::string qname = qst->title;
910
911 std::string recout = "|cff00ff00Added Quest to NPC as finisher: ";
912 recout += "|cff00ccff";
913 recout += qname;
914 recout += "\n\n";
915 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
916 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "added finisher of quest %u [%s] to NPC %u [%s]", qst->id, qst->title.c_str(), unit->getEntry(), unit->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str());
917
918 return true;
919}

◆ HandleQuestFailCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleQuestFailCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 474 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

475{
476 if (args == nullptr)
477 return false;
478
479 const uint32_t questId = static_cast<uint32_t>(atoi(args));
480 if (questId == 0)
481 return false;
482
483 Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
484
485 if (auto* questLog = player->getQuestLogByQuestId(questId))
486 {
487 questLog->sendQuestFailed();
488 return true;
489 }
490
491 redSystemMessage(m_session, "quest {} not found in player's questlog", questId);
492 return false;
493
494}
Player::getQuestLogByQuestId
QuestLogEntry * getQuestLogByQuestId(uint32_t questId) const
Definition Player.cpp:8859
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ HandleQuestFinishCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleQuestFinishCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 224 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

225{
226 if (!*args)
227 return false;
228
229 Player* plr = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
230 if (plr == nullptr)
231 return true;
232
233 uint32_t quest_id = std::stoul(args);
234 // reward_slot is for when quest has choice of rewards (0 is the first choice, 1 is the second choice, ...)
235 // reward_slot will default to 0 if none is specified
236 uint32_t reward_slot;
237 if (quest_id == 0)
238 {
239 quest_id = GetQuestIDFromLink(args);
240 if (quest_id == 0)
241 return false;
242
243 if (strstr(args, "|r"))
244 reward_slot = std::stoul(strstr(args, "|r") + 2);
245 else
246 reward_slot = 0;
247 }
248 else if (strchr(args, ' '))
249 {
250 reward_slot = std::stoul(strchr(args, ' ') + 1);
251 }
252 else
253 {
254 reward_slot = 0;
255 }
256 // currently Quest::reward_choiceitem declaration is
257 // uint32_t reward_choiceitem[6];
258 // so reward_slot must be 0 to 5
259 if (reward_slot > 5)
260 reward_slot = 0;
261
262 std::string recout = "|cff00ff00";
263
264 if (QuestProperties const* qst = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id))
265 {
266 if (plr->hasQuestFinished(quest_id))
267 {
268 recout += "Player has already completed that quest.\n\n";
269 }
270 else
271 {
272 if (auto* questLog = plr->getQuestLogByQuestId(quest_id))
273 {
274 uint32_t giver_id = 0;
275 auto creatureResult = sMySQLStore.getWorldDBQuery("SELECT id FROM creature_quest_starter WHERE quest = %u AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u", quest_id, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
276
277 if (creatureResult)
278 {
279 Field* creatureFields = creatureResult->Fetch();
280 giver_id = creatureFields[0].asUint32();
281 }
282 else
283 {
284 auto objectResult = sMySQLStore.getWorldDBQuery("SELECT id FROM gameobject_quest_starter WHERE quest = %u AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u", quest_id, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
285 if (objectResult)
286 {
287 Field* objectFields = objectResult->Fetch();
288 giver_id = objectFields[0].asUint32();
289 }
290 }
291
292 if (giver_id == 0)
293 {
294 systemMessage(m_session, "Unable to find quest giver creature or object.");
295 }
296 else
297 {
298 // I need some way to get the guid without targeting the creature or looking through all the spawns...
299 Object* questGiver = nullptr;
300
301 for (auto* pCreature: plr->getWorldMap()->getCreatures())
302 {
303 if (pCreature)
304 {
305 if (pCreature->getEntry() == giver_id) //found creature
306 {
307 questGiver = pCreature;
308 }
309 }
310 }
311
312 if (questGiver)
313 {
314 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Found a quest_giver creature.");
315 sQuestMgr.OnActivateQuestGiver(questGiver, plr);
316 sQuestMgr.GiveQuestRewardReputation(plr, qst, questGiver);
317 }
318 else
319 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Unable to find quest_giver object.");
320 }
321
322 questLog->finishAndRemove();
323 recout += "Player was on that quest, but has now completed it.";
324 }
325 else
326 {
327 recout += "The quest has now been completed for that player.";
328 }
329
330 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "completed quest %u [%s] for player %s", quest_id, qst->title.c_str(), plr->getName().c_str());
331 sQuestMgr.BuildQuestComplete(plr, qst);
332 plr->addQuestToFinished(quest_id);
333
334 // Quest Rewards : Copied from QuestMgr::OnQuestFinished()
335 // Reputation reward
336 for (uint8_t z = 0; z < 6; z++)
337 {
338 if (qst->reward_repfaction[z])
339 {
340 int32_t amt = 0;
341 uint32_t fact = qst->reward_repfaction[z];
342 if (qst->reward_repvalue[z])
343 amt = qst->reward_repvalue[z];
344
345 if (qst->reward_replimit && (plr->getFactionStanding(fact) >= (int32_t)qst->reward_replimit))
346 continue;
347
348 amt = Util::float2int32(amt * worldConfig.getFloatRate(RATE_QUESTREPUTATION));
349 plr->modFactionStanding(fact, amt);
350 }
351 }
352 // Static Item reward
353 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
354 {
355 if (qst->reward_item[i])
356 {
357 ItemProperties const* proto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(qst->reward_item[i]);
358 if (!proto)
359 {
360 sLogger.failure("Invalid item prototype in quest reward! ID {}, quest {}", qst->reward_item[i], qst->id);
361 }
362 else
363 {
364 auto* item_add = plr->getItemInterface()->FindItemLessMax(qst->reward_item[i], qst->reward_itemcount[i], false);
365 if (!item_add)
366 {
367 auto slotresult = plr->getItemInterface()->FindFreeInventorySlot(proto);
368 if (!slotresult.Result)
369 {
370 plr->getItemInterface()->buildInventoryChangeError(nullptr, nullptr, INV_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL);
371 }
372 else
373 {
374 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(qst->reward_item[i], plr);
375 if (item)
376 {
377 item->setStackCount(uint32_t(qst->reward_itemcount[i]));
378 plr->getItemInterface()->SafeAddItem(std::move(item), slotresult.ContainerSlot, slotresult.Slot);
379 }
380 }
381 }
382 else
383 {
384 item_add->setStackCount(item_add->getStackCount() + qst->reward_itemcount[i]);
385 item_add->m_isDirty = true;
386 }
387 }
388 }
389 }
390 // Choice Rewards -- Defaulting to choice 0 for ".quest complete" command
391 if (qst->reward_choiceitem[reward_slot])
392 {
393 ItemProperties const* proto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(qst->reward_choiceitem[reward_slot]);
394 if (!proto)
395 {
396 sLogger.failure("Invalid item prototype in quest reward! ID {}, quest {}", qst->reward_choiceitem[reward_slot], qst->id);
397 }
398 else
399 {
400 auto item_add = plr->getItemInterface()->FindItemLessMax(qst->reward_choiceitem[reward_slot], qst->reward_choiceitemcount[reward_slot], false);
401 if (!item_add)
402 {
403 auto slotresult = plr->getItemInterface()->FindFreeInventorySlot(proto);
404 if (!slotresult.Result)
405 {
406 plr->getItemInterface()->buildInventoryChangeError(nullptr, nullptr, INV_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL);
407 }
408 else
409 {
410 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(qst->reward_choiceitem[reward_slot], plr);
411 if (item)
412 {
413 item->setStackCount(uint32_t(qst->reward_choiceitemcount[reward_slot]));
414 plr->getItemInterface()->SafeAddItem(std::move(item), slotresult.ContainerSlot, slotresult.Slot);
415 }
416 }
417 }
418 else
419 {
420 item_add->setStackCount(item_add->getStackCount() + qst->reward_choiceitemcount[reward_slot]);
421 item_add->m_isDirty = true;
422 }
423 }
424 }
425 // if daily then append to finished dailies
426 if (qst->is_repeatable == DEFINE_QUEST_REPEATABLE_DAILY)
427 plr->addQuestIdToFinishedDailies(qst->id);
428 // Remove quests that are listed to be removed on quest complete.
429 std::set<uint32_t>::iterator iter = qst->remove_quest_list.begin();
430 for (; iter != qst->remove_quest_list.end(); ++iter)
431 {
432 if (!plr->hasQuestFinished((*iter)))
433 plr->addQuestToFinished((*iter));
434 }
435
436#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
437 plr->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST_COUNT, 1, 0, 0);
438#endif
439 if (qst->reward_money > 0)
440 {
441 // Money reward
442 // Check they don't have more than the max gold
443 if (worldConfig.player.isGoldCapEnabled && (plr->getCoinage() + qst->reward_money) <= worldConfig.player.limitGoldAmount)
444 {
445 plr->modCoinage(qst->reward_money);
446 }
447#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
448 plr->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_QUEST_REWARD_GOLD, qst->reward_money, 0, 0);
449#endif
450 }
451
452 plr->updateNearbyQuestGameObjects();
453
454#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
455 plr->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUESTS_IN_ZONE, qst->zone_id, 0, 0);
456 plr->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_COMPLETE_QUEST, qst->id, 0, 0);
457#endif
458 }
459 }
460 else
461 {
462 recout += "Quest Id [";
463 recout += args;
464 recout += "] was not found and unable to add it to the player's quest log.";
465 }
466
467 recout += "\n\n";
468
469 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
470
471 return true;
472}
INV_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL
@ INV_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL
Definition ItemDefines.hpp:309
DEFINE_QUEST_REPEATABLE_DAILY
#define DEFINE_QUEST_REPEATABLE_DAILY
Definition QuestProperties.hpp:13

@ RATE_QUESTREPUTATION

Creates and adds a item that can be manipulated after.

Item * FindItemLessMax(uint32_t itemid, uint32_t cnt, bool IncBank)
Checks for stacks that didn't reached max capacity.

1296
1297 std::string finisherId;
1298 if (objectResult)
1299 {
1300 Field* fields = objectResult->Fetch();
1301 finisherId = std::to_string(fields[0].asUint32());
1302 }
1303 else
1304 {
1305 recout = "|cff00ccffNo quest finisher NPCs found.\n\n";
1306 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1307 return true;
1308 }

1313 {
1314 finisherName = creatureResult->Name;
1315 }
1316 else
1317 {
1318 recout = "|cff00ccffNo quest finisher info found.\n\n";
1319 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1320 return true;
1321 }

1325
1326 if (!spawnResult)
1327 {
1328 recout = "|cff00ccffNo spawn location for quest finisher was found.\n\n";
1329 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1330 return true;

1335 float x = fields[1].asFloat();
1336 float y = fields[2].asFloat();
1337 float z = fields[3].asFloat();
1338
1339 recout = "|cff00ccffPorting to Quest Finisher: id, name\n\n";
1340 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1341
1342 recout = "|cff00ccff";
1343 recout += finisherId;
1344 recout += ", ";
1345 recout += finisherName;
1346 recout += "\n\n";
1347 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1348
1349 m_session->GetPlayer()->safeTeleport(locmap, 0, LocationVector(x, y, z));
1350
1351 return true;
1352}

◆ HandleQuestItemCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleQuestItemCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 496 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

497{
498 if (!*args)
499 return false;
500
501 std::string my_item_lookup = "SELECT item, item_count FROM gameobject_quest_item_binding WHERE quest = " + std::string(args);
502
503 auto result = WorldDatabase.Query(my_item_lookup.c_str());
504 std::string recout;
505 if (!result)
506 {
507 recout = "|cff00ccffNo matches found.\n\n";
508 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
509 return true;
510 }
511 recout = "|cff00ff00Quest item matches: itemid: count -> Name\n\n";
512 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
513
514 uint32_t count = 0;
515 do
516 {
517 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
518 uint32_t id = fields[0].asUint32();
519 std::string itemid = std::to_string(id);
520 std::string itemcnt = std::to_string(fields[1].asUint32());
521 auto tmpItem = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(id);
522 if (tmpItem != nullptr)
523 {
524 recout = "|cff00ccff";
525 recout += itemid;
526 recout += ": ";
527 recout += itemcnt;
528 recout += " -> ";
529 recout += tmpItem->Name;
530 recout += "\n";
531 }
532 else
533 recout = "|cffff0000Invalid Item!\n";
534
535
536 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
537
538 ++count;
539
540 if (count == 25)
541 {
542 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results returned. aborting.");
543 break;
544 }
545 }
546 while (result->NextRow());
547
548 return true;
549}
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ HandleQuestListCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleQuestListCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 662 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

663{
664 uint32_t quest_giver = 0;
665 if (*args)
666 quest_giver = std::stoul(args);
667 else
668 {
669 WoWGuid wowGuid;
670 wowGuid.Init(m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid());
671 if (wowGuid.getRawGuid() == 0)
672 {
673 systemMessage(m_session, "You must target an npc or specify an id.");
674 return true;
675 }
676
677 Creature* unit = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getCreature(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
678 if (unit)
679 {
680 if (!unit->isQuestGiver())
681 {
682 systemMessage(m_session, "Unit is not a valid quest giver.");
683 return true;
684 }
685
686 if (!unit->HasQuests())
687 {
688 systemMessage(m_session, "NPC does not have any quests.");
689 return true;
690 }
691
692 quest_giver = unit->getEntry();
693 }
694 }
695
696 std::string recout = "|cff00ff00Quest matches: id: title\n\n";
697 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
698
699 uint32_t count = 0;
700 uint32_t quest_id = 0;
701 QuestProperties const* qst;
702 Field* fields;
703
704 if (quest_giver != 0)
705 {
706 auto creatureResult = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT quest FROM creature_quest_starter WHERE id = %u AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u", quest_giver, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
707
708 if (!creatureResult)
709 {
710 recout = "|cff00ccffNo quests found for the specified NPC id.\n\n";
711 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
712 return true;
713 }
714
715 do
716 {
717 fields = creatureResult->Fetch();
718 quest_id = fields[0].asUint32();
719
720 qst = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id);
721 if (qst == nullptr)
722 continue;
723
724 std::string qid = std::to_string(quest_id);
725 std::string qname = qst->title;
726
727 recout = "|cff00ccff";
728 recout += qid;
729 recout += ": ";
730 recout += qname;
731 recout += "\n";
732
733 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
734
735 ++count;
736
737 if (count == 25)
738 {
739 redSystemMessage(m_session, "More than 25 results returned. aborting.");
740 break;
741 }
742 }
743 while (creatureResult->NextRow());
744 }
745
746 if (count == 0)
747 {
748 recout = "|cff00ccffNo matches found.\n\n";
749 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
750 }
751
752 return true;
753}

Definition at line 1354 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

1355{
1356 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Load of quests from the database has been initiated ...");
1357 auto startTime = Util::TimeNow();
1358
1359 sQuestMgr.LoadExtraQuestStuff();
1360
1361 blueSystemMessage(m_session, "Load completed in {} ms.", static_cast<uint32_t>(Util::GetTimeDifferenceToNow(startTime)));
1362
1363 WoWGuid wowGuid;
1364 wowGuid.Init(m_session->GetPlayer()->getTargetGuid());
1365
1366 if (wowGuid.getRawGuid() == 0)
1367 return true;
1368
1369 Creature* unit = m_session->GetPlayer()->getWorldMap()->getCreature(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
1370 if (!unit)
1371 return true;
1372
1373 if (!unit->isQuestGiver())
1374 return true;
1375
1376 // If player targeted a questgiver assume they want the NPC reloaded, too
1377 unit->_LoadQuests();
1378
1379 return true;
1380}

◆ HandleQuestRewardCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleQuestRewardCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1414 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

1415{
1416 if (!*args) return false;
1417
1418 std::stringstream recout;
1419
1420 uint32_t qu_id = std::stoul(args);
1421 if (qu_id == 0)
1422 {
1423 qu_id = GetQuestIDFromLink(args);
1424 if (qu_id == 0)
1425 return false;
1426 }
1427
1428 QuestProperties const* q = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(qu_id);
1429 if (q)
1430 {
1431 for (uint32_t r = 0; r < q->count_reward_item; ++r)
1432 {
1433 uint32_t itemid = q->reward_item[r];
1434 ItemProperties const* itemProto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(itemid);
1435 if (!itemProto)
1436 {
1437 recout << "Unknown item id %lu" << itemid;
1438 sLogger.failure("WORLD: Unknown item id 0x%08x", itemid);
1439 }
1440 else
1441 {
1442 recout << "Reward (" << itemid << "): " << sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(itemProto, m_session->language);
1443 if (q->reward_itemcount[r] == 1)
1444 recout << "\n";
1445 else
1446 recout << "[x" << q->reward_itemcount[r] << "]\n";
1447 }
1448 }
1449 for (uint32_t r = 0; r < q->count_reward_choiceitem; ++r)
1450 {
1451 uint32_t itemid = q->reward_choiceitem[r];
1452 ItemProperties const* itemProto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(itemid);
1453 if (!itemProto)
1454 {
1455 recout << "Unknown item id %lu" << itemid;
1456 sLogger.failure("WORLD: Unknown item id 0x%08x", itemid);
1457 }
1458 else
1459 {
1460 recout << "Reward choice (" << itemid << "): " << sMySQLStore.getItemLinkByProto(itemProto, m_session->language);
1461 if (q->reward_choiceitemcount[r] == 1)
1462 recout << "\n";
1463 else
1464 recout << "[x" << q->reward_choiceitemcount[r] << "]\n";
1465 }
1466 }
1467 if ((q->count_reward_choiceitem == 0) && (q->count_reward_item == 0))
1468 {
1469 recout << "Quest " << qu_id << " has no item rewards.";
1470 }
1471 }
1472 else
1473 {
1474 recout << "Quest ID " << qu_id << " not found.\n";
1475 sLogger.failure("Quest ID {} not found.", qu_id);
1476 }
1477
1478 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.str().data());
1479
1480 return true;
1481}

◆ HandleQuestStartCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleQuestStartCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 129 of file QuestCommands.cpp.

130{
131 if (!*args)
132 return false;
133
134 Player* player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
135 if (player == nullptr)
136 return true;
137
138 uint32_t quest_id = std::stoul(args);
139 if (quest_id == 0)
140 {
141 quest_id = GetQuestIDFromLink(args);
142 if (quest_id == 0)
143 return false;
144 }
145 std::string recout = "|cff00ff00";
146
147 QuestProperties const* questProperties = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id);
148 if (questProperties)
149 {
150 if (player->hasQuestFinished(quest_id))
151 recout += "Player has already completed that quest.";
152 else
153 {
154 if (player->hasQuestInQuestLog(quest_id))
155 {
156 recout += "Player is currently on that quest.";
157 }
158 else
159 {
160 uint8_t open_slot = player->getFreeQuestSlot();
161 if (open_slot > MAX_QUEST_SLOT)
162 {
163 sQuestMgr.SendQuestLogFull(player);
164 recout += "Player's quest log is full.";
165 }
166 else
167 {
168 if (questProperties->time != 0 && player->hasTimedQuestInQuestSlot())
169 {
170 sQuestMgr.SendQuestInvalid(INVALID_REASON_HAVE_TIMED_QUEST, player);
171 return true;
172 }
173
174 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "started quest %u [%s] for player %s", questProperties->id, questProperties->title.c_str(), player->getName().c_str());
175
176 auto* questLogEntry = player->createQuestLogInSlot(questProperties, open_slot);
177 questLogEntry->updatePlayerFields();
178
179 // If the quest should give any items on begin, give them the items.
180 for (uint32_t receive_item : questProperties->receive_items)
181 {
182 if (receive_item)
183 {
184 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(receive_item, player);
185 if (item == nullptr)
186 return false;
187
188 player->getItemInterface()->AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(item));
189 }
190 }
191
192 if (questProperties->srcitem && questProperties->srcitem != questProperties->receive_items[0])
193 {
194 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(questProperties->srcitem, player);
195 if (item)
196 {
197 item->setStackCount(questProperties->srcitemcount ? questProperties->srcitemcount : 1);
198 player->getItemInterface()->AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(item));
199 }
200 }
201
202 player->updateNearbyQuestGameObjects();
203 sHookInterface.OnQuestAccept(player, questProperties, nullptr);
204
205 recout += "Quest has been added to the player's quest log.";
206 }
207 }
208 }
209 }
210 else
211 {
212 recout += "Quest Id [";
213 recout += args;
214 recout += "] was not found and unable to add it to the player's quest log.";
215 }
216
217 recout += "\n\n";
218
219 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
220
221 return true;
222}
sHookInterface
#define sHookInterface
Definition HookInterface.hpp:72

1221{
1222 if (!*args)
1223 return false;
1224
1225 std::string recout;
1226
1227 std::string my_query = "SELECT id FROM creature_quest_starter WHERE quest = " + std::string(args) + " AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u";
1228 auto objectResult = WorldDatabase.Query(my_query.c_str(), VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
1229
1230 std::string starterId;
1231 if (objectResult)
1232 {
1233 Field* fields = objectResult->Fetch();
1234 starterId = std::to_string(fields[0].asUint32());
1235 }
1236 else
1237 {
1238 recout = "|cff00ccffNo quest starter NPCs found.\n\n";
1239 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1240 return true;
1241 }
1242
1243 std::string starterName = "N/A";

1246 {
1247 starterName = creatureResult->Name;
1248 }
1249 else
1250 {
1251 recout = "|cff00ccffNo quest starter info found.\n\n";
1252 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1253 return true;
1254 }
1255

1258
1259 if (!spawnResult)
1260 {
1261 recout = "|cff00ccffNo spawn location for quest starter was found.\n\n";
1262 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1263 return true;
1264 }
1265
1266 Field* fields = spawnResult->Fetch();
1267 uint32_t locmap = fields[0].asUint32();
1268 float x = fields[1].asFloat();
1269 float y = fields[2].asFloat();
1270 float z = fields[3].asFloat();
1271
1272 recout = "|cff00ccffPorting to Quest Starter/Giver: id, name\n\n";
1273 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1274
1275 recout = "|cff00ccff";
1276 recout += starterId;
1277 recout += ", ";
1278 recout += starterName;
1279 recout += "\n\n";
1280 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
1281
1282 m_session->GetPlayer()->safeTeleport(locmap, 0, LocationVector(x, y, z));
1283
1284 return true;
1285}

◆ HandleRecallListCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleRecallListCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 116 of file RecallCommands.cpp.

117{
118 uint32_t count = 0;
119
120 std::string recout = MSG_COLOR_GREEN;
121 recout += "Recall locations|r:\n\n";
122
123 std::string search(args);
124 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(search);
125
126 for (const auto& recall : sMySQLStore.getRecallStore())
127 {
128 std::string recallName(recall->name);
129 AscEmu::Util::Strings::toLowerCase(recallName);
130 if (recallName.find(search) == 0)
131 {
132 recout += MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE;
133 recout += recall->name;
134 recout += "|r, ";
135 count++;
136
137 if (count == 5)
138 {
139 recout += "\n";
140 count = 0;
141 }
142 }
143 }
144
145 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, recout.c_str());
146
147 return true;

283 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "WorldDB gameobjects tables reloaded in {} ms", static_cast<uint32_t>(Util::GetTimeDifferenceToNow(startTime)));
284 return true;

WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 158 of file GuildCommands.cpp.

159{
160 Player* selected_player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
161 if (selected_player == nullptr)
162 return true;
163
164 if (selected_player->isInGuild())
165 {
166 redSystemMessage(m_session, "{} not in a guild.", selected_player->getName());
167 return true;
168 }
169
170 if (!*args)
171 return false;
172
173 Guild* guild = sGuildMgr.getGuildByName(std::string(args));
174 if (guild != nullptr)
175 {
176 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Guild name {} is already taken.", args);
177 return true;
178 }
179 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Changed guild name of {} to {}. This will take effect next restart.", selected_player->getGuild()->getName(), args);
180 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE guilds SET `guildName` = \'%s\' WHERE `guildId` = '%u'", CharacterDatabase.EscapeString(std::string(args)).c_str(), selected_player->getGuild()->getId());
181 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "Changed guild name of '%s' to '%s'", selected_player->getGuild()->getName().c_str(), args);
182
183 return true;
184}

227{
228 bool is_name_set = false;

230
231 if (*args)
232 is_name_set = true;
233
234 if (is_name_set)
235 {
236 player = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(args, false);
237 if (player == nullptr)
238 {
239 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player {} is not online or does not exist!", args);
240 return true;

242 }
243 else
244 {
245 player = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true);
246 if (player == nullptr)
247 return true;
248 }

251 player->resetInstances(INSTANCE_RESET_ALL, false);

◆ HandleResetInstanceCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleResetInstanceCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 165 of file InstanceCommands.cpp.

166{
167 uint32_t instanceId;
168 int argc = 1;
169 char* playername = nullptr;
170 char* guidString = (char*)args;
171
172 // Parse arguments
173 char* space = (char*)strchr(args, ' ');
174 if (space)
175 {
176 *space = '\0';
177 playername = space + 1;
178 argc = 2;
179 }
180
181 instanceId = atoi(guidString);
182 if (!instanceId)
183 {
184 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You must specify an instance id.");
185 return true;
186 }
187
188
189 Player* plr;
190
191 if (argc == 1)
192 plr = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, true, true);
193 else
194 plr = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(playername, false);
195
196 if (!plr)
197 {
198 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player not found");
199 return true;
200 }
201
202 InstanceMap* instance = sMapMgr.findInstanceMap(instanceId);
203 if (instance == nullptr)
204 {
205 redSystemMessage(m_session, "There's no instance with id {}.", instanceId);
206 return true;
207 }
208
209 if (instance && instance->hasPlayers())
210 {
211 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Failed to reset non-persistent instance with id {}, due to player still inside.", instanceId);
212 return true;
213 }
214
215 instance->reset(INSTANCE_RESET_GLOBAL);
216
217 // tell player the instance was reset
218 plr->getSession()->SendPacket(SmsgInstanceReset(instance->getBaseMap()->getMapId()).serialise().get());
219
220 // redSystemMessage(m_session, "Resetting single non-persistent instances is not available yet.");
221 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used reset instance command on %s, instance %u,", plr->getName().c_str(), instanceId);
222 return true;
223}

◆ HandleReviveCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleReviveCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 576 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

577{
578 Player* reviveTarget = nullptr;
579 if (*args)
580 reviveTarget = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(args, false);
581 else
582 reviveTarget = GetSelectedPlayer(m_session, false, true);
583
584 if (reviveTarget == nullptr)
585 {
586 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Player not found!");
587 return true;
588 }
589
590 const auto revivedSelf = reviveTarget == m_session->GetPlayer();
591 if (reviveTarget->isDead())
592 {
593 reviveTarget->setMoveRoot(false);
594 reviveTarget->resurrect();
595
596 if (!revivedSelf)
597 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Player {} revived.", reviveTarget->getName());
598 }
599
600 reviveTarget->setFullHealthMana();
601
602 // Write to GM log
603 if (revivedSelf)
604 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "revived himself");
605 else
606 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "revived player %s", reviveTarget->getName().c_str());
607
608 return true;
609}

613{

212{

216 return true;

233

235
236 sMaster.m_ShutdownTimer = 5000;
237 sMaster.m_ShutdownEvent = false;
238 sMaster.m_restartEvent = false;
239

241}

◆ HandleServerInfoCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleServerInfoCommand ( const char *  ,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 31 of file ServerCommands.cpp.

32{
33 uint16_t online_gm = 0;
34 uint16_t online_count = 0;
35 float latency_avg = 0;
36
37 std::lock_guard guard(sObjectMgr.m_playerLock);
38 for (const auto playerPair : sObjectMgr.getPlayerStorage())
39 {
40 Player* player = playerPair.second;
41 if (player->getSession())
42 {
43 online_count++;
44 latency_avg += player->getSession()->GetLatency();
45 if (player->getSession()->hasPermissions())
46 {
47 if (!worldConfig.gm.listOnlyActiveGms)
48 online_gm++;
49 else
50 if (player->isGMFlagSet())
51 online_gm++;
52 }
53 }
54 }
55
56 uint32_t active_sessions = uint32_t(sWorld.getSessionCount());
57
58 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Info: |r{}AscEmu {}/{}-{}-{} {}(www.ascemu.org)", MSG_COLOR_WHITE, AE_BUILD_HASH, CONFIG, AE_PLATFORM, AE_ARCHITECTURE, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTBLUE);
59 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Using {}/Library {}", OPENSSL_VERSION_TEXT, SSLeay_version(SSLEAY_VERSION));
60 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Uptime: |r{}", sWorld.getWorldUptimeString().c_str());
61 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Active Branch: |r{}", AE_BUILD_BRANCH);
62 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Active Sessions: |r{}", active_sessions);
63 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Current GMs: |r{} GMs", online_gm);
64 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Current Players: |r{} ({} Peak)", online_gm > 0 ? (online_count - online_gm) : online_count, sWorld.getPeakSessionCount());
65 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Active Thread Count: |r{}", ThreadPool.GetActiveThreadCount());
66 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Free Thread Count: |r{}", ThreadPool.GetFreeThreadCount());
67 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Average Latency: |r{}ms", online_count > 0 ? (latency_avg / online_count) : latency_avg);
68 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "CPU Usage: {}%", sWorld.getCPUUsage());
69 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "RAM Usage: {} MB", sWorld.getRAMUsage());
70 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "SQL Query Cache Size (World): |r{} queries delayed", WorldDatabase.GetQueueSize());
71 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "SQL Query Cache Size (Character): |r{} queries delayed", CharacterDatabase.GetQueueSize());
72 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Socket Count: |r{}", sSocketMgr.GetSocketCount());
73
74 return true;
75}

◆ HandleServerRestartCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleServerRestartCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 244 of file ServerCommands.cpp.

245{
246 uint32_t shutdowntime;
247 if (!args)
248 shutdowntime = 30;
249 else
250 shutdowntime = std::stoul(args);
251
252 if (shutdowntime < 30)
253 shutdowntime = 30;
254
255 std::stringstream teamAnnounce;
256 teamAnnounce << MSG_COLOR_RED << "[Team]" << MSG_COLOR_GREEN << " |Hplayer:" << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str() << "|h[" << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str();
257 teamAnnounce << "]|h:" << MSG_COLOR_YELLOW << " initiated server restart timer " << shutdowntime << " sec";
258
259 sWorld.sendMessageToOnlineGms(teamAnnounce.str());
260 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "initiated server restart timer %u sec", shutdowntime);
261
262 std::stringstream worldAnnounce;
263 worldAnnounce << "Server is restarting in " << shutdowntime << " seconds.";
264
265 sWorld.sendMessageToAll(worldAnnounce.str());
266 sWorld.sendAreaTriggerMessage(worldAnnounce.str());
267
268 shutdowntime *= 1000;
269 sMaster.m_ShutdownTimer = shutdowntime;
270 sMaster.m_ShutdownEvent = true;
271 sMaster.m_restartEvent = true;
272
273 return true;
274}

◆ HandleServerSaveAllCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleServerSaveAllCommand ( const char *  ,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 131 of file ServerCommands.cpp.

132{
133 auto start_time = Util::TimeNow();
134 uint32_t online_count = 0;
135
136 std::lock_guard guard(sObjectMgr.m_playerLock);
137 for (const auto playerPair : sObjectMgr.getPlayerStorage())
138 {
139 Player* player = playerPair.second;
140 if (player->getSession())
141 {
142 player->saveToDB(false);
143 online_count++;
144 }
145 }
146
147 std::stringstream teamAnnounce;
148 teamAnnounce << MSG_COLOR_RED << "[Team]" << MSG_COLOR_GREEN << " |Hplayer:" << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str() << "|h[";
149 teamAnnounce << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str() << "]|h:" << MSG_COLOR_YELLOW << " saved all online players (" << online_count;

151
152 sWorld.sendMessageToOnlineGms(teamAnnounce.str());
153
154 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "saved all online players");
155
156 return true;
157}

◆ HandleServerShutdownCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleServerShutdownCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 177 of file ServerCommands.cpp.

178{
179 uint32_t shutdowntime;
180 if (!args)
181 shutdowntime = 30;
182 else
183 shutdowntime = std::stoul(args);
184
185 if (shutdowntime < 30)
186 shutdowntime = 30;
187
188 std::stringstream teamAnnounce;
189 teamAnnounce << MSG_COLOR_RED << "[Team]" << MSG_COLOR_GREEN << " |Hplayer:" << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str();
190 teamAnnounce << "|h[" << m_session->GetPlayer()->getName().c_str() << "]|h:" << MSG_COLOR_YELLOW << " initiated server shutdown timer " << shutdowntime << " sec";
191
192 sWorld.sendMessageToOnlineGms(teamAnnounce.str());
193
194 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "initiated server shutdown timer %u sec", shutdowntime);
195
196 std::stringstream worldAnnounce;
197 worldAnnounce << "Server is shutting down in " << shutdowntime << " seconds.";
198
199 sWorld.sendMessageToAll(worldAnnounce.str());
200 sWorld.sendAreaTriggerMessage(worldAnnounce.str());
201
202 shutdowntime *= 1000;
203 sMaster.m_ShutdownTimer = shutdowntime;
204 sMaster.m_ShutdownEvent = true;
205 sMaster.m_restartEvent = false;
206
207 return true;
208}

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleShutdownInstanceCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 259 of file InstanceCommands.cpp.

260{
261 uint32_t instanceId = (args ? atoi(args) : 0);
262 if (instanceId == 0)
263 return false;
264
265 InstanceMap* instance = sMapMgr.findInstanceMap(instanceId);
266 if (instance == nullptr)
267 {
268 redSystemMessage(m_session, "There's no instance with id {}.", instanceId);
269 return true;
270 }
271
272 if (instance->isUnloadPending())
273 {
274 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Instance with id {} already shut down.", instanceId);
275 return true;
276 }
277
278 systemMessage(m_session, "Attempting to shutdown instance with id {}...", instanceId);
279
280 // Remove all Players
281 instance->removeAllPlayers();
282 instance->setUnloadPending(true);
283
284 systemMessage(m_session, "...done");
285
286 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "used shutdown instance command on instance %u,", instanceId);
287 return true;
288}

1102{

1104 return false;

1108 {
1109 if (!m_session->CanUseCommand('z') && chr->isSummoningDisabled())
1110 {
1111 systemMessage(m_session, "{} has blocked other GMs from summoning them.", chr->getName());

1113 }

1116 {

1131 }
1132 else
1133 {
1134 const auto pinfo = sObjectMgr.getCachedCharacterInfoByName(args);
1135 if (!pinfo)
1136 {
1137 systemMessage(m_session, "Player ({}) does not exist.", args);
1138 return true;
1139 }
1140 Player* pPlayer = m_session->GetPlayer();
1141 char query[512];
1142 snprintf((char*)&query, 512, "UPDATE characters SET mapId = %u, positionX = %f, positionY = %f, positionZ = %f, zoneId = %u WHERE guid = %u;", pPlayer->GetMapId(), pPlayer->GetPositionX(), pPlayer->GetPositionY(), pPlayer->GetPositionZ(), pPlayer->getZoneId(), pinfo->guid);

1144
1145 systemMessage(m_session, "(Offline) {} has been summoned.", pinfo->name);
1146 return true;

◆ HandleTicketCloseCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleTicketCloseCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 112 of file TicketCommands.cpp.

113{
114 if (!args)
115 {
116 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You need to specify a ticket ID and a comment! Use .ticket close <ID> <comment text>");
117 return false;
118 }
119
120 char* ticket = (char*)args;
121 char* comment;
122 ParseTicketArgs(ticket, &comment);
123
124 if (comment == nullptr)
125 {
126 redSystemMessage(m_session, "You need to add a comment for closing an ticket!");
127 return false;
128 }
129
130 uint32_t ticketID = std::stoul(args);
131
132 Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
133
134 auto result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT * FROM gm_tickets WHERE ticketid = %u AND deleted = 0", ticketID);
135 if (!result)
136 {
137 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Ticket {} is already closed!", ticketID);
138 return false;
139 }
140 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
141 uint32_t playerGuid = fields[1].asUint32();
142
143 GM_Ticket* gm_ticket = sTicketMgr.getGMTicketByPlayer(playerGuid);
144 if (gm_ticket == nullptr)
145 {
146 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Ticket not found.");
147 return true;
148 }
149
150 sTicketMgr.closeTicket(gm_ticket->guid);
151
152 Player* ticketOwner = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(playerGuid);
153
154 if (ticketOwner != nullptr)
155 {
156 ticketOwner->getSession()->SystemMessage("Your Ticket was closed by %s Comment: %s", player->getName().c_str(), comment);
157
158 // Notify player about removing ticket
159 ticketOwner->getSession()->SendPacket(SmsgGmTicketDeleteTicket(9).serialise().get());
160 // Response - Send GM Survey
161 ticketOwner->getSession()->SendPacket(SmsgGmTicketStatusUpdate(3).serialise().get());
162 }
163 else
164 {
165 std::string ticketIdString = std::to_string(ticketID);
166 std::string subject = "Your Ticket: ";
167 subject += ticketIdString;
168 sMailSystem.SendAutomatedMessage(MAIL_TYPE_NORMAL, player->getGuid(), playerGuid, subject, comment, 0, 0, 0, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM, MAIL_CHECK_MASK_NONE);
169 }
170
171 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE gm_tickets SET deleted = 1, comment = 'GM: %s %s', assignedto = %u WHERE ticketid = %u", player->getName().c_str(), comment, player->getGuid(), ticketID);
172 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Ticket {} is now closed and assigned to you.", ticketID);
173 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "closed ticket %u ", ticketID);
174 return true;
175}

◆ HandleUnBanCharacterCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleUnBanCharacterCommand ( const char *  args,
WorldSession *  m_session 
)

Definition at line 1338 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

1339{
1340 if (!*args)
1341 return false;
1342
1343 std::string character;
1344
1345 std::istringstream iss(std::string{ args });
1346
1347 if (!(iss >> character))
1348 {
1349 redSystemMessage(m_session, "A character name is required.");
1350 return true;
1351 }
1352
1353 Player* pPlayer = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(character.c_str(), false);
1354 if (pPlayer != nullptr)
1355 {
1356 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Unbanned player {} ingame.", pPlayer->getName());
1357 pPlayer->unsetBanned();
1358 }
1359 else
1360 {
1361 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Player {} not found ingame.", character);
1362 }
1363
1364 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE characters SET banned = 0 WHERE name = '%s'", CharacterDatabase.EscapeString(character).c_str());
1365
1366 systemMessage(m_session, "Unbanned character {} in database.", character);
1367 sGMLog.writefromsession(m_session, "unbanned %s", character.c_str());
1368
1369 return true;

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleWayPointAddCommand ( const char *  args,

18{
19 AIInterface* ai = nullptr;
20 Creature* creature_target = nullptr;
21 Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
22
23 if (player->m_aiInterfaceWaypoint != nullptr)
24 {
25 systemMessage(m_session, "Using Previous Unit.");
26 ai = player->m_aiInterfaceWaypoint;
27 if (!ai)
28 {
29 systemMessage(m_session, "Invalid Creature, please select another one.");
30 return true;
31 }
32
33 creature_target = static_cast<Creature*>(ai->getUnit());
34 if (creature_target == nullptr || creature_target->isPet())
35 {
36 systemMessage(m_session, "Invalid Creature, please select another one.");
37 return true;
38 }
39 }
40 else
41 {
42 creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);
43 if (creature_target == nullptr)
44 return true;
45
46 ai = creature_target->getAIInterface();
47 }
48
49 uint32_t pathId = creature_target->getWaypointPath();
50
51 char* pWaitTime = strtok((char*)args, " ");
52 uint32_t WaitTime = (pWaitTime) ? atoi(pWaitTime) : 10000;
53
54 char* pFlags = strtok(nullptr, " ");
55 uint32_t Flags = (pFlags) ? atoi(pFlags) : 0;
56
57 bool showing = ai->isShowWayPointsActive();
58
59 if (!pathId)
60 {
61 pathId = sWaypointMgr->generateWaypointPathId();
62 creature_target->loadPath(pathId);
63 sLogger.debug("New Waypoint Path {} Startet for Creature {}.", pathId, creature_target->getSpawnId());
64
65 // Start Movement
66 creature_target->setDefaultMovementType(WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE);
67 creature_target->getMovementManager()->movePath(pathId, true);
68
69 WorldDatabase.Execute("UPDATE creature_spawns SET movetype = %u, waypoint_group = %u WHERE id = %u AND min_build <= %u AND max_build >= %u", WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE, pathId, creature_target->spawnid, VERSION_STRING, VERSION_STRING);
70 }
71
72 WaypointNode waypoint;
73 waypoint.id = uint32_t(ai->getWayPointsCount() + 1);
74 waypoint.x = player->GetPositionX();
75 waypoint.y = player->GetPositionY();
76 waypoint.z = player->GetPositionZ();
77 waypoint.orientation = player->GetOrientation();
78 waypoint.moveType = Flags;
79
80 if (waypoint.moveType >= WAYPOINT_MOVE_TYPE_MAX)
81 {
82 sLogger.failure("Waypoint {} has invalid move_type, setting default", waypoint.id);
83 waypoint.moveType = WAYPOINT_MOVE_TYPE_WALK;
84 }
85
86 waypoint.delay = WaitTime;
87 waypoint.eventId = 0;
88 waypoint.eventChance = 0;
89
90 if (showing)
91 ai->hideWayPoints(player);
92
93 // Save Our New Waypoint
94 sWaypointMgr->addWayPoint(pathId, waypoint, true);
95 systemMessage(m_session, "Waypoint {} added to Creature {}.", waypoint.id, creature_target->GetCreatureProperties()->Name);
96
97 if (showing)
98 ai->activateShowWayPoints(player, false);
99
100 return true;
101}

◆ HandleWayPointShowCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::HandleWayPointShowCommand ( const char *  args,

)

178{
179 auto creature_target = GetSelectedCreature(m_session, true);
180 if (creature_target == nullptr)
181 return true;
182
183 char* pBackwards = strtok((char*)args, " ");
184 bool Backwards = (pBackwards) ? ((atoi(pBackwards) > 0) ? true : false) : false;
185
186 AIInterface* ai = creature_target->getAIInterface();
187 Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
188 if (player->m_aiInterfaceWaypoint != ai)
189 {
190 if (ai->isShowWayPointsActive() == true)
191 {
192 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Some one else is also Viewing this Creatures WayPoints.");
193 redSystemMessage(m_session, "Viewing WayPoints at the same time as some one else can cause undesireble results.");
194 return true;
195 }
196
197 if (player->m_aiInterfaceWaypoint != nullptr)
198 player->m_aiInterfaceWaypoint->hideWayPoints(player);
199
200 player->m_aiInterfaceWaypoint = ai;
201 ai->activateShowWayPoints(player, Backwards);
202 }
203 else
204 {
205 if (ai->isShowWayPointsActive() == true)
206 systemMessage(m_session, "Waypoints Already Showing.");
207 else
208 ai->activateShowWayPoints(m_session->GetPlayer(), Backwards);
209 }
210
211 systemMessage(m_session, "Showing waypoints for creature {}", creature_target->GetSQL_id());
212 return true;
213}

◆ normalizeCommandInput()

std::optional< std::string_view > ChatCommandHandler::normalizeCommandInput ( const char *  raw)

Definition at line 63 of file ChatCommandHandler.cpp.

64{
65 if (!raw)
66 return std::nullopt;
67
68 // skip leading whitespace
69 const char* p = raw;
70 while (*p && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(*p)))
71 ++p;
72
73 // must start with '.' or '!'
74 if (*p != '.' && *p != '!')
75 return std::nullopt;
76
77 // reject ".."
78 if (p[1] == '.')
79 return std::nullopt;
80
81 // skip the sigil
82 ++p;
83
84 // spaces after sigil
85 while (*p && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(*p)))
86 ++p;
87
88 if (*p == '\0')
89 return std::nullopt;
90
91 // build string_view to the end
92 return std::string_view{ p, std::strlen(p) };
93}

◆ ParseCommands()

int ChatCommandHandler::ParseCommands ( const char *  text,
WorldSession *  session 
)

Definition at line 431 of file ChatCommandHandler.cpp.

432{
433 if (!session)
434 return 0;
435
436 if (!*text)
437 return 0;
438
439 if (!session->HasGMPermissions() && worldConfig.server.requireGmForCommands)
440 return 0;
441
442 auto normalized = normalizeCommandInput(text);
443 if (!normalized)
444 return 0;
445
446 try
447 {
448 bool success = executeCommand(*normalized, session);
449 if (!success)
450 {
451 systemMessage(session, "There is no such command, or you do not have access to it.");
452 }
453 }
454 catch (AscEmu::Exception::PlayerNotFoundException& e)
455 {
456 // TODO: Handle this properly (what do we do when we're running commands with no player object?)
457 sLogger.failure("PlayerNotFoundException occurred when processing command [{}]. Exception: {}", text, e.AEwhat());
458 }
459
460 return 1;
461}

◆ resolveTopLevelAbbrev()

bool ChatCommandHandler::resolveTopLevelAbbrev ( std::string_view  tok0,
WorldSession *  s,
std::string &  outTop 
) const

Definition at line 98 of file ChatCommandHandler.cpp.

99{
100 auto &reg = sCommandTableStorage.getCommandRegistry();
101
102 auto lo = [](char c){
103 return static_cast<char>(std::tolower(static_cast<unsigned char>(c)));
104 };
105 auto istarts_with = [&](std::string_view a, std::string_view b){
106 if (b.size() > a.size())
107 return false;
108
109 for (size_t i=0; i<b.size(); ++i)
110 if (lo(a[i]) != lo(b[i]))
111 return false;
112
113 return true;
114 };
115
116 std::vector<std::string> matches;
117
118 for (const auto& e : reg)
119 {
120 if (e.command.empty())
121 continue;
122
123 // split command into words (top-level == exactly 1 word)
124 std::istringstream is(e.command);
125 std::string w0, more;
126 if (!(is >> w0) || (is >> more))
127 continue; // not exactly one word
128
129 const char perm = e.commandPermission.empty() ? '0' : e.commandPermission[0];
130 if (perm != '0' && !s->CanUseCommand(perm))
131 continue;
132
133 // exact (case-insensitive) wins immediately
134 if (w0.size() == tok0.size())
135 {
136 bool eq = true;
137 for (size_t i=0; i<w0.size(); ++i)
138 {
139 if (lo(w0[i]) != lo(tok0[i]))
140 {
141 eq = false;
142 break;
143 }
144 }
145
146 if (eq)
147 {
148 outTop = w0;
149 return true;
150 }
151 }
152
153 // abbreviation candidate
154 if (istarts_with(w0, tok0))
155 matches.push_back(std::move(w0));
156 }
157
158 if (matches.size() == 1)
159 {
160 outTop = matches[0];
161 return true;
162 }
163
164 return false; // unknown or ambiguous
165}
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ SendHighlightedName()

void ChatCommandHandler::SendHighlightedName ( WorldSession *  m_session,
const char *  prefix,
const char *  full_name,
std::string &  lowercase_name,
std::string &  highlight,
uint32_t  id 
)

Definition at line 641 of file ChatCommandHandler.cpp.

642{
643 char message[1024];
644 char start[50];
645 start[0] = 0;
646 message[0] = 0;
647
648 snprintf(start, 50, "%s %u: %s", prefix, id, MSG_COLOR_WHITE);
649
650 auto highlight_length = highlight.length();
651 std::string fullname = std::string(full_name);
652 size_t offset = lowercase_name.find(highlight);
653 auto remaining = fullname.size() - offset - highlight_length;
654
655 strcat(message, start);
656 strncat(message, fullname.c_str(), offset);
657 strcat(message, MSG_COLOR_LIGHTRED);
658 strncat(message, (fullname.c_str() + offset), highlight_length);
659 strcat(message, MSG_COLOR_WHITE);
660 if (remaining > 0)
661 strncat(message, (fullname.c_str() + offset + highlight_length), remaining);
662
663 systemMessage(m_session, message);
664}

709 }
710 }
711 else if (unitTarget->isCreature())
712 {
713 if (auto creature = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(unitTarget))
714 {
715 sGMLog.writefromsession(session, "used modify %s from %f to %f on %s (%u)", modType.c_str(), oldValue, newValue, creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name.c_str(), creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Id);
716
717 blueSystemMessage(session, "You modify '{}' of {} from {} to {}.", modType, creature->GetCreatureProperties()->Name, oldValue, newValue);
718 }
719 }
720}

50 end = strchr(start, '\n');

52 break;
53
54 *end = '\0';
55 systemMessage(m_session, start);
56 start = end + 1;
57 }

◆ showHelpForCommand()

bool ChatCommandHandler::showHelpForCommand ( WorldSession *  m_session,
const char *  args 
)

Definition at line 83 of file MiscCommands.cpp.

84{
85 auto &reg = sCommandTableStorage.getCommandRegistry();
86
87 // normalize input: strip leading spaces and an optional dot
88 std::string_view sv = args ? std::string_view(args) : std::string_view{};
89 size_t i = 0;
90
91 while (i < sv.size() && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(sv[i])))
92 ++i;
93
94 // be consequent if you allow '.' or '!' in the normalization, you need to allow it here too
95 if (i < sv.size() && (sv[i] == '.' || sv[i] == '!'))
96 ++i;
97
98 while (i < sv.size() && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(sv[i])))
99 ++i;
100
101 sv.remove_prefix(i);
102 if (sv.empty())
103 return false;
104
105 // split input into tokens (views)
106 std::vector<std::string_view> tokens;
107 {
108 size_t p = 0;
109 while (p < sv.size())
110 {
111 while (p < sv.size() && std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(sv[p])))
112 ++p;
113
114 if (p >= sv.size())
115 break;
116
117 size_t q = p;
118 while (q < sv.size() && !std::isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(sv[q])))
119 ++q;
120
121 tokens.emplace_back(sv.substr(p, q - p));
122 p = q;
123 }
124 }
125
126 if (tokens.empty())
127 return false;
128
129 // resolve ONLY the first token to a top-level command
130 std::string top;
131 if (!resolveTopLevelAbbrev(tokens[0], m_session, top))
132 return false; // unknown/ambiguous top-level
133
134 auto lo = [](char c) {
135 return static_cast<char>(std::tolower(static_cast<unsigned char>(c)));
136 };
137
138 auto istarts_with = [&](std::string_view a, std::string_view b) {
139 if (b.size() > a.size())
140 return false;
141
142 for (size_t k = 0; k < b.size(); ++k)
143 if (lo(a[k]) != lo(b[k]))
144 return false;
145
146 return true;
147 };
148
149 // exact depth we want help for (do NOT auto-descend)
150 const size_t wantedDepth = tokens.size();
151
152 // Try to find an entry exactly at that depth: first word == resolved top-level,
153 // the remaining words are matched by abbreviation.
154 const ChatCommand* match = nullptr;
155 std::string matchCmd;
156
157 for (const auto& e : reg)
158 {
159 if (e.command.empty())
160 continue;
161
162 // split command into words
163 std::vector<std::string> words;
164 {
165 std::istringstream is(e.command);
166 for (std::string w; is >> w; )
167 words.push_back(std::move(w));
168 }
169
170 if (words.size() != wantedDepth)
171 continue; // exact depth only
172
173 if (words.empty())
174 continue;
175
176 // first word must equal resolved top (case-insensitive)
177 if (words[0].size() != top.size())
178 {
179 // handled below by per-char compare anyway
180 }
181 {
182 bool eq = true;
183 for (size_t k=0; k<top.size(); ++k)
184 if (lo(words[0][k]) != lo(top[k])) { eq = false; break; }
185 if (!eq) continue;
186 }
187
188 // remaining words matched by abbreviation
189 bool ok = true;
190 for (size_t w = 1; w < wantedDepth; ++w)
191 {
192 if (!istarts_with(words[w], tokens[w]))
193 {
194 ok = false;
195 break;
196 }
197 }
198
199 if (!ok)
200 continue;
201
202 const char perm = e.commandPermission.empty() ? '0' : e.commandPermission[0];
203 if (perm != '0' && !m_session->CanUseCommand(perm))
204 continue;
205
206 match = &e;
207 matchCmd = e.command;
208 break;
209 }
210
211 if (match)
212 {
213 // exact-depth entry exists show its help (or say there is none)
214 if (!match->help.empty())
215 SendMultilineMessage(m_session, match->help.c_str());
216 else
217 systemMessage(m_session, "There is no help for that command");
218
219 return true;
220 }
221
222 // No exact-depth entry treat as a node: list children under that prefix.
223 // Build the typed prefix string: <top> + the typed (abbrev) tokens joined by spaces.
224 std::string typedPrefix = top;
225 for (size_t t = 1; t < tokens.size(); ++t)
226 {
227 typedPrefix.push_back(' ');
228 typedPrefix.append(tokens[t].data(), tokens[t].size());
229 }
230
231 // But for listing children we need the *resolved* prefix (first word = resolved top),
232 // without auto-resolving further words. So children start with "<top> ".
233 const std::string listPrefix = top + ' ';
234
235 bool any = false;
236 for (const auto &cmd : reg)
237 {
238 if (cmd.command.size() <= listPrefix.size())
239 continue;
240
241 // starts with "<top> " (case-insensitive)
242 bool starts = true;
243 for (size_t k = 0; k < listPrefix.size(); ++k)
244 {
245 if (lo(cmd.command[k]) != lo(listPrefix[k]))
246 {
247 starts = false;
248 break;
249 }
250 }
251
252 if (!starts)
253 continue;
254
255 const char perm = cmd.commandPermission.empty() ? '0' : cmd.commandPermission[0];
256 if (perm != '0' && !m_session->CanUseCommand(perm))
257 continue;
258
259 // show only the remainder after "<top> "
260 auto help = cmd.help.empty() ? "No Help Available" : cmd.help;
261
262 blueSystemMessage(m_session, " {} - {}", cmd.command.substr(listPrefix.size()), help);
263
264 any = true;
265 }
266
267 if (!any)
268 systemMessage(m_session, "There is no help for that command");
269 else
270 greenSystemMessage(m_session, "Available Subcommands:");
271
272 return true;
273}
Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:

void ChatCommandHandler::systemMessage ( WorldSession *  _session,
